Carl could feel Laura's eyes on him as he gently began to push his finger tips into the damp wetness of Sarah's socks. It was like touching slime, the cheerleader socks were absolutely swampy with with her sweat. And the stench... Carl's face was far too close to them.

And yet he gamely rubbed her feet as Laura looked on. Sarah sighed with contentment. "Oh wow this feels so good after practice!"

Laura laughed, "Who would of thought the nerd here would be good with hands!"

Sarah giggled a bit, "Laura don't be mean, don't call him a nerd. Just because he is smart and scrawny and... uh oops sorry Carl didn't mean to call you scrawny!"

Carl reddened a bit, he was short and thin. He had always been picked on in high school for that. In college it was different, sure he wasn't popular but he was rarely openly mocked or pushed around like he was then. Well, it was true before Laura got his hands on him!

"It... i-i-ts OK Sarah. I k-kn-ow *cough* you didn't m-mean anything b-b-by it."

Laura smirked. "You all right there 'little guy' why are you coughing?"

"Ugh Laura he's probably coughing because my feet are rank. I really probably should have taken a shower first."

Carl mentally agreed, he thought Sarah was perfect but sweaty feet were sweaty feet no matter how beautiful the person they belonged to. He didn't say this aloud of course.

Laura's eyes smoldered with evil intent as she made a 'hmmm' sound. "I don't hear Carl agreeing, I think the poor guy must have no sense of smell. Some people just have dud noses, I bet that's it isn't it?"

Carl shrank in on himself. He knew what Laura wanted. He wasn't stupid. Laura wanted him to say that he couldn't smell a thing and then she would make him prove it by having him sniff Sarah's raunchy swamp like socks! It was so clear to him but what wasn't clear was how he could escape this. If he didn't do what Laura asked he knew she was going to make him suffer, maybe even get him expelled. Frantically he tried to think as Laura's eyes bore into his skull.

Carl felt sick to his stomach at the very though but Sarah's eyes brightened and she smiled at the idea.

She clapped her hands. "Oh that would be an interesting test. Now Carl, you'll have to let us know if you can't handle our feet right on top of your nose. I know mine are pretty bad after my extended practice."

The girls position him so he was laying face down with his face titled up. Sarah pried her sweaty socks off her feet and threw them into the laundry basket. "There we go, can you smell anything Carl?" Sarah asked curiously.

"Um, u-uh, w-w-well, not really." Carl said, still terrified of disobeying Laura.

"Yay! Oh you knew when you inhale and exhale like that so close to my toes it really feels nice. Like a gentle breeze on my feet." Sarah remarked as Laura put her feet next to hers.

Laura nodded, "You are right Sarah it really is nice, if he's not doing laundry of homework he should lay down like this and relax our feet!"

It's been about 10 minutes since Carl started to take in the smell of Sarah's dedication to cheerleading. 10 minutes of his lungs on fire. He could ignore to agonizing amount of satisfaction Laura was getting seeing him take in the fumes she could smell across the room. This was about Sarah's satisfaction not Laura's. Carl really wanted to stay still as it was clearly helping Sarah relax but he just couldn't, his body wouldn't allow it.

"I-I am sorry, Sarah. I just can't!" The cat was out of the bag, he could only pretend for so long, Carl could smell. Carl moved his face from under Sarah's soft but potent feet and scurried away on his knee's. How can someone so beautiful smell like that?

"You're using our place to stay. We are the only reason your skinny ass is still here. You're lucky I was kind enough to get you to just smell our feet loser."

Carl gave a pleading look to Sarah hoping she would offer some sort of back up.

"Carl, don't give me that look, she has a point. If you're going to be staying here then you have to pull your weight like me and Laura do."

...Carl has given Sarah a foot massage, is currently doing all of her homework, cleaned up the filthy clubhouse, and gave her $2,000 that he still hasn't gotten back. In Carl's mind he was off to a good start pulling some of his weight even before he got kicked out of his dorm.

"Look we know our feet are rank but it's only because we work hard. You can't help us out after a long day of work?" Sarah asked as she adorably tilted her head.

"Wait, does that mean you think... my feet smell that bad? I feel so embarrassed right now." Sarah put on a pouty face.

"Sarah, cut the cutesy shit. If this loser is going to try and take advantage over our good will when we were being nice about it then maybe we should stop being nice." Laura said as she got up from her seat.

"Oh boy... He made Laura mad" Sarah thought to herself. Sarah never got tried of seeing her friend in action. Much better than anything on TV.

Carl like a deer in headlights stood completely still as Laura made her way over to him. What else could he do? Run away? At this moment he really missed his old dorm.

Laura grabbed Carl by the hair "We are going to give you one final chance. Disobey us again and you'll not only get kicked out of this school to never be accepted anywhere again but you'll leave with a lot less teeth."

There's nothing stopping her from fulfilling that promise, Carl knew she was serious. "O-okay Laura, whatever you say."

A smug smile appeared on Laura's face and Sarah was having a blast too.

"Kiss my feet and apologize. You have 5 seconds."

"1!" to Carl's surprise Sarah already started the countdown with a look of joy on her face. Carl loved the look on her face despite this situation. A Goddess like her can only be prettier if she has a big smile on her--

"2!"

"3!"

Carl had to focus to what was more important right now "Laura, I so sorry I disobeyed your order! Please forgive me... it won't happen again. I need this school, more than anything..."

"4!"

Carl quickly bent his head down to gave a kiss to Laura's right foot.

"I don't feel like that was very sincere do you Sarah?"

"Not really, no. Did you even feel that Laura?"

"No, I didn't." Laura looked down on Carl, unimpressed and waiting.

Carl continued kissing both of Laura's feet making sure it was as "sincere" as they could be not only covering her foot but giving pecks to her ankle and shiny black pedicured toes.

"Alright enough, geek. Hey Sarah make sure you foot's ready."

Sarah stretched out her legs and gave her toes a cute wiggle as Laura guided Carl over to her, his hair in her hand.

"Don't disappoint her. You're one of the tiniest guys I've ever seen but I'm sure even you can handle a couple of sweaty feet. If you need some help maning up then just give me a signal." Laura shoved Carl's face into the soles of Sara's feet as Carl went back to his smelling duties.

Sarah gave a huge relaxed sigh "Aaah. I never would've imagined this could feel this amazing, thanks a lot Laura."

Laura laid her feet besides Sarah's "Make sure I can hear you breathing down there Carly! ...Don't mention it. Kick his head over when you're done using him."

Their feet being bare, all Carl could hope in this moment was that the fresh air in the room would save him from this disgusting predicament. About 20 or so minutes later...

1111211122211112122111112222111211.content:
Carl had hoped that her feet would air out after a while... they didn't. Sarah's feet smelled just as bad as they did when she very first slipped them out of their socks. It isn't being overly dramatic, Carl was in agony. Carl's head placed again onto the ground meant he had a lack of fresh air and the sweat was getting into his eyes, at this point he just wanted it to stop and move onto Laura. It's impossible that Laura's feet smelled anywhere near as bad as Sarah's.

Sarah tapped her toes on Carl's head signaling him up and ready to service her friend "Alright Laura, I think I'm about done. You can have him now."

"Alright, I've been waiting for this. Nothing like having a pathetic guy's breathe on my toes while I chill and relax."

"About that... You're gonna love me. Why stop at having Carl smelling your feet? Carl is a sweetheart I'm sure he's willing to go further for someone like you. Isn't that right Carl?"

"Umm... yeah Sarah." Carl knew this wasn't going to be good. He would've begged Sarah not to do this but with Laura by her side, it was better to just stay as quiet as possible.

"What's your idea Sarah?" Laura asked with a pleasant smile. Laura trusted it was something good, her influence reached her BFF.

"Keep in mind Carl, I don't want to force you into doing anything too quirky but after you lied to Laura about having a smelling disability I really think you need to get back on to her good side."

"I was dumb for believing him, this is why I don't do my own homework. I was so naive... Anyway, what did you have in mind?"

"Maybe Carl here can lick your feet, give your toes a suck or something. It would also be super nice after our cheerleader practice ya know?"

"No... no no no. Please anything but that!" Carl internally screamed.

Laura laughed looking at Carl's pleading face "I don't know Sarah, sounds soothing but Carl doesn't look that excited about that idea."

"Carl please, can't you see that I'm trying to help you out here? You know you don't want Laura to be mad at you. Trust me Carl, if I weren't here then you would've gotten kicked out of this school by Laura hours ago."

She was right. It didn't matter what he wanted. Laura hated his guts that much was obvious. Laura could make his life an absolute living Hell. Although he hated to admit it, if Carl was going to have any chance surviving in this school he would need to try and get on Laura's good side.

Carl was smart, he knew he had to sacrifice his shame for his future "I-I'll do it Sarah... Laura, I'm sorry for being troublesome."

Laura and Sarah both looked at each other in surprise, trying not to laugh out loud. They honestly didn't expect to break him this quickly let alone think it would be Sarah to do him in, it's usually Laura who gets the job done.

Sarah positioned the nearby lightweight coffee table to prop up Laura's feet.

"Keep it up, I'm liking this submissive side of you. Sarah was right you know? I'm not that bad when I get what I want. Hurry up and get started brainy." Laura wiggled her toes, ready for Carl to get to work on her pale slightly red feet.

Carl lingered over to the coffee table and took a kneeling spot in front of Laura's feet. Both Sarah and Laura were feeling triumphant. Sarah got a boy to lick her friends feet, no physicality required and Laura was going to have her toes sucked for the first time. (that Sarah knows about anyway)

As Carl moved his face closer to Laura's feet, Laura displayed her usual smug smile and Sarah had a out of character toothy smile.
Carl stuck his tongue out for his first lick... the taste was bitter and salty. Carl ignored the taste and took another lick.

Sarah thought it would be 4 hours later until Carl finished up "Don't be shy Carl, Laura isn't ticklish."

Laura being ticklish was the last thing on Carl's mind, nonetheless, Carl sped up this process hearing Sarah encourage him.

"Not bad, not bad. You got skill for being a noobie, I can admit when someone is good at licking my feet." Carl had a slight smile onto his face. His "plan" was working, he preferred this over Laura kicking him into submission and then worshiping her feet.

"Now open up wide." Commanded Laura. This was the part Carl dreaded the most, the thought of putting her slippery toes in his mouth utterly disgusted him.

Carl stared into Laura's sole as he hesitated to open his mouth. There's nothing he could've done to prepare him for this.

Laura's "good" mood disappeared just like that "When I tell to do something I don't like to wait."

With that Carl swallowed his pride in order to swallow her foot and opened up his mouth as wide as he could.

"Good boy." and with that she squeezed her left foot into Carl's gaping mouth. Carl slid her foot in and out and wiggled her now warm toes before doing the same with her right foot. The foot worship session lasted about 30 minutes. When Laura was done with him she dismissed him with a soft slap of her wet foot.

"See Carl? I told you to trust me, a happy Laura is a happy you. You'll do just fine here, I'm sure." Sarah patted Carl on the shoulder.

"So, Carl..."

Sarah went to her room, Carl presumed to change into something else even though she was stunning as is. When Sarah and Laura got dressed in more casual clothes, Sarah blew Carl a kiss while Laura and her exited the dorm.

This time alone gave Carl a lot of time to think about everything that has transpired. What his life is going to be like now, everyday, doing whatever those two beautiful cheerleaders want him to do. In his mind he was getting on Laura's good side and Sarah would agree. Carl knew of Laura's attitude problems but trusted Sarah's words, "a happy Laura is a happy you".

"Sarah wouldn't lie to me and she's an amazing person. Whoever Sarah's friends with... can't be that bad. I must have given Laura a bad first impression of me." Carl convinced himself.

Lost in thought, about two hours have went by since Sarah and Laura left. Carl had passed the time by doing homework and just being lost in thought.

"Caaaarl, we're back did you miss us?" Carl, eyes to the mass of papers in front of him didn't even hear the dorms door open. It was Sarah and Laura coming back. Both Sarah and Laura kicked off their shoes upon entering.

"Are you keeping yourself busy, my little worker man?" Sarah was delighted returning to Carl doing her homework. If Sarah had to do her own homework then hanging out tonight with her BFF would've had to wait.

"Laura and me are going to call it a night today. You can get some rest when you finish up what you're doing. Thanks Carl, you were so good today." Carl blushed as he gained Sarah's nice words of approval.

About an hour passed. Carl was hard at work finishing as much work as he possibly could before passing out. Carl was always the type to finish his homework as quickly as possible, this really helped him adapt to this new process of doing two more people's homework loads.
Done for the day it was time for Carl to get some rest in his very embarrassing sleeping spot between Sarah and Laura. Something else for Carl to deal with and get used to. Trying hard to not disrupt either girls sleep he tried to avoid both of their feet while he got into place, before closing his eyes he set an alarm for his first class. Slight smell coming off both of their feet, Carl just took the scent in as he slowly drifted off to sleep.

111121112221111212211111222211121111.content:
It was a new day. Carl's alarm went off to wake him up, he hurried to hit snooze in case Sarah and Laura were very likely, still sleeping. Carl always liked to take his classes earlier than others (his first class was at 6 a.m), at this university classes were filled quickly, to make sure he was added to every class he wanted, with the professors he wanted, he tried to avoid the more "comfortable" class times like 12 p.m or 3 p.m. Upon waking up and getting ready Carl seen two pairs of feet from the cheerleaders bed. A sleeping beauty and a sleeping beast of a woman... a very attractive beast.

. . .

After Carl's classes were finished up for the day he went back to his new dorm and relaxed for a couple hours before the sound of the doorknob turning got his attention. It was Sarah, towel around her neck, sweat dripping off of her beautiful face, wearing her usual cheerleader outfit. Breathing heavier than usual, she must've returned fresh from practice.

"Hey Carl, we were looking for you. Stop coming here in this tiny, lame, dorm room and hang out at our clubhouse." Sarah said with a smile.

Honestly Carl thought about it but we wasn't going to show up there uninvited. The dorm room was boring even for Carl, all it had were the bed setup, a small desk, a tiny coffee table, and a wardrobe for clothes which Carl assumed he wasn't allowed to use... he would love to look around in it though.

"Sure thing Sarah, thanks." Carl returned her smile with one of his own.

"No problem Carl. I'm sure you'll make it up to me later, don't forget your stuff."

Carl grabbed his bag and followed Sarah to the clubhouse. Carl couldn't help himself from looking staring at Sarah's legs on the way, the sweat glistening off of her as it slid further and further down as she walked. It was hypnotizing.
When Sarah and Carl entered the clubhouse the first thing that caught Carl's eye was a pale (a little redder than usual) drenched Laura lounging as usual on the clubhouse couch, feet on the coffee table. She was even sweatier than Sarah. Laura wasted no time...

"Where the fuck have you been hiding, nerd?" Laura looked angrily at Carl, she really does have a short fuse...

"I-I'm sorry Laura I didn't know I was allowed in here and--"

Sarah laughed out loud "Laura is just screwing with you Sweetie, calm down."

"We both came up with a really good idea, Carl to get you outta that room and active. You see... we're both exhausted from running miles, learning formations, and all around doing the hard work required for being the pride of the school's cherleaders. Being a cheerleader as good as me and Laura are, you are a smart enough man to know... we're kinda exhausted. Soooo--"

"So you're going to service us everyday we have practice... Well everyday we want." Laura got straight to the point, interrupting Sarah.

Carl with a look of dread, groaned under his breath.

"Don't worry about the smell too much footboy, this isn't the last time you're doing this so I'm sure you'll get used to it soon. Times a wastin, get you ass over here and start the massage." Laura ordered Carl as she proceeded to pull off her shoes and her long dark cheerleader socks.

Carl made his way over to Laura, laying his elbows over the nice elegant table, waiting for further instruction. Laura held her socks in front of Carl's face.

"Remember last time? Open up bitch, don't disappoint me." Carl most definitely remembers. How could he not remember that "unique" taste?

Carl didn't want to get rid of any of the process he made with Laura. He opened his mouth wide as Laura stuck in her favorite gag. The return of the overpowering salt and bitter taste again assaulting his taste buds.

"Be honest with me geekboy, you used to the taste yet?" Laura asked with a smirk.

Carl looked into her eyes. Was she actually waiting for a response?

"Ummmm hm?" muttered Carl with socks filling his mouth.

"Yeah, whatever, get to the massage loser. When you're done you can get move onto Sarah's she must've ran over 2 miles today." Carl grabbed Laura's slippery foot with his hands and went to work applying what he hoped to be the right amount of pressure to Laura's sole.

. . .

In about 30 minutes later Laura gave Carl a slight slap, done with him, she then called over Sarah. Sarah went to sit next to Laura, took off her shoes and sock, tucking her socks into her shoes. Carl moved over to the left to get into position and wiped his hands off on to his shirt.

Sarah giggled as she seen Laura's socks still in Carl's mouth. "You look so cute Carl".

Carl blushed but not in embarrassment. It didn't matter the situation, whenever Sarah gave him a compliment he would gladly take it.
Carl got to work massaging her feet and legs, the same as Laura only this time a tad more sensual. It was easy for Carl to hide his glee with Laura's sock stuffing his entire mouth.

"Thanks Carl, you don't know how good it feels to get rubbed down after doing all of that stuff at practice. I'm sure your nose is doing a good job at knowing how much we needed this refresher. Thanks for introducing me to stuff like this Laura, you're the best."

"No problem babe, glad we share similar interests." Laura gave a quick hug to Sarah.

Laura gave a smug smirk towards Carl "Now..."

Laura yanked her socks out of Carl's mouth "Now it's time for the fun part. Clean up duty."

"L-Laura..."

"Don't even try and get out of this nerd. You're going to be foot bitch and finish what you started. Moisten up that mouth and get ready." Laura gave her toes a cute wiggle.

"Y-yeah, Laura about that... Can I get a water bottle or something please?"

Laura and Sarah were shocked by Carl's new found servitude. "Sure why not? I don't want a dry tongue on my feet anyways. Sarah can you get a bottle from the fridge?" with that Sarah got up and grabbed a bottle of water from the fridge in the back.

"You see footboy, we're not all that bad. If you're a good little bitch then don't be afraid to ask for something every now and then, just don't push it." Laura said as she pointed to Sarah...
Sarah was taking a drink from the bottle. Was Carl going to get backwash from his cheerleading goddess? An indirect kiss?
Sarah begun to walk over to Carl with the bottle in hand. He was, this was happening! Carl tried to hide his perverted look of happiness but he couldn't. This was a wet dream come true. Carl was trembling as he took the holy water from Sarah.

"Sarah, you couldn't get your own damn water?" Asked an annoyed Laura.

"It was just a sip Laura, no biggie. I'm sure Carl doesn't mind, right Carl?"

"N-no I really don't mind."

"I don't give a shit about his water, I'm tired of you giving me your spit whenever you pick me up a drink... Ugh looks like someone really doesn't mind." Laura looked towards Carl's lower half.

"This rule should be obvious even for a virgin like yourself, put that shit away when you are around us. Hand me that bottle."

Carl couldn't help it, he could handle a kiss from Sarah but not something on this level. Carl handed Laura the bottle of water.

"If you can't control yourself believe me, I will handle it for you."

Before Carl could wonder what she meant by that, she opened the bottle and took a drink of water.

"That's not that bad, I can--"

Before putting the top back on, Laura hocked up a glob of spit and shook up the bottle.

Carl shrunk.

"Next time I won't be so nice, loser. You're here for us, we're not here for you. Remember that." Laura warned Carl.

"Carl we're ladies. We're not sluts or something, we can't have things like that showing up in our faces." Sarah scolded Carl.

"You're right Sarah, I-I'm sorry, I just couldn't help myself. It won't happen again." Carl said with his head down.

"It better not. You're not some horny dog."

"and that's where I disagree. Hurry up and drink up, you wasted enough time." Laura was getting impatient.

Carl took in the water. Honestly he didn't taste either Sarah or Laura's addition, maybe because it was a fancy brand of water.

"I-I'm ready, I guess."

Laura put her left foot forward as she crossed her right foot over her left thigh. "Licks up the sole first, suck the toes, and then finish with some kisses." This didn't sound like this was the first time giving these demands...

Carl did as instructed and spent about 20 minutes licking up and down Laura's foot and then continued to softly suck her toes like he did a few days ago. Carl had to admit the kissing part was the easily the best part and the licking and sucking part isn't as bad as having her rank, dry, socks in his mouth. It would be difficult to mess up kissing someone's feet but Carl was worried about the job he had done with the licking and sucking part, it's not like he was an expert or anything.

Laura gave a slight slap to Carl's face. At this point he was smart enough to stop. Carl looked into Laura's eyes and nodded then proceeded to move over to Sarah's to do the same. Sarah for the most part just followed whatever Laura's recommendation was when it came to these things.

"Sarah... Laura did I do good?"

"I'm the wrong person to ask. It's embarrassing but I'm somewhat new to all of this treatment."

...That's "embarrassing" to admit?

"You did fine nerd. You'll be doing this for a while so I'm sure you grow into being a natural foot worshiper. We'll whip you into shape." Laura ensured.

"I'm really impressed with the work you've been doing Carl. You have come a long way, once you pretended like you had some shame and now you are where you should be." Sarah pat Carl on the head as if he was her pet.

This was the first compliment from Sarah he had trouble accepting. The shame was at an all time high.

"Come on Carl, turn that frown upside down. If Laura and me didn't come around then you would be still wasting your life away in your old stinky, dark, dorm, all alone. Now you have us, and all you need to do is get our clothes and homework done. You know I'm right, you just need a little more time to accept it."

Sarah extended her foot forward with a somewhat evil smile "Come on, show me."

Carl didn't want her to be right. Enjoying this life might be easier on him but it just wasn't him. It wasn't who he was...
Carl moved forward and planted yet another kiss to the foot of Sarah. Laura snickered but it didn't matter to Carl, he couldn't turn more red.

Sarah gave Carl a kiss to his forehead, soothing his soul. "Good boy, good boy. All in good time, sweetie."

After taking care of Sarah and Laura until they were satisfied, they went back to their dorm to call it a day.
Carl weighed his odds. There was no way out. No escape from Sarah and Laura, he now lived with them and he had to live with that. Why make things harder then they needed to be? The sickening smell of Sarah's feet after a practice was bad and Laura's, like her attitude, was always in bad condition. Carl could hear the soft breaths of Sarah as she slept. Her life, her troubles were lifted because of... him. Carl drifted off to sleep with that thought easing his mind.

. . .

Upon waking up he looked at Sarah's feet, dangling from her bed and even took a look at Laura's pretty toes. Carl had a soft smile as he left to go to his morning classes. Classes come and went fairly quickly, though his grades dropped the classes were quite easy. Carl just needed to get his head in shape and after some thinking to himself, he might've just done it. "I'm sorry, Laura. I didn't know what to do with myself when I got here." Carl hurried and lifted his rear out of Laura's seat.

That she wasn't dating someone else and that all of his hard work in helping her get good grades, doing her laundry, her friend's laundry and lending her money would eventually lead to them dating.

Seeing the expectant, almost demanding look on Sarah's face, Carl decided that this was a step too far. Not even he would accept washing a girl's laundry on a regular basis, however much he lusted after her!

"N-no, Sarah," Carl stammered at her, not even sounding convincing to himself.

Sarah looked at him for a moment, her pale grey eyes narrowing a little. "I'm sorry, Carl. Did you just say no to me?" She stood in front of him, one hand placed on her hip, the other, dangling alongside her luscious, beautiful thigh.

Carl felt himself become increasingly nervous. "I mean," he spluttered, "D-doing your l-laundry? T-twice a w-week? I-I mean...?" His voice trailed off under Sarah's gaze, feeling at a loss for how to express himself.

"You're telling me you can't help me out? You knew that I couldn't do my own laundry and you still don't wanna help me?" Sarah's lip pouted, almost expertly. She had used her incredible looks and feminine advantage to manipulate others many times before.

"N-no, I d-didn't mean that-"

"What did you mean exactly?" Sarah interrupted him. "I thought you liked me! I thought you would want to help!"

Carl realised now that he wasn't going to win this argument. Changing tact, he decided to apologise, regretting his momentary defiance.

"Sarah - I'm s-sorry. P-please. I-I-I," Carl longed for her to give him a reassuring smile but there was only disappointment on her face. He couldn't stand it. "I'm sorry, I'll do it." He managed to splutter out.

Sarah smirked on the inside. Wow - this guy was so much of a loser that all it took was a slight pout to turn him back around. He was putty in her hands!

Dropping to his knees, Carl surrendered and began to crawl towards the towering Sarah's slender, tanned feet. Although he felt ashamed for submitting so meekly, he knew that if it earned him Sarah's forgiveness then he would simply have to do it.

"Good boy," Sarah began to smile, though the corners of her mouth curled upwards so it was more of a smirk. Arching up her right foot slightly, so that it was slightly angled off the ground, she looked down at Carl, who was on all fours and had his head just above her foot.

"Kiss," she ordered.

Carl wished that he had never disobeyed this goddess, as he lowered his mouth down to where Sarah's foot was positioned. He could smell her strong, sweaty foot odour; if this was just from the top of her foot, then he would hate to smell her actual soles! The cheesy scent filled his nostrils as he opened his mouth and placed it hesitantly on top of her foot, causing him to gag a little. Being approximately six foot, Sarah's foot was pretty long - longer than Carl's entire head he reasoned.

"Kiss," she repeated, a little curter this time.

Whining a little from this embarrassment, Carl began to place a kiss on the top of her bare foot. The cheesy scent that invaded his nostrils was almost as strong as the salty taste of her foot sweat. Being barefooted all of this time had obviously made them sweatier.

Completing the kiss, Carl swallowed her foot sweat as he raised his mouth and head to look up at Sarah's beautiful face.

"Again," Sarah's pale grey eyes burned through Carl. He felt as if he had no choice but to obey.

Lowering down his shaking mouth, Carl started to place several kisses on the top of Sarah's slender foot. Not daring to stop, he did this for at least a minute, all the while being forced to breathe in the unavoidable sweatiness and cheesiness of her foot.

Sarah began to chuckle. "OK Carl, that'll do."

Relieved but still embarrased, Carl withdrew his mouth from her foot and leaned back so that he could make eye contact with her. He was relieved further to see that she was definitely smiling this time.

"Now I forgive you. You've earned the right to do my laundry twice a week. It's good to know how much you care for me, Carl. You've really proved that to me, sweetie." She playfully wiped the top of her foot in Carl's brown hair, removing any of his saliva that would have been left there.

Despite this dismissive act, Carl felt a spark of joy erupt inside of him at being forgiven and referred to as 'sweetie'. He smiled nervously up at her. "T-thank you S-Sarah."

"You know your place," She smiled confidently at him. "You can go now," she adds, as Carl continued to stare lustfully up at her.

Scrambling awkwardly to his feet, Carl exited and made his way back to his room. Sighing, he knew he was in a hopeless situation. He had humiliated himself in front of Sarah so much now that it would be impossible to refuse her. Her words rang in his head: 'You know your place...'

Accepting that he was nothing other than a bitch to Sarah, he decided to tackle her homework tasks first before starting on his own. Any extra effort he could put in would raise her grade point average even higher.

Several hours later, there was a knock on the door...

Sarah again found it impossible not to giggle. She honestly couldn't believe that this guy was so weak that he couldn't maintain a foot rub for more than an hour, or take just some of her weight!

"OK, OK," She managed to regain composure, while Carl caught his breath back, flushing red at her obvious mirth. "Tell you what. As you don't have any strength left in your arms (that was putting it kindly, Carl thought) and I'm obviously too strong for your back, you can lie on your back, while I..." She paused and leaned forward so that Carl could see her incredibly beautiful, but definitely smirking expression, "Rest my feet in your face. Sound fair?"

The combination of the power Sarah held over Carl, along with his physical exhaustion made him too weak to argue with her.

"S-sure, Sarah," He winced a little, remembering how much Sarah's feet had smelled when he massaged them before.

"Good boy," She grinned, effortlessly extending her gorgeously long, tanned legs on to the floor. With a casual flick, her feet pushed over to completely cover Carl's face.

The stench was immediate and powerful; Carl could not help but to choke and splutter while Sarah's soles planted over his face. Her toes curled over and pressed gently into his cheek, while the main part of her foot covered his mouth and nostrils. It was unbearable! Carl knew that this girl was so incredibly goddess-like in every way, but being forced to smell her feet was not his chosen way to demonstrate his undying love for her.

Sarah unsuccessfully tried to stifle a giggle, while her long, powerful feet pushed firmly into Carl's face. "You OK, Carl? I know my feet must be a little sweaty. I did have a cheerleading practise today. It's a good job I have you to soak it up!"

Carl grunted, which sounded more like a groan. "F-fine," His voice was rather muffled by Sarah's bare feet.

Sarah sighed contentedly as her feet rested on Carl's face. The TV show she was watching increased a little in volume: she clearly wanted to focus her attention back to that, now that Carl was firmly put in his place: at her feet. She laughed suddenly; Carl was a bit confused at first, then he realised that the programme she was enjoying was probably a comedy.

His face was being pressed into by her toes, her heels, her feet in general. Occasionally, she would bend her toes in to his cheeks, making it even harder for him to breathe. He was desperate for oxygen, but all he could inhale was the stale, cheesy aroma of her feet. Carl wished that he had possessed just a slither of strength to maintain his position as foot massager, or even foot stool. Being nothing than a carpet for her feet was truly the lowest place he could be. It was symbolic really; Sarah clearly considered him beneath her: under her feet!

Carl continued to suffer at Sarah's feet while she relaxed and enjoyed her television shows. This went on for what seemed like an eternity until Sarah finally raised her feet, allowing him to breathe in some fresh, wonderful oxygen to his grateful lungs.

Moments later, Carl's brief reprieve was over as Sarah's two bare feet resumed their resting position over his face, wriggling around as if to find a more comfortable position. The powerful stench invaded his lungs once again. Her foot sweat trickled onto his already moist face. Carl could not help but whimper - he was being completely dominated and he was too weak and useless to do anything about it!

Finally the feet lifted up, this time for good as Carl was allowed to get to his feet.

"I hope you've got your strength back now Carl," Sarah grinned at him.

"Yes, th-thanks, Sarah," Carl could barely look her in her piercingly beautiful grey eyes, after being treated so dismissively as a foot rug.

"OK, Carl. You can go now." Sarah flipped sideways on her bed so her head was back in the traditional position, her legs curled seductively and feet just dangling over the side of her bed. She looked absolutely content and pleased with herself.

Just as Carl staggered to his feet and was walking towards the door she called at him.

"Get my homework done quickly - it's pretty late now. You're gonna need some energy for when you massage my feet again tomorrow. Let's see if you'll be able to handle them next time!" Sarah was enjoying her complete control of him: from this pathetic nerd she had her college work taken care of, his money for the holiday, a devoted laundry service, and now a hopeless, unquestioning foot bitch!

"OK, Carl?" Sarah stared confidently and expectantly at him...

111121112221221112122211.content:
What could he do? After suffering so meekly on the floor at Sarah's feet, he had firmly cemented his position as being completely inferior to her. He was utterly unable to refuse her.

"Yeah," Carl mumbled. He wished that he had the balls to tell her that he was hopelessly in love with her. The various demeaning tasks that he had performed for made it seem impossible to say something so direct and bold.

"OK," She grinned. "Off you go then!"

Being dismissed, Carl headed back to his room. Looking at his watch he realised it was well into the evening. Opening up his bag to retrieve Sarah's project papers, he began to work away, struggling to maintain much concentration due to his physical and mental tiredness. As he read over his notes and research for Sarah's American History studies, he closed his eyes for a moment. When he did, he pictured Sarah's angelic face, smiling at him. The smile turned into a smirk, as her feet descended upon him, crushing him and causing him to fall on to the ground in pain...

Carl woke up. He had fallen asleep, and onto the floor! Wincing, he hoisted himself back up and focused again on the task. Glancing at the time he couldn't believe it. It was three in the morning! Groaning a little, Carl yearned desperately for his soft, comforting bed, but he knew he had to complete Sarah's project first. It was due tomorrow!

An hour later, he packed up. Not even bothering to attempt his own work (he could catch that up he reasoned), Carl collapsed into his own bed and immediately sank into a deep sleep.

Waking with a start, Carl groggily turned off his alarm. He knew he had to make it to his class - not only to pass the History project on to Sarah, but because he was the kind of guy who never missed a class in his life! Carl almost sleepwalked through his day, keen to finish his final afternoon class quickly, so that he could get some much-needed catch up sleep!

Then he remembered: Sarah! He had agreed and promised to massage her feet again. He almost whimpered at the thought; he was so ridiculously tired he had no chance to complete any sort of physical task for her. As he made his way over to her dormitory, Carl felt nervous. He couldn't afford to collapse to the floor like a weakling again!

As he reached her door, she opened it before he could even knock!

"There you are!" She grinned. "You took a little while to get to me. I hope you're not so worn out this time!" Cocking her head to the side, she pouted her lips at him, which he suspected was in mock sympathy. He gazed admiringly at her beauty. She was wearing a tight red top and pale blue jeans. Her toenails were painted a pale blue.

"I'm fine," He muttered.

"Great!" Sarah slinked over to her bed and hovered her pretty but powerfully scented feet over the edge. "Right, let's go, you little foot master."

Blushing with embarrassment, Carl knelt down at the end of her bed, preparing to receive the rank odour to waft up his nose anytime soon. Her feet complied and were thrust into his hands, so that he could get to work. Desperately trying not to choke and splutter from the smell, Carl just managed to maintain a steady face.

It was only around ten minutes in that the lack of sleep was taking Carl over. His arms weren't aching as much as yesterday, but his general physical exhaustion was already too much.

Sarah noticed this and raised an eyebrow at him. "You're not worn out already are you? If this is too much, just lie down on the floor again and I'll put my feet in your face. Let's be honest, Carl, you've probably got more chance at pleasing me that way anyhow!"

Carl winced at how dismissively she was talking to him, but deep down knew she was right. But to give up and surrender after just ten minutes would mean another new low for his manliness. Either way, a combination of his tiredness and his weakness for her was taking him over...

Laura stared daggers into Carl as she walked over to the nearby couch. She then crossed her beautiful black polished feet on their coffee table and flipped through channels.

"Sorry about that Carl. I'm also sorry about Laura's attitude, don't take it personally she's actually quite nice when you get to know her but I guess you'll need to take my word for it. Drop that spoiled girls bag by the door on the way out."

"Y-yeah, it was no problem r-really. Sara... thank you for kind--"

"I'm sorry to cut you off Carl but it's getting kind of late and I really don't want to keep you wasting your time here, not to mention you have a lot of homework to finish." Sara said as she gently pushed Carl towards the dorms door.

"Thank you again, Sweetie" Sara said with a kiss to Carl's forehead.

"N-no problem S--" The dorms door closed in Carl's face cutting him off.

Sara walked over to the couch to sit with her friend kicking her feet up onto the coffee table with Laura's.

Laura gave Sara a look of disgust "...Sweetie? Really?"

"Yeeeah, he really likes it when I call him that." Giggled Sara.
11112111222122122211.title: Sarah isn't impressed with Laura!

choices: "S-Sure Sarah..."
"I-I can't..."
111121112221221222111.content:
After his uncomfortable encounter with Sarah's friend, Carl headed home to wrap his mind around what happened. He... was... Sarah's... friend? Carl had questioned what his relationship was with Sarah and he had gotten his answer. Of course he would prefer to be more than friends but... baby steps. Carl actually felt bad for causing drama between friends even if Laura was horrible to him, he didn't ever want Sarah to lose a friend or feel down. Sarah should always have a beautiful smile on her face and Carl would do anything to make sure she keeps that smile... so what happened next was going to be a problem.

It has been 3 days since Carl last seen Sarah. He was really beginning to miss her and worry if she was doing okay. Was the argument worse than it seemed? A couple knocks on Carl's dorm door and Carl's worry was gone, just like that. It was Sarah, gone was the smile Carl wanted to protect. Something was clearly wrong.

"H-Hello Sarah... is something wrong?" Sarah's hair was a little more messy than usual. The normal person wouldn't notice but Carl did.

Sarah sniffled "I-It's Laura, Carl. She's not talking to me... after."

"After, I told you about the homework thing?"

"Y-Yeah... I knew she was a hothead but I didn't think she'd bully you like that. S-She's been going through I lot since..."

"I'm sorry you had to go through that Sarah... Is there anything I can do."

"Listen Carl, I know how you must feel about her but she isn't herself. She hasn't been herself for a while. I've been there for her but the homework thing is what broke the camels back you know? So... Can you do Laura's homework... for me?" Sarah asked Carl, complete with watery eyes.

Carl didn't know Laura anywhere near as well as Sarah. Maybe he could of handled this whole situation better. Maybe he shouldn't have put Sarah on the spot in her own room. Carl didn't want the love of his life to lose her best friend.

Carl hated seeing her cry but... It's Laura's fault isn't it?
Does Carl's love for Sarah outweigh his hate for Laura's disrespectful ways?
111121112221221222111.title: Sara asks Carl to do Laura's homework

choices: Carl agrees and comes into Sarah's dorm
Carl refuses and flees!
11112111222122122212.content:
Carl looked hopefully at Sarah, waiting for the blonde goddess to sort it all out and put Laura in her place.

She levelled her eyes directly at him. "I can't believe you, Carl."

"Wh-what?" His heart was in his mouth as he stammered at her in dismay.

"I thought you had learned your lesson at defying your superiors. Kissing my feet totally proved that, right?" She cocked her head as she stared at him patronisingly.

He flushed red with embarrassment. He couldn't believe she was saying this in front of Laura! This only increased when he saw the smug expression on her friend's face.

"You should be grateful Laura's giving you her homework. After you kissed my feet, I thought it was clear that you knew your place. You do what I say. What we say." She chuckled slightly, as if it was ridiculous that Carl could even consider not showing the two cheerleaders gratitude.

"Y-you said to L-Laura that I would d-do h-her homework..." Carl managed to splutter out.

"Well done genius!" Laura giggled. "I thought you were supposed to be smart! That took you like forever to figure out!"

Carl couldn't believe it; the girl of his dreams was pimping him out for homework!

"I've gotta say, Carl, I'm really disappointed." Sarah frowned as she shook her head at him. "After you disobeyed me before, I really did think that you had learned..."

"Sorry!" He found himself whining a little at her. She really had such as strong hold over him.

"Sorry's not good enough, Carl. The only way I can see us dealing with this is if you come inside and do exactly what we say..."

Carl gulped. He felt compelled to agree with her, but surely this would mean more embarrassment and extra homework for him...
11112111222122122212.title: Sarah's disappointment

choices: He kisses her feet!
He ignores her and keeps kissing Sarah's feet!
111121112221221222121.content:
Carl felt completely powerless. Looking at the confident and expectant expression on both girls' faces, most significantly Sarah's, he knew that he simply could not refuse.

"Okay," he said meekly as Sarah let him in. Laura shot him a smug grin as she took the bag from him, rather effortlessly. This only made him feel even weaker.

"Good boy," Sarah said calmly and confidently at Carl while he stared at the floor, not having the nerve to even look her in the eye. "Now, bow down before us. Quickly," she added, with a slightly dangerous hint to her voice.

Carl knew that he could not refuse the blonde goddess, so he instantly dropped to his knees as he gulped up at both cheerleaders. Laura looked almost giddy with excitement as she smirked at the rather pathetic young man. Sarah looked satisfied, almost as though she had just taught a puppy (who she was not even that fond of) a trick, that had then been able to perform it successfully for her.

"Now, beg for forgiveness." Sarah had a commanding tone of voice and an utterly superior look on her face as she stared down at him.

He found himself doing so straight away. "P-please forgive me! I'm s-sorry...I sh-should have d-done Laura's homework s-straight away. P-please forgive me!" He whined up at the girls completely pathetically.

Laura snorted with laughter while Sarah managed to bite her lip and compose herself in front of her pathetic little homework buddy. She had made him kneel before her once already; doing it in front of her best friend did give her an undeniable rush of power.

"Now kiss our feet. If you wanna prove that you deserve my company then your kisses will prove it." Sarah looked utterly dominant as her bare feet arched up slightly in front of him.

"Oh my God - he is so pathetic!" Laura said gleefully as both girls watched Carl place his trembling lips meekly against the top of one of Sarah's bare feet.

What could he do? He was far too besotted and in awe of Sarah to even consider refusing her. At this point he would do pretty much anything she told him! He had kissed her feet earlier anyway; it wasn't actually that unpleasant, even though a pretty rank aroma was swirling around his nostrils. What was worse was the fact that Laura was watching and revelling in his humiliation.

"Now kiss my feet, you worm," Laura stated rather arrogantly after Carl had placed a few soft kisses against Sarah's long foot.

Carl hesitated. Was he going to accept Laura speaking to him like this...?
111121112221221222121.title: Making it up to Sarah and Laura

choices: The girls make him lick their feet!
They beat him up as a punishment for crying!
Sarah takes pity on him and lets him go!
1111211122212212221212.content:
Despite her dismissive words and the expectant expression on her face, Carl felt as though he had no obligation to do anything that this girl told him. It was completely different to Sarah; it was as if the contrast between how he saw these two women became more stark the longer he was in their company. Choosing to ignore Laura completely, Carl continued to place gentle kisses on the top of Sarah's bare foot.

"Uh...what the fuck? I said kiss my feet already, worm!" Laura laughed nastily, but Carl could detect a notable trace of displeasure in her voice.

It was a risk, but he sincerely believed that as long as he followed Sarah's instructions, to the tee, then he would be ok. How wrong he was...

A foul, cheddary stench enveloped his nose as one of Laura's smelly soles was pushed firmly against his face. Recoiling instantly, Carl spluttered and gagged, which only seemed to incense her.

"Kiss my foot, now!" She definitely sounded angry now as she forced her foot further forward so that Carl let out a small groan in pain, causing his neck to snap back a little.

Sarah looked down with a cold expression on her face. "Just when I thought you had learned...you really manage to disappoint me don't you Carl?"

Carl couldn't even respond with Laura's bare foot covering his face. He mumbled an apology into the stinky sole, which did not make one iota of difference to his situation. In fact, a new wave of cheesiness was thrust upon him as Sarah's long, powerful sole was pushed alongside her friend's, forcing Carl firmly onto his back within seconds. Crumbling to the floor rather pathetically, Carl whimpered a little into the two bare feet that were covering his face. He prayed the interminable stench would stop! At this point how the distance between how he viewed the two women began to narrow.

"Kiss my foot," Laura ordered him, this time more steadily.

Realising that he had to obey Laura to even begin appeasing Sarah, he complied, difficult as that was with the two smelly soles in his face. He forced his lips upwards so he could taste the sweat dripping off Laura's foot, which was admittedly pretty. Still, the yellowish tint to the skin only made the aroma and taste of it all the more unpleasant. The saltiness from her sweat and skin dominated his taste buds and made him groan a little with this overwhelming sensation.

"So you've accepted your place? You'll do anything and everything that we tell you?" Sarah asked him as she spread her long toes over his eyes and against his cheeks.

"Ymmmffess...." Was the sound he made in affirmation. This caused both cheerleaders to giggle gently.

"Tell us how much of an honour this is for a pathetic loser like you," Sarah said malevolently, an evil grin plastered all over her face.

Carl wasn't sure if it was because he had degraded himself in kissing Laura's feet, or the fact that Sarah had basically told him to obey her friend. Either way, he felt genuinely inferior to her as he lifted his mouth from her sole, his bottom lip sticking against it slightly.

"Th-thank you, Laura. I-I am s-so grateful..." He whined as hot tears began springing in his eyes.

"Are you crying?" Sarah asked him as she bounced her long sole against where his tears were dripping down.

"N-no..." He began, but it was too late.

"What a loser! Man you are soooo pathetic! You're lucky that this is the most contact with a woman you're ever going to get! Crying under a couple of girls' feet?! This is amazing!" Laura laughed derisively as she pushed her bare foot firmly into Carl's face, squashing him into the carpet, which he dearly wished would swallow him up right now...
1111211122212212221212.title: Ignoring Laura at his peril...

choices: Carl licks feet adequately enough for now.
Carl doesn't do a good job and Laura punishes him.
11112111222122122212121.content:
"I don't think kissing our feet is enough you dumb cry baby." Laura sneered, her foot still pressing against Carl's face. "Open your mouth and lick 'em. Lick my feet clean loser." She demanded.

Carl had learned his lesson at this point. Sarah expected him to obey Laura just like he obeyed her. He opened his mouth and stuck out his tongue, pressing it against the foot pressed against his face. Laura's cold eyes flashed with triumph as she felt the nerd's tongue caress her foot. She smirked as she felt it recoil from the taste.

"Awww what'st he matter you don't like my sweaty feet?"

Carl didn't know what to say and Laura removed her foot. Sarah glared down at him. "Answer her question Carl." She told him in a firm tone.

"I... uh... p-p-please I d-d-don't like f-f-feet."

Laura laughed. "Of course you don't but you are still going to lick them aren't you?"

"Y-y-yes." Carl replied dejectedly.

Laura shoved her feet back into the nerd's face and felt the tongue begin to lick her soles. For Carl this was awful. Her feet were sweaty. She was a cheerleader after all and she probably had gone to practice today. The smell was pretty bad, and the salty slightly cheddar like taste was a potent combination. He wouldn't even want to lick Sarah's feet but at least if it had been hers it would have been better than this. He felt nothing for Laura and hated that she was doing this to him.

Sarah called out form above him. "Do a good job Carl and make it quick. My feet are next!"

"Yeah you better do a good job or you'll regret it!" Laura threatened.
11112111222122122212121.title: The girls make him lick their feet!

choices: She is going to trample Carl.
She is going to suffocate him.
Reader's Choice
111121112221221222121212.content:
Carl tried to do a good job but the salty taste of feet made him cringe away from Laura's body. He gamely continued but the frequent stops and hesitations made the experience less than ideal for Laura.

"You are fucking pathetic, you can't even lick feet properly! What kind of loser dweeb can't even lick feet?" Laura berated him.

"I... I-I'm s-s-s-sorry," a very frightened Carl tried to apologize.

"Sorry isn't good enough loser. I think you need some proper motivation, when you fail to please us you are going to suffer."

Carl squeaked in fright, the evil girl was going to hurt him, he just knew it! The only question was, how was Laura going to punish Carl?
111121112221221222121212.title: Carl doesn't do a good job and Laura punish...

choices: Sarah's turn...
Reader's Choice
1111211122212212221212122.content:
"Stay still, you fucking loser."

Smack Smack

Laura painfully planted her left foot then right foot onto Carl's face. The shock of this pain started from the bridge of his nose down to his toes. Carl reacted by rocking his body under Laura. Laura easily overpowered him and kept her feet on Carl's face.

"Did you not hear me you pathetic excuse of a human being? Are you slow? Are you that stupid? Here, I'll give you another warning."

Stomp

This time Laura raised both feet into the air and stomped down even harder than the first time. Carl struggled not to move too much this time but it was difficult. Carl of course flinched a little bit, it wouldn't be possible not to. He feared if he did then he'd leave with a broken nose or at the very least a split lip. He sucked up the pain hoping he was still enough for Laura.

"That more like it, worm. You're learning. Every time you disappoint me or Sarah this is what will happen. Do a shitty job, this is what happens. You will end up a whimpering mess under my feet. Do you get it?" Laura looked down waiting for Carl's answer.

"Y-Yes, Laura please! I'm sorry, I-It was my first time. I-I'll try to do better, please just stop the stomping!" Carl pleaded, some of his words mumbled under her feet. His tears were really flowing now, not because of the humiliation but because it felt like his nose was swelling like a tiny balloon.

"You know what I was thinking? If you licked up Sarah's feet you would've done much better. I'm still not convinced that you've learned your lesson yet... but you will after I'm done with you. Afterwards you're going to thank me for not trampling your face into the fucking ground."

"Laura please t-that's no---" Laura placed her feet over Carl's mouth before he finished his sentence.

Laura kept her heels over Carl's mouth shutting it while her toes played with his face. While mushing his face with her feet Laura had a playful smile on her face. Carl could see short glances of Laura when her toes weren't covering his eyes.

"Hey Sarah, toss me my cheeleader socks will ya?"

"Sure thing. I'm going to assume the fresh ones..." Sarah hopped up and quickly picked up Laura's sweaty socks enjoying what she was seeing.

"Man, Carl might prefer to taste your feet after putting these disgusting things in his mouth. Sucks to be him, I smell these babies in the locker room, I can only imagine the taste. Can't say I didn't warn you Carl." Sarah handed over Laura's socks over, already knew what Laura was going to do with them.

Laura dangling her socks over Carl's face. The sweat dripping onto his face. "That's the idea. Say aah loser."

Carl opened up his mouth and Laura squeezed both socks into his mouth. The rough and dry texture of the sock mixed with her wet sweat made for a miserable combination.

"Yummy. You're not going to whine about the smell of my toes after this, I can promise you that much." Laura warned Carl. Carl tried speaking up with more apologies but the socks blocked his attempts.

Laura closed Carl's nose shut between her toes. Carl was getting no oxygen as he panicked beneath Laura. Above Carl was Laura with a cold empty stare as she watched Carl struggle.

Laura held her toes together for about 20 seconds before spreading her toes again. Carl breathed in and out quickly taking in every bit of the air through her toes not minding the smell. Right now the smell wasn't an issue at all, the lack of air scared Carl more than everything else. His lungs were in pain.

"We gave your pathetic scrawny ass a chance. You choose the hard way, remember that... and remember this." Again, Laura forced Carl's nose shut. This continued for about 10 minutes. Laura playing with Carl's air supply, taking it and giving it.

"I could do this all day. I don't mind. I like punishing losers who don't know their place. I could keep your nose shut until you pass out beneath my feet and never release you from my little toehold here. That would honestly be the perfect end for you, dying under someone like me. The last thing you'd smell would be my feet. No one would miss you..." Laura berated Carl, looking directly into his eyes while his body begged for oxygen.

It seemed like 2 minutes since Laura shut his nose and she wasn't releasing. The look in Laura's eyes told him exactly how she felt about him. Carl was scared. Carl was scared because... what if she'd actually kill him? All because he didn't lick her feet properly? His body started to shake under Laura as his eyes were starting to shutter.

"Now I think you understand your position, don't you?" Carl slowly nodded his head in an attempt to answer physically.

Finally Laura let Carl breathe, with the release of her toehold Carl's eyes went wide open as his nose took his deepest breath yet. It might have been an exaggeration but Carl felt like he just escaped deaths grasp. This was what Laura's warning alluded to.

"Get up, on your knees loser." With the command, Carl quickly ordered. After what he just went through he wasn't going to hesitate.

Laura yanked out her socks "Now let's see if my experiment worked."

Laura leaned her right foot towards Carl. Carl licked and licked her pale foot making sure he wouldn't dare disappoint again. Carl made sure to get under her foot, above her foot, and between her toes as many times as he could, only going to stop when Laura told him he could.

"Alright that's enough. There's the motivation." Laura said with a snirk.

Carl feared he was going to have nightmares tonight...

"Laura, you're the hottest teacher I've ever seen. All right Carl, I'll have some of what you gave her. Let me feel the love." Sarah gave her toes a cute little wiggle.
1111211122212212221212122.title: She is going to suffocate him.

choices: Sarah - she isn't happy!
Sarah with her friend - Laura. They are not impressed!
111121112221222.content:
The idea of literally getting down on all fours sent some sort of resistance into Carl's spine. He had given in to this ridiculously hot girl: what with the homework, money, laundry...but those things didn't necessitate him crawling over to her and kissing her feet like an absolute bitch!

Still in awe of her beauty, Carl wasn't quite able to verbalise himself. Several times he cleared his throat, but he was too afraid of sounding ridiculous to her.

"Well?" Sarah was getting impatient. "Why aren't you kissing my foot already?" The smile on her stunningly gorgeous face had begun to fade a little.

Carl knew that he had to say something. "N-no thanks, Sarah." With that, like a coward, he turned away from her and hurried quickly back to his room, leaving the beautiful Sarah standing her, a little bewildered that her little dork hadn't succumbed to her.

Back in his room, Carl blew a sigh of relief. He had stood up to her! Well, he had pretty much run away, but it still counted as a refusal! Deciding to himself that he would focus on some of his own work for a change (he had admittedly been putting in more effort to Sarah's homework and projects lately), Carl sat at his desk, set to tackle a series of mathematical equations.

Several hours later, his thoughts were interrupted suddenly by a knock at the door. He felt a sense of fear and dread sink into him; what if it were Sarah? What if she were still angry with him? The knock repeated again, a little more sharply this time. Praying that it would just stop and go away, Carl's eyes widened with shock as the door began to slowly creak open. What an idiot - he had forgotten to lock it! Entering the room, he could see...
111121112221222.title: Carl refuses!

choices: In for a penny in for a pound... he refuses to kneel down!
Carl is scared and he is a wimp, he kneels down and obeys.
1111211122212222.content:
Sure enough it was the object of his dreams and her dark haired friend Laura. Carl suppressed a whimper at the intrusion, they looked very stern. Laura closed the door behind her and Sarah marched up to Carl's chair.

Her gray eyes held Carl's firmly. "One chance Carl. You have one chance to make it up to me."

Carl stuttered, "W-what d-do you mean?"

Laura stalked up next to her friends a cruel look glistening in her eye.

"She means you have once chance to get down on your scrawny fucking knees and beg for forgiveness."

At this point Carl was rather intimidated. While he absolutely loved and adored Sarah he was fairly frightened of her friend. And the way Sarah had her arms crossed across her impressive bosom was a sign she was angry enough to let Laura do whatever she wanted.

But what were they going to do? Surely they wouldn't assault him. Would Sarah not repay the money he lent her? What exactly where they going to do if he didn't acquiesce to their demands. A better question was did he really want to find out?
1111211122212222.title: Sarah with her friend - Laura. They are not imp...

choices: Carl forces himself to get up and tries to stop them!
Carl is too weak: he stays on his back and does nothing!
Carl suddenly grabs Sarah's foot and starts kissing it!
11112111222122221.content:
Having resisted Sarah once already, Carl reasoned that he might as well continue to at least try standing up to her.

"N-no," he babbled at the pair of cheerleaders. "I w-won't..."

He was cut off by one of Laura's sneakers shooting up swiftly into his gut. "Wrong answer, you fucking loser!"

Gasping, Carl stumbled and dropped to the ground. He stared up at the two girls, both of which had smirks clearly planted on their faces.

"I knew you would get on your knees. Only now we're gonna make you pay, wimp!" Sarah sounded pretty self-righteous as she too decided to extend out her sneakered foot, though she only used it swipe softly against the side of Carl's head.

Still wincing from Laura's ruthless kick, Carl tried to catch his breath. "P-please," he began. "Don't h-hurt me..."

"And now you're begging," Laura chuckled nastily. She had such a smug, confident expression on her face. Rather than infuriate him however, all it did was make him feel inferior to her.

Sarah suddenly kicked off her sneakers; Carl was surprised to see she had no socks on. Laura followed suit, revealing her bare feet as her friend had just done. Immediately, a rank, sour aroma began swirling towards him. Despite the smell, he couldn't help but feel hopelessly attracted to the gorgeous blonde cheerleader. Although Laura wasn't as naturally beautiful as her friend, she was still rather attractive.

"You owe me," Sarah told him firmly. "Back in my room, when you were so...rude to me." Her grey eyes flashed dangerously at him. "I told you to kiss my foot. You didn't. And now you're gonna pay..."

All Carl could do was watch helplessly as the long, powerful foot of the girl he was besotted with stretched forward and pushed firmly into his face. Her sweaty toes cascaded against his forehead while the heel knocked against his jaw. Such was her strength compared to him, he immediately crumbled to the ground with a whimper, and lay flat on his back.

Both girls laughed derisively while they circled him. Carl felt pathetic and groggy in equal measures. Was he really going to let a couple of girls dominate him like this...?
11112111222122221.title: In for a penny in for a pound...

choices: Carl is to become the cheerleaders' official foot slave!
Carl gets to become Sarah's boyfriend?!
Carl is forced to quit his course and be Sarah's bitch!
111121112221222212.content:
The moment Sarah's long sole forced him to the ground, Carl surrendered in his heart and mind. Even Laura, who he had felt mostly fear for up until now, seemed so superior to him that he knew any form of resistance was futile.

"Now, kiss my foot wimp!" Sarah ordered him firmly, her sole resting against his face.

"Okay..." Was the extent of his muffled response. Carl placed his trembling lips up at the foot that was obscuring his vision and still sending a musky, bitter scent all around his nostrils.

Both girls let out delighted giggles while Carl kissed away at the sole, which was if anything slightly longer than his face. It didn't really matter to Carl - these girls were better than him. He couldn't deny it; it seemed that his place was to serve and obey them.

"That's more like it," Sarah said with an arrogant tone to her voice. "You see, if you had just done this back in my room, maybe I would like, let you be my boyfriend...." Carl let out a small whine at this; was she serious? Maybe if he did a good job at kissing her long sole, she would still give him a shot.

He checked himself. Carl was a smart guy. Of course she wasn't going to consider him boyfriend material! Still a nagging doubt stayed there, making him feel even more submissive to her than ever.

A foul stench erupted upon him as Sarah's foot slid away and was replaced with Laura's. This was nowhere near as long, but far stinkier and more unpleasant than the blonde's foot.

"Kiss it bitch!" He could see the smirk on Laura's face, which only seemed like confirmation of how worthless he truly was. Submitting meekly, he kissed all over Laura's rank foot, just barely refraining from gagging and spluttering from the smell.

The girls grinned and high-fiver each other, clearly pleased with their work.

"You know what, Laura?" Sarah enquired her friend, who still had had her sole planted over Carl's face.

"What's that?" The brunette replied, her toes scrunching into Carl's face, causing him to moan.

Still placing kisses on the stinky bare sole, Carl listened to hear what his conqueror's had in store for him...
111121112221222212.title: Take the feet!

choices: Carl refuses - who wants to be a "foot slave"!
Carl is broke and cannot deny them: he accepts!
1111211122212222121.content:
"We should totally make him our college cheerleader squad's slave!" Sarah said excitedly, her long toes prodding and poking Carl in the ribs.

Laura let out a loud guffaw. "No...really?" She breathed heavily, wiping away several tears of laughter from her eyes. "I mean, I know he's pathetic and all - that's obvious! But to spend time around the other girls with him? Nah...I can't see it."

Sarah seemed to pout a little as she fanned her toes over Carl's side. Carl felt utterly helpless; the stink from Laura's smell foot was still dominating his senses, and not in a good way. It took all of his will power not to wretch!

"I mean, no offence. But can you really see the others wanting to spend time with...him?" Laura pushed her sole firmly against his mouth, forcing him to release a muffled moan.

Carl couldn't see her, but he sensed that Sarah was getting more animated, as if to convince her friend. "No, no! He doesn't have to, like spend time with us. He could just do what we say. Like we're doing now - smell our feet!"

"So you mean he could be our "foot slave" - is that what you're saying?" Laura wiggled her toes around a little.

"Yes - exactly," Sarah replied, almost in triumph. "We could make him smell our feet after practise! He could even lick our feet clean if we wanted!"

Carl could not control himself; his whole body trembled as he gagged and spluttered against the brunette's sole, with the horrible thought of actually tasting smelly feet on his mind!

Laura seemed to be considering this. "You know what - I love it! He could meet us here after training. Or...or he could meet us in the girls' changing room! We could sneak him in, hide somewhere, and when we're done, be ready to serve our feet!" There was a delirious, almost gloating quality to Laura's voice as she expressed her excitement.

Sarah squealed while she placed one bare sole firmly onto Carl's chest while giving her friend a high five. Carl could almost feel his pectoral muscles collapsing under the pressure of her powerful foot.

"Hang on, we haven't asked our little friend here yet," Sarah said with a smirk. Both feet were removed from him, allowing him to suck in some fresh air at last. "What do you say, Carl?" He gulped while staring up into Sarah's beautiful grey eyes...
1111211122212222121.title: Carl is to become the cheerleaders' officia...

choices: Carl surrenders and sucks her toes
He doesn't suck her toes - instead he manages to bite on them!
11112111222122221211.content:
A rather strange sensation swirled around in Carl's belly. Although he had surrendered to them only mere minutes ago, the idea of being a slave, to that many smelly feet caused his fighting instincts to come out.

"N-no!" He muttered quietly up at the pair.

"What's that?" Laura said with a smirk on her face. "I didn't think foot slaves knew how to say no!"

Sarah stared down at Carl, her grey eyes bearing into him. Brushing away her blonde hair to the side her face became one of contempt. "I heard you. We've been here before. You can't deny me - you know it and I know it. You have to do everything I say from now on. And if you think about saying 'no' one more time, then you will face the consequences. Let me put it this way: you will be the cheerleader squad's foot slave, whether you want to or not! So, is there anything you want to say to me, slave?"

Carl gulped. He had tried defying Sarah before. Twice. And neither time it had gotten him anywhere. The longer he looked up at Sarah's gorgeous, confident face, the more inferior he felt. However, if he accepted being a slave this meekly, these girls would never take him seriously...

"I'm not a slave," he said, quietly but firmly this time.

Sarah shook her head in disappointment. "Wrong, loser. You are a slave, you just haven't accepted it yet. We can help with that..."

With tremendous force, her long, approximately size 10 sole pushed firmly into his chest, in a victory-like pose while he gulped and spluttered for air.

"Try to move, if you can, worm." Sarah said dismissively.

Much as he tried to wriggle or use his arms to remove her foot, he simply couldn't. She was too strong for him.
