"Amy get over here." Erica demanded and the petite lesbian girl quickly got into the ring.

"Take off my socks and hold them in your mouth for me."

"But I thought if I got her to agree..." *SLAP* Erica's hand whipped out and smashed into Amy's face.

"Bitch you thought I would forgive you so easily? You still tried to betray me earlier, now hop to it."

Amy quickly obeyed and stuffed Erica's now lightly sweaty socks (they weren't more sweaty since it was so easy to beat Heather). Her tiny cheeks bulged like a chipmunk much to everyone's bratty laughter.

"As for you," Erica looked down at Heather, "time for you to worship my feet as my new slave, get to it!"

Heather obeyed, what choice did she have? She opened her mouth and accepted Erica's damp feet. She licked the soles, kissed her toes and worshiped like the lowly slave she was. All thoughts of future fighting dreams were gone, all hope of joining the Olympics or a real job were gone. She was nothing but Erica's slave.

"Hehe, good job slave."

"T-thank you Mistress." Heather meekly replied.

"Now you get to serve all of my guests here... if you fuck up even once they have a right to hit you several times, so don't screw up!"

The crowd once against cheered and Heather knew she was in for a very, very long night and an even longer terrible future as Erica's total slave!
115121111111123.title: Something Else / Reader's Choice

choices: Heather tires to flee from town... but fails!
Heather comes up with a plan to attack Erica.
Heather is a docile slave, she has been broken.
1151211111111232.content:
Heather had just been utterly humiliated and destroyed by Erica. She was now her complete slave and had serviced the feet of her new Master in front of a crowd. And after those harrowing events Erica had told Heather that she had to provide foot service to the entire crowd as well! And if she didn't please them perfectly they got to hit her a few times before sending her over to the next girl!

What a nightmare!

As a slave Heather had no choice. She crawled over to the first girl, a cheerleader who had clearly been practicing recently. Her white sneakers had grass stains on them.

"Lick the grass stains up and then take off my shoes. Be quick there's a ton of people who want to use you!"

"Yes ma'am." Heather replied respectfully, looking up at the brunette cheerleader who had given her the command. Her tongue snaked out and began to lap up the greenish tint on her shoes. She had to work quickly for fear of facing additional pain. The problem was that grass stains were hard to get out and after several minutes where the crowd grew a little restless the cheerleader sighed.

"Useless, I want my feet taken care of and this is taking too long. Lay on your back, I'm going to stomp your useless face in a few times, then you can worship my bare feet properly."

Heather wanted to protest or object, she had tried her best! But refusing this order meant refusing Erica's order and she could never do that gain. With great trepidation she rolled onto her back and let herself get stomped by those grass stained shoes.

*SLAM* The shoe stomped down hard on her face, her eyes immediately began to water thanks to the crushing impact on her nose. The next strike struck her on the cheek and the final one on her forehead. Her face and head now throbbed with pain but fortunately the stomps hadn't been full force because the cheerleader didn't want the crowd mad at their foot slave being knocked unconscious! But they hadn't been soft blows either.

"Quit crying bitch and get my shoes off so you can lick my feet!"

Heather obeyed and quickly got her shoes off, peeled the sticky sweaty socks off and then pushed her tongue on the soles of her fellow student's feet. The smell of moldy cheese filled her nostrils as she licked up the salty sweat the coated the coed's foot. She made good time and suffered no further punished... but someone else was next!

This woman was in her 30s and was the older sister of another student. She was wearing business attire with black pantyhose and high heels.

"Remove my shoes, kissed each toe and then massage. I don't want your tongue on my pantyhose, you'd probably ruin them with your slobber."

The haughty tone the woman had made Heather feel lower than dirt. She quickly got started on the task and kissed her toes and then removed her heels with all haste. Her thumbs pressed against the soles of the business woman's feet and the pressure helped push out the smell causing her to cough.

"Don't cough on my feet little slave girl." After that command Heather was very careful and gave the best massage that she could. Fortunately it was good enough to avoid any punishment and she went on to the next girl.

The next one was a black girl with large broad feet.

"You don't need to lick 'em but I want you to put your nose in between my toes and inhale super hard. Fill your lungs with my toe stink, then I'm going to clamp your nose with my toes and you better hold your breath for a full minute. If you don't I'm going to jump up and down on your ribs and I bet I could break one."

The girl was large and Heather believed her, especially after the damage she had already taken!

The slave wedged her nose in between two of the dark toes and then inhaled as hard as she could. The nasty foot funk got into her lungs and she wanted to cough but she knew that would be disastrous. Instead she forced her mouth to stay closed as the black toes squeezed her nostrils shut.

With only nasty air in her lungs Heather had to resist the urge to exhale. She looked up with pleading eyes and the black girl just laughed and took an exaggerated inhalation.

"Isn't breathing wonderful?"

Heather moaned and closed her eyes, doing her best to try to focus on not breathing out. She tried to mediate like she did when she worked out. Focusing on nothing and just letting time pass. Unfortunately another person decided to lightly tickle her rib cage with their toes causing an involuntary spasm of laughter which caused her to exhale!

"No-no please that wan't fair, don't jump no me!" Heather begged with pure panic in her voice.

"Fuck off bitch, I told you what would happen!"

Heather trembled in fear but as scared as she was about being jumped up and down on by a heavy set woman she feared disobeying Erica even more. The woman stepped up onto her stomach and chest and smiled down with a wicked grin.

And then she jumped! Heather flinched in fear as over 180 pounds crashed down on her torso. The air was smashed from her lungs and and terrible pain shot up form her rib cage. Again the woman jumped and again a crescendo of pain. She gasped and for a third and final time the woman jumped and landed on Heather's battered body.

After the abuse she gingerly felt her rib and while it was tender to the touch it didn't seem broken... but the night was still young!

The next woman was nerdy petite girl who made her lick her feet clean. After that was another cheerleader who wanted her toes sucked. And then an extreme overweight redhead who just want to pinch her nipples with her toes. And then... so many women. There were some similar requests but due to size, smell, cleanness they were all different.

Heather had to serve them all. She was at it for hours. She was stepped up, jumped on, foot slapped, slapped regularly, taunted, spit on, and more. Her hair was pulled, her tits were kicked and her tongue was used to clean dirty feet, sweaty feet, boots, socks, and hose.

Finally after 7 hours of pure hell the last person had been serviced. When she realized that she was done and had been left alone she curled into a ball and began to sob. This was going to be her life from now on. She was the team whore and foot bitch for Erica. Was this type of mass worship going to be a regular task from now on? There was no way she could endure that kind of abuse.

But what choice did she have? Everyone there would vouch for Erica and not her. The school, the police no one could help her. But there was always a choice. She could still try to fight back... somehow. Or maybe she should try to run. Start a life somewhere else. Maybe she could escape. It wasn't like she was chained up. But of course if she failed, that would probably be her fate.

And then there was the overwhelming amount of terror that was Erica. The thought of doing something that would displease Erica, her Mistress, her Master sent her body into the shakes. What was she going to do?
1151211111111232.title: Heather does a good job but still gets beaten s...

choices: All the girls ambush poor Lisa.
Professor Laura Rich plays with her just by herself... for now.
Something else happens?
1152.content:
**Authors note - this was edited on 04/01/13 to include a new character - the new addition is in asterisks**

Lisa was 18. She was a bright young girl. However she was not pretty, or even very healthy. She had numerous medical ailments. Her eyes were bad and so she wore a thick pair of glasses. Her parents loved pig tails so that is what she wore. Her face seemed as cratered as the moon. She was allergic to practically everything. The greatest issue she had was her Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease. The slightest thing would set it off and she would go into a coughing fit, and her lungs would sometimes just seize up and shut down. Her parents actually had to move to the country to get away from the pollutants of the city.

They were very protective of Lisa. They knew that their child was very sick and had to be sheltered. However when she turned 18, she was determined to see the world. Normally she was a passive individual but this time she stood up to her parents and in her squeaky voice she said, “I want to go to college!” They came up with a hundred reasons on why she couldn’t go. But she countered them. She was bright and had read about a ton of things. “This college is not in the city, I’ll be safe from the pollutants and too much car exhaust. And the entire campus is smoke free!” Finally her parents relented. She had done her homework and clearly this was important to her.

Soon the excited young innocent 18 year old was headed off to become a college freshman. Arriving on the campus to her first class she was a sight to see. Big thick glasses, an old fashioned dress, and pig tails. As she walked by people had to suppress a snicker. She was lost in the sights and sounds and didn’t even notice this. The air was crisp and fresh. Birds were singing and the fall leaves were turning into a symphony of colors. Her joyous thoughts stopped as she was about to enter the building where her class was.

Outside the building stood three other students who were smoking. Smoking! Lisa immediately took several steps back. Even though she wasn’t near them yet she couldn’t take any chances. She watched them as they stood chatting and smoking. They were not supposed to be allowed to smoke on campus! She was determined to stand up to them once they finished their death sticks. As she watched she grew very self conscious. All of those girls were incredibly pretty.

The first girl had beautiful long blond hair and her eyes were shaded by her sunglasses. She had a tight tank top on that was stretched tight over her pert round breasts. She was slim and her skin seemed to have that flawless tanned glow. The next girl was shorter then her and of Asian descent. She was very thin but again very pretty. Her face had an angelic like quality. The last girl was taller then rest and this was accentuated more by the fact she wore high heels. She was a brunette and was incredibly voluptuous. It border lined on being slightly overweight but none would call her fat.

Mustering all the courage she had she went over to them once those cigarettes had been safely finished. In a mousy voice she said, “Excuse me.” They ignored her. A little louder she said, “Excuse me!” They turned to look at her and all three laughed. The one in sunglasses said, “Oh my God, you are the biggest dork I’ve ever seen here.” Her face turning red at the insult she stuttered out what she had been rehearsing to say, “Y-You c-c-c-can’t s-smoke out here. It’s, t-the r-r-rules.”

The girl in sunglasses whose name was Britney laughed in Lisa’s face. Jabbing a finger hard into her chest she said, “What makes you think you can tell me what to do?” The Asian girl whose name was Jasmine added, “Yeah what is your problem dork face.” All three girls crowded around poor Lisa who was very intimated by their words and their superior looks. She tried to explain, again stuttering uncontrollably, “I-I have a… a… r-r-respiratory problem I-I c-can’t t-take the s-smell.”

The third girl, the tall one in heels whose name is Ashley said, “Oh so now little miss ugly four eyes is saying we smell.” That wasn’t at all what Lisa was trying to say. She tried to correct her but as soon as she barely got out a, “I-I-I d-didn’t…” she was cut off by Britney who said, “Shut up you pig tailed pig, you get up in our faces again like this we’ll show a *real* bad smell you got that?” Lisa had no idea what she meant with that but being frightened she nodded her head and than ran up into the building. The girl’s laughter trailed after her.

The entire experience made her light headed and short of breath. Red in the face and having an anxiety attack she slumped into the woman’s restroom and sat on the toilet seat for the next fifteen minutes. Finally able to work her barely functioning lungs back to normal she headed off to class worried that she was late. Class was great for her. She was so excited to get the syllabus and to learn new things. However she knew she had to do something, her parents had always told her that no one could pick on you like that. If they ever did then she should seek out an authority figure! She decided to stay after class and tell the professor what had happened she would certainly set those girls straight!

Her professor was a middle aged woman named Laura Rich. She was quite stunning for the first day of class with her dress that clung to her body and her fancy heels. Despite her age several of the boys in class watched every curve of her body as she lectured. A little intimated but knowing she would help her out she stayed after and mustered up her courage again.

“Miss Rich c-can I speak with you?”

She looked up and said, “Of course do you have any questions on the course work?”

She shook her head no, and then in a rush told her of everything that occurred. How those three girls bullied her and were smoking in a no smoking zone. About her Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease and how cigarette smoke was incredibly dangerous to her health! She could even die! Little did she know that professor Laura Rich had come from the same sorority as those girls! Worse still was that she was a smoker herself. One incredibly pissed off smoker! She kept her thoughts private as she pretended to listen in mock sympathy.

Its people like you that have made it impossible for me to smoke at a bar or restaurant or in the university I’ve been at for half my life!

In her mind it was ridiculous that she couldn’t smoke where she wished. She was a professor for crying out loud! She made up her mind. She was going to take out her anger on this loser from nowhere. With the help of Britney, Ashley, and Jasmine they were going to make this non-smoker pay for all the hell people like her have put smokers through! A plan quickly formed in her mind.

“Lisa I could tell you were bothered during class! I am so sorry this occurred and rest assured I’ll talk to those girls.”

She looked at her watch.

“I must get to a meeting, but lets go over the course work, with you being distracted I think we need to go over it one on one. Can you meet me here at 10:00PM?”

Lisa agreed quickly happy to be on such great terms with her new professor. After she left Laura called Britney. She explained about little miss tattle tell and told her the plan. All four of them were going to hit the gym and make sure their feet got all nice and sweaty. Then they were really going to teach the new freshman about smell and odor. After she hung up Laura sighed contently. It had been years since she had done anything like it. She fondly remembered when she was in the sororities making the pledges sniff her feet… The fact that this wasn’t a willing pledge and that she had a serious respiratory issue didn’t bother her one bit.

**Lisa went on with her day and actually met a friend! The boy was in one of his later classes. Lisa felt her throb a little when the young man actually sat next to her. He could of sat elsewhere but he chose to sit next to her! He was about 5 foot 6 and had medium length dark hair. He wasn't what most girls would consider "cute" but he wasn't ugly or anything. He wore a t-shirt and jeans and looked down at his desk. Lisa mustered up a bit of courage and said, "Oh um hello." The boy looked startled, "Ummm Hello." They were both a bit shy which made it a little backward but they introduced themselves. His name was Jake and he was also a brand new student.

Their professor was really late so they actually talked a bit more and they agreed to be study buddies. Lisa was starting to feel short of breath when she asked him, "W-want to study tonight? I'm meeting a professor at 10:00 and I might as well stay in the area. Never too early to get started on studying right? Jake liked the girl, she really was his type. He wondered if he would ever have the nerve to take it any further then study buddies but he jumped at the chance to spend more time with her. After class they studied and began to learn more about each other - oh they still had stutters and nervous questions that trailed off but they were really becoming more and more comfortable with each other. Before they knew it, it was almost 10:00 and Lisa had to go meet the professor. Jake said goodbye and they parted ways.**

It was dark out and she was a little nervous. There were almost no cars in the parking lot. The last class had let out at 7:00PM. She still wore her hair done in pig tails like her mom liked and still wore her out of fashion long dress. Hesitantly she knocked on the door of Laura’s lecture hall.

“Come in Lisa.”
1152.title: Lisa (More Smoking than Feet)

choices: Foot Smell Torture!
Someone else arrives on the scene!
11521.content:
She turned the door knob and entered in. Immediately she was accosted by the three girls who were smoking outside! The grabbed her arms and easily wrestled her to the ground. The shock of the attack immediately sent her into a hyperventilating anxiety attack. Unable to defend herself, let alone breathe properly she offered no resistance as they stripped her and duct taped her hands behind her back and her legs together. The girls gave each other high fives and brought up some chairs to sit down on.

Laura the professor, as well as Ashley, Britney, and Jasmine all laughed at the desperate breaths their victim took. They all knew she was going to go through far worse soon. All four had the glow of sweat about them as they had hit the gym for the last hour. Laura, Ashley, and Britney all still had sneakers on, Jasmine had decided to work out barefoot and walk on the sidewalk back to the class room. Her petite Asian feet were filthy.

Lisa finally stopped gasping and got her wind back. She looked up at her captors and despaired. Why were they doing this to her? “I-I don’t understand, what are you doing professor.” Laura smiled triumphantly down at her and said, “Because you deserve it you ugly pig faced chit. You and people like you have stolen away the rights of smokers and we are going to make you pay, you say the smell of my sorority sisters hurts you, well were about to show you just how smelly the sisters of Kappa Delta are!”
11521.title: All the girls ambush poor Lisa.

choices: Yes they let her go... for now.
Its time to finish her.
115211.content:
Kicking off her sneaker she grabbed it and thrust the opening over Lisa’s mouth and nose. The sour foot stench coming from the ratty sneakers caused her to cringe away but Laura was merciless. Bound hand a foot she couldn’t escape the terrible stench. Lisa thought she would die right there, however while the foot stench was foul, it wasn’t toxic like pollutants or carcinogens from cigarettes. It left her short of breath but not in a lung destroying manner.

After a minute or two of rubbing her sneaker into Lisa’s face Laura removed it and sat back down. Blonde Britney was next. She had already taken off her shoes. The other girls held their nose as they smelled the stinky feet from afar. Jasmine commented, “Damn girl what died in those shoes!” Britney placed her socked feet right over Lisa’s mouth and nose. Lisa thought the shoe smell was bad but this was terrible. Sweaty wet socks were being pushed into her mouth and onto her nose. The damp stench DID set off her Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease and she began to panic and thrash on the floor.

She gasped like a fish out of the water and Britney’s cruel feet didn’t let up at all. Spots appeared before her eyes as she just couldn’t get the oxygen needed to sustain her. All four of them were laughing at her as she suffocated. Her lungs burned crying out for good clean oxygen, the kind that this college had offered in the brochures…

Seeing her start to turn a shade of purple Britney let up. There was so much more fun to be had first. After several long minutes Lisa was able to get her breath back. Tears streamed down her face. They were cruelly torturing her and delighting in her pain it wasn’t fair! She pleaded with them, “Please stop, please, please, I’ll be a good girl please stop.” They laughed at her mocking her.

“This little piggy went wah wah wah.”

“I bet she wants her mommy.”

“Aww poor little miss tattle.”

Lisa continued to cry out desperately begging. She didn’t want to die here suffocated to death with their foul smell. There was so much to live her, her parents, her future careers, she begged. Laura clapped her hands. “Well if you want to be a good girl, you should make yourself useful.” Lisa saw a glimmer of hope and asked, “H-How?” Laura smiled a cat’s grin, “Good girls obey their superiors, and we are definitely your superiors, you agree, of course?” Lisa knew the correct answer was yes, and she gave it.

“Good then you can start by obeying my first command; remove my socks… with your teeth!” Crossing her legs she made Lisa wriggle her way forward. She reached up with her mouth to grab at the toe part of the sock and tried to pull. Laura toyed with her. She arched her foot up preventing an easy pull off. Lisa struggled to adjust and tried to pull only to fall backwards her mouth clicking painfully as she lost the sock. “God she can’t do anything right,” Ashley remarked.

With a sniffle she tried again and this time Laura let her pull the sock off. A fresh wave of foot odor moved throughout the room. Seeing Lisa flinch away Laura snapped at her saying, “Good girls don’t flinch from their superior’s feet, get your worthless nose in between my toes and give me a good sniff.” Lisa knew her only hope was pleasing the professor, though in reality it was a fool’s hope. The squirmed forward again and placed her nose between the big toe and the second toe and give a sharp hard sniff. Immediately fire returned to her lungs as she coughed out in pain. Again the girls laughed.

“Make her do it again!” Britney suggested.

And she did twice more out of spite. And each time Lisa felt the sharp pain in her chest. Laura then made her take off the sock of her other foot and sniff that one as well. She was made to take off all the socks except Jasmine whose feet were already bare. Britney’s feet were the worst, when Lisa took off her socks fresh groans from the other three women were made.

After this was done Laura patted Lisa’s head like a dog, “Good girl! Now I do hope you will continue to obey.” Lisa cringed at learning the torment would continue but knowing this was her only chance she nodded her head, “Yes ma’am I’m a g-good girl I am.” Britney said, “Well good girls should apologize to their betters, beg us to forgive you for having the nerve to actually tell us what to do.” Lisa did as she asked, the girls roared with laugher. Lisa was made to beg and apologize individually to each of the women there.

Ashley who was the tallest and had the largest feet said, “Look at you, you are a little worm begging forgiveness from those above. Don’t apologize to me, apologize to my feet.” Lisa wasn’t sure what to do so she looked down at the feet and said, “I-I’m s-s-sorry feet?” Snickering Ashley said, “That’s not how you apologize to feet, you kiss them!” Lisa quickly obeyed trying to get done with this humiliating task. Jasmine laughed, “You call that kissing? Piggy have you ever even kissed a boy?” The truth was that she hadn’t. Her parents were very protective it was one of the reasons she had gone to college so that she could finally date like the other girls!

Crimson with shame she said, “N-no.”

Cackling with laugher they mocked and derided her. Between those hurtful comments and the still foul odor reeking from their feet she started to have another respiratory attack. The girls just laughed and waited for her to stop heaving and wheezing. Britney shook her head, “No wonder no one wants to kiss you, you are little miss freak out over anything.”

After the attack subsided Ashley pointed at her feet. “Kiss them like you would kiss a boy, because you know you never will.” Lisa once again kissed her feet. This time trying to think about the movies and how they kissed there. She added her tongue and tried to imagine the cute guy she saw in class that day… But it was impossible. The foot odor and the slimly taste of her sweaty feet wouldn’t allow for that image to take hold. Ashley let her continue for several minutes enjoying the feeling of having this helpless loser at her feet.

Soon though Jasmine wanted her turn she said, “All right super geek get over here.” Lisa wormed her way over there, being trussed up it was difficult. Lisa kissed her dirty feet, but that wasn’t enough for Jasmine. “My feet have walked through grass, the parking lot, and all over the gym, they are dirty be a good girl and clean them.” Lisa cringed as she slowly started to the lick and scrape off the dirt from Jasmine’s size 5 feet. The taste was awful and even though Jasmine’s feet had not been confined in a pair of old sneakers they still reeked of feet. The girls continued their constant verbal abuse.

“Oh my God, she’s licking the dirt!”

“Hey pigs do like dirt so it works….”

“She is such a loser how low do you have to be to clean dirty feet with your tongue!”

Lisa licked Jasmine’s soles, her arch, the toes, and the heel. Most of the dirt was starting to come off after several minutes of diligent disgusting working but some she had to scrape off with her teeth. “Be sure to get underneath my toe nails piggy.” Lisa sucked on her toes one at a time, using her tongue to get the gunk and dirt out from underneath the nail. The girls saw that as particularly amusing and snapped several pictures with their camera phones. Lisa thought she was going to die from embarrassment. Finally she was done and Jasmine’s feet were spotless. Jasmine mocked her and said, “Good girl! Glad to see your putting that college education to work cleaning the feet of your superiors.”

Laura and the other two girls also wanted their feet cleaned. Even though they were just sweaty and not dirty it didn’t help Lisa much. Lisa licked and sucked those feet, they tasted foul, slimy, and salty due to the sweat. After the thorough cleaning Laura decided to take charge of the last stage of their torment. “Lisa, you have just cleaned and sniffed the feet of us. How pathetic. What kind of weak willed spineless excuse for a person are you?”

Lisa didn’t know how to respond. She just looked down; her bonds were still tight about her. “You know we are better then you, yes?” She nodded. “You know you are a loser of the worst degree and deserve everything you get.” Lisa disagreed but she nodded anyway. She had done everything they had told her to do she was being a good girl they would let her go and she could leave this place and never look back. Her parents were waiting for her; she had a life ahead of her she could go to class from on-line…

Do the girls let her go?
115211.title: Foot Smell Torture!

choices: Suffocate her with smoke!
Kill her another way!
1152112.content: The original plan was to smoke her to death... but do they want to kill her some other way?
1152112.title: Its time to finish her.

11521121.content:
Laura told the girls, “It is time girls, Britney your socks are the worst put them in her mouth.” Lisa looked around wide eyed in fear, “Professor please, I’ve been a good girl what are you going to do.” Laura smiled down at the helpless girl, “You complained about our smoking, so the best way to punish you is by smoking.” Lisa screamed, “NO! I’ll die, you can’t please, m-m-my lungs PLEASE.” But no one could hear her scream and Britney took advantage of the open mouth to stuff her smelly sweat socks in. They quickly taped her mouth shout over her muffled terrified screams of help.

Lisa was panicking now, she tried again and again to break out of the duct tape but it was no use. They propped her up sitting; Ashley sat behind her while the other three crowded in front. Jasmine whispered into Lisa’s ear, “Grab your last breath of clean air bitch.” As soon as she did Britney, Jasmine, and Professor Laura lit up their cigarettes. When Lisa could hold her breath no longer she exhaled and Ashley wrapped her hand around her nose from behind. Now Lisa’s body would involuntarily inhale as soon as she let go. They could see the sheer terror in Lisa’s eyes as they all took a long slow drag of their cigarettes.

As they exhaled onto Lisa’s face Ashley removed her hand and Lisa inhaled pure cigarette smoke. Her Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease kicked in and it felt as if she received no oxygen at all. In fact her lungs burned with twin pains of a lack of air and the agony of the toxic smoke. Ashley then replaced her hand over Lisa’s nose before she could exhale. The smoke was trapped in her lungs destroying the super sensitive tissue of the young teen’s diseased lungs. After 30 seconds Ashley removed her hand and Lisa automatically exhaled the lung destroying smoke only for her body to automatically inhale the next set of smoke the three women blew into her face.

They watched gleefully as Lisa suffocated on their cigarette smoke. Take that non-smoker! Ashley was no longer needed to control Lisa’s breathing the terrible damage had been done. She joined the others and lit up. There were now constantly blowing streams of smoke into Lisa’s face. She tried to breath but every gasp of air she drew in gave her no relief, her lungs couldn’t process it. Her eyes streamed tears down and her heart raced. Horrible pain shot through her temples and the world grew narrow. She thought about her mother and father and her hopes… dreams… all shattered. Her last look at the world was blond Britney blowing smoke right into her face.

Lisa had passed out. The girls didn’t stop they continued to smoke and soon she was dead. They had taken their revenge on the anti-smoking policies. They had taken their revenge on an innocent girl. Marveling at their cruelly they had no remorse. They had ruthlessly dominated and abused her. Making her lick their feet and then killed her using their cigarettes. This story ends with all of the girls placing their feet on the murdered student in a victory pose showing their utter domination and superiority.
11521121.title: Suffocate her with smoke!

choices: Trample her to death.
Suffocate her with their feet!
11521122.content: How else can these evil girls kill her?
11521122.title: Kill her another way!

choices: Jasmine's turn to trample Lisa.
Jasmine decides to do something else.
115211221.content:
Professor Laura Rich looked down at the poor broken girl. It was time snuff the little bitch out. Initially she had thought to use smoke to kill her but now after all of the foot worship she wanted something more visceral. She wanted to feel the nerd die underneath her feet. She called over the three girls to her and whispered her plans. Its not like Lisa could do anything if the spoke out loud but by whispering it heightened her sense of dread. 115331.content:
Jack didn't have a whole lot of friends. If he was honest he really didn't have any friends. Not in real life at least. People often ignored him, they didn't like the odd vibe he had, the mixture of low self confidence and abysmal social awareness. He wasn't hideously ugly but was certainly on the poor looking side. All of it made for a real negative combination.

Jack wasn't completely stupid though, at least when it came to book smarts. No genius of course but someone who could actually complete college. Since real life social interaction wasn't going well he had taken out student loans and found a small apartment away from campus and took only internet courses. He was proceeding along OK from a grade standpoint, passing most of his classes. But he was lonely, very lonely.

He took solace in on-line games. He found a group of people who played similar games and managed to get on a Discord sever with them. It hadn't been hard since it was an open sign up and soon he started to play with a few people. To his astonishment a girl was on the server by the name of Kim. Jack rarely interacted with people but girls were even less frequent for him. He quickly established himself to be an awkward creeper even though he had no creepy intentions!

Kim's boyfriend was Daniel and quickly picked up on it and told him off. Jack quickly apologized, fearful of losing even the small tenuous bonds he had formed so far.

Kim interjected, "We'll let you stay on the server for now, just don't be too annoying."

Since then Jack had been quiet and tried to play with them any chance he got. They were decent at games and had similar gaming interests and for once Jack was making bonds with people his age. It was a heady experience, even if he was constantly insulted and mocked by Daniel. Kim's laughter at Daniel's insults was music to his ears even if was directed at him. He really enjoyed the sound of her voice. It was almost enchanting to him.

You were an ordinary 19 year old young man, trying to get accepted into a college. While you had failed to be accepted by most of your top choices, your 21 year old sister Sarah had brought an interesting option to your attention: It was the same school she was going to, Micro Academy. According to her, while female students had to pass a very difficult entrance exam to get in, male students were allowed in regardless of qualifications!

Apparently, all a male needed to do to be accepted was sign up, and they were in! Not only that but they were allowed to attend free of charge! You asked your older sister why the discrimination between males and females at her school, but she refused to tell you that. She would only giggle and say that it was a secret. While you thought the whole thing was fairly suspicious, you were getting desperate with all of your previous options having turned you down.

You decided after careful consideration that you would accept her offer and apply to her school. The next morning, you let your sister take you to the school and show you around. The tour turned went incredibly well, and you absolutely loved the campus. From what you had seen of it, there were beautiful girls in every direction you looked. Strangely enough, however, you didn't see a single male on campus despite the incredible offer for them.

At the end of your tour, Sarah showed you to the office building where you met the principal. She was a stunning young woman with short black hair named Mrs. Aurora, who was likely around 36 years old, but whose flawless figure and beautiful appearance in general made her look as though she stopped aging at 25. Mrs. Aurora greeted you with a can of soda, which although you found somewhat strange, you accepted politely. After drinking the soda, you were provided with a stack of textbooks for all of your classes. Mrs. Aurora then handed you what appeared to be a miniature set of the same textbooks, as well as a tiny PE uniform. The miniature gear looked like it would only be usable by someone at 3 inches tall, but you accepted it as well without ever questioning it. You and your sister then went home to prepare for school together.

----------------------
the next day
----------------------

You had just finished getting dressed and packing your backpack, and Sarah told you to give the tiny set of school equipment to her. As you were busy getting ready for your first day of college, you didn't have time to wonder why she wanted them. You simply handed them to her and continued preparing. When you were finally ready, you and your big sister left to head to Micro Academy together.

After a bit of driving, you and Sarah finally reached your destination. However, this was when things got really weird. As soon as you set foot on campus, you felt your body beginning to shrink in size! Within mere moments, you had been reduced to a pathetic 3 inches tall! At least your clothes had shrunken with you, but as you tried to take a step backwards, you felt an invisible wall against your back! You immediately looked up at Sarah in a mixture of fear and confusion before asking her what was going on.

"What gives Sarah, why am I so tiny all of a sudden?!"

Your now-literally big sister simply giggled and plucked you off the ground, placing you into the palm of her hand before answering you.

"Oh, silly little brother... Why do you think that this school is called Micro Academy? It's because all the male students here get shrunken when they set foot on campus! You'll automatically grow back after school is over for the day, but until then you'll stay tiny. That barrier you felt against your back earlier is a safety precaution: until you return to normal size, that barrier keeps you from leaving the campus. After all, just imagine all the danger you could get into if you left school at this size, little bro!"

"B-but how?!"

"You remember that 'soda' that the principal gave you?"

"Uh, yes..."

"Well, that soda is a special mixture that reacts with some weird transmitter that we've got in the middle of the campus. It's given to all the male students when they enter, and it modifies their bodies so that they shrink when they come into contact with the special electrical waves that are given off by that transmitter. Then you stay tiny until the transmitter gets turned off again at the end of the day. I don't understand all the sciency stuff behind it, but I do know that it's really cool!"

"Cool?! What part of this is cool?! Come on Sarah, why didn't you tell me about this sooner?! I could seriously get killed here!"

"Jeez bro, calm down! Don't worry, you won't have to worry about anything! As long as you stay in the transmitter's range, your cute little body can't be crushed or anything! You'll just pop back up like a little cartoon character if someone were to step on you or something. And that's exactly where the barrier comes in; since it keeps you from leaving campus while you're small, you won't be able to leave the transmitter's range until you return to normal again. So you see? Everything is perfectly safe here!"

"Ugh... Well, I guess I don't have any other arguments then... Just promise that you'll keep me safe, okay?"

122.content:
------------------
Flashback
------------------

It had been almost 3 years since that fateful day; the day that changed the world forever. One day, as if out of nowhere, a massive meteor crashed into the earth's surface. Upon impact, the bizarre space rock released an alien radiation that was dubbed by scientists simply as "the DNA nuke", due to the effect it had on anything that it came in contact with. The space radiation caused the DNA of anything exposed to it to become completely scrambled, resulting in strange transformations as it spread across the globe.

Within only a week of the impact, every female on the planet, human and animal alike, had been mutated. Yes, only females. Scientists were baffled as to why, but somehow the Y-chromosome in males was able to to neutralize the effect. The result was that females were transformed into humanoid animals. The transformation only affected human women slightly; they now each possessed the ears and tail of a random animal whose traits they acquired, and their personalities began to show the influence of that animal's behavior. Otherwise, human women remained mostly the same as before.

Female animals, however, had a more drastic transformation. They all took on a body shape almost identical to that of humans, while maintaining whatever fur, scales, or other coating their bodies had. Unlike human women, who only adopted ears and tails, the animals had truly become anthro versions of their former selves. Perhaps the most drastic change in them, however, wasn't even the physical aspect of the transformation. You see, when they took on human form, the animals all came to possess the same level of sentience and high intellect as humans themselves. The female animals who had taken on human form were fully capable of human speech now, while maintaining the ability to communicate with other male animals in their native tongue.

Long story short, females across the world had all been turned into human-animal hybrids. Scientists decided to redefine the term human to refer exclusively to the males who had been unaffected by the DNA nuke, while adopting the new term semi-anthro to refer to the mutated females who had taken on animal traits. The mutated female animals were now referred to as anthro, and the male animals were still categorized under the term animal. While it had taken a fair bit of time to get used to, within only a few months society had completely reformed itself to adapt to these changes.

However, since anthros often had greater speed and strength than humans, and semi-anthros had much faster reflexes thanks to their animalistic traits, females in general had become much more self-reliant. They no longer needed males to defend them, and were capable of easily outmatching them now. Luckily, it was an incredibly rare occurrence for females to abuse their newfound physical superiority over males. More often than not, these abilities were simply used in self defense. In actuality, this knowledge that females were now stronger than them served to reduce the number of sexually oriented crimes that were committed, and ended up making society as a whole much more peaceful than ever before.


----------------------------------------
Your House; Present Day
----------------------------------------


"Big brother, wake up!"

Before you even knew what was happening, you opened your eyes to see your 9 year old sister Emily running into your room and preparing to jump on top of you in your bed!

"No, Emmy, don't do-"

You were cut off as your hyperactive little sister lept into the air and landed on your stomach, knocking the air out of you. You looked up at her smiling face, her pointed dog ears perked up and her tail wagging back and forth in excitement. Emily had always been a cheerful little girl, but ever since the DNA nuke mutated her when she was 6, your kid sister had taken on the traits of one highly energetic chihuahua!

"Morning bro! Did you sleep well?" Emily asked with her usual enthusiasm.

"Yeah Emmy, I slept fine... But could you please get off of me now?" You ask, trying to catch your breath.

"Sure thing bro!" She said as she jumped right off of you again.

Once she got off of you, you got out of your bed and pet your little sister on the head, right between her furry white ears. Emily giggled with a relaxed expression on her face, as she always loved it when you rubbed her there. You then go downstairs to greet the rest of your family. Your parents, your twin sister Alissa, who had taken on the traits of a rabbit during the DNA nuke (becoming a literal bunny girl), and your former pet cat Sadie were all already sitting at the table to eat their breakfast. Sitting down to join them for your final breakfast as a complete family, you and Emily began to dig in along with them. It was your final breakfast together because college would soon be starting, and you would have to leave for a long time.

Your family was pretty normal... Well, normal by the modern definition anyway. You would have found a family like this totally freakish only 3 years ago, but now you had grown used to it. Your mom was a fairly attractive woman for her age, and despite being 42 years old, she was still just as beautiful as ever. She had taken on the traits of a beagle since the DNA nuke, and her long floppy ears drooped to the sides of her head. She was a caring mother who had raised you and Alissa all by herself ever since you were born, due to the fact that your father abandoned her when he found out she was pregnant (he wasn't ready for the responsibility of being a parent), and she didn't get remarried until 10 years later. your new father was often away at work, but he was a perfect match for your mother. They loved eachother dearly, and had your little sister Emily 2 years after the marriage.

Your 21 year old twin sister Alissa was one of the most attractive girls you had ever seen, and you would definitely want to go out with her if not for the fact that you were related. Her long blonde hair and deep blue eyes made her beautiful face hard to look away from. She had a perfect hourglass figure and large D-cup breasts, which she had caught you staring at more than once. She commonly teased you about this fact, and enjoyed taunting you with her incredibly sexy figure from time to time. Still, she cared dearly for you, and you got along better than many other siblings would. Her long bunny ears almost always stood straight up, and her cotton ball tail was incredibly cute as well. Over all, Alissa was a great sister in both looks and personality.

Your little 9 year old sister Emily, who you usually called by her nickname Emmy, was an adorable young girl. She was rather short for her age, but her cute face and small stature made her absolutely irresistible. She was the kind of girl whose sheer cuteness made you want to grab her and give her a big hug. She had short brown hair, and her short chihuahua tail was perpetually swinging back and forth with her boundless energy.

Sadie used to be your pet cat, an adorable Persian kitten that you raised since the day you found her abandoned in a cardboard box on the streets. However, 3 years ago, she became a regular member of your family when she was turned into an anthro during the DNA nuke. Despite being a fairly chubby kitty before the transformation, Sadie's body now was perfectly shaped. It seemed like all of the fat on her body had relocated to the ideal positions, namely her boobs and her butt. As such, she also had an incredibly attractive figure just like Alissa. Her entire body was covered from head to toe in a coat of light orange fur, and her pink paw pads on her hands and feet were as smooth as silk. Like most cats, Sadie had retractable claws that she used in self defense.

Your family was great, but tomorrow was the first day at your new college. You didn't know for sure what it would be like, but you were told that it consisted mostly of anthros and semi-anthros, with only a small percentage of the students being normal human males. You, Alissa, and Sadie were all going to the same school, and you were setting out tomorrow.


When you get to your new college and receive your class schedule, you learn that you are in the same classes as...

1232111113.content:
The Wizarding college drew the nobility from far and wide throughout several different kingdoms. Those who were mages, sons and daughters of wealthy merchants or royal and regal blood found themselves at the College Arcana. Students who had to be at least of 16 years of age studied there for up to 10 years if they were talented enough.

It was rare for poorer folk to become mages as most wizards and witches did not manifest their powers openly, instead it had to be drawn out and discovered by a master mage of sorceress. Thomas was different, this didn't necessarily make him more powerful only that his power didn't need to be discovered. As such he made his way to the College Arcana and after demonstrating how he could manipulate his body he was granted his first year provisional study.

In order to remain at the College Arcana one had to either prove themselves as a gifted mage or they would have to pay an exorbitant fee to stay on with the school. Thomas had to succeed or he would be kicked out. He had to place within the top 20% of his class! All of this had been explained to him. For first years their quarters were communal and this year there were 78 students and Thomas was one of only three commoner class people, everyone else were sons and daughters of other mages, wealthy citizens or nobles.

Right from the beginning it was clear that he and scrawny young man named Mike were looked down upon. A particularly striking young woman by the name of Leanne did a once over of Thomas.

"What is a common dog like you doing at the College Arcana?" Her long blond locks fell over a cloak with an intricate pattern of lace. Thomas was very unsure of himself.

"I'm s-sorry ma'am but I'm here to learn magic. I can do Body Mage naturally and so I..." She held up her hand.

"Ah that silly notion that base born blood should get a chance to succeed. Honestly you should just quit now there is no way one of your meager ability will ever succeed. Are you even literate?"

Thomas flushed. "I can sign my name!" And he could but that was the extent of his knowledge of letters.

"Oh for the pity's sake what a cretin." She dismissed him with a wave and went to chat with some other noble ladies. Thomas looked about and no one seemed to take any pity on him for the rudeness he had suffered save for the last commoner that was there. A young woman with plain clothes and a nasty scar under her eye and across her cheek.

"My name is Jill and I'll teach you your letters if you'll help me with magic as you can so we can both get within the top 20%. We'll show these arrogant bastards what we can do!" Her eyes flashed with fury and Thomas knew she was one of those peasants that hated nobles and rich folk. It may not be a good idea to involve himself with her... but then again if he didn't learn to read he would be at a severe disadvantage!

123211121.content:
Arando does not know it yet but his apprentice is truly Morgana in disguise. To his eyes though she is Elayne a young 17 year old girl short in stature, red of hair and a naive young apprentice. To Arando's eyes the young lass is beautiful however he feels it would be wrong to take advantage of her. Arando believes that he must first teach her about magic and the ways of the world before attempting to pursue any sort of relationship.

"Lass, magic is divided into five main schools - most only master two and only once in history has a mage mastered all five."

Elayne (actually Morganna however from this point on she will be referred to as Elayne typically) rolled her eyes, "I know this already."

Arando smiles, "Good then you can list them all and their uses."

Elayne dutifully recited the major schools of magic.

"There is Elemental Mastery. This can be used in combat with lighting, fire and the like. Of course this can also be used to call rain for crops or quickly clear land."

She continued, and as she did so she undid her laced shoes. Elayne had quickly learned that Arando had a thing for feet - a weakness that she would be sure to use.

"Next is Body Magic. This is used to make your flesh hard as stone to stop blades and arrows or to grant incredible strength and swiftness."

Elayne idly dangled one of her shoes from her shapely feet, watching as the Master Mage tried to watch them circumspectly.

"Next is Enchanting, this is the ability to bestow magical properties to otherwise mundane items."

"The fourth set of magic is Healing. The use is obvious though some texts suggest this can be used to animate the dead."

Arando jolted himself from looking at the young girl's feet and said, "Yes and it is possible but such a thing is vile beyond imagining."

Elayne smiled and continued, "The last form of magic is Mind Magic. Illusions, suggestions and out right control over other humans or animals."

Arando nodded and clapped his hands together, "Excellent, well done. Remember a mage should dabble in all parts but should focus on one at first then attempt the study of the second when it has been mastered in full. Have you given more thought on what you would like to make as the focus of your studies?"

Elayne was actually already a master mage, though she was called a witch under her true name Morganna. As Morganna she had mastered Body Magic and Elemental Mastery. She was deadly dangerous. She had burned thousands with her magical flames and no blade could pierce her, well no mundane blade. It was through her mastery of Body Magic that she was able to transform herself into "Elayne" and fool the old wizard.

She could easily choose a specialty that she already knew very well but if she was too competent that might make Arando wary. On the other hand learning a 3rd set of magic in depth would tax even her abilities. What would Elayne do?

choices: Ayame Amano
Lucia Silverstone
123311.content:
Ayame Amano- A 19 year old Japanese Second Year at the college, Ayame applied for the College in order to hone her abilities so she can eventually become a UMFF (Underground Magical Fighter Federation) fighter just like her mother and aunt. Her usual outfit consist of a Black Karate Gi with a Red Belt and she has short black hair tied up in a small spiky ponytail and piercing red eyes.

Her unique Magical Power is her one inherent to her own body, which allows her to directly inject poison into anyone she touches. Ayame seems to have some sort of control of the dosage she injects into someone with a small amount of poison being able to paraylze someone for a short amount of time, a moderate amount being able to knock someone unconscious for a time and having a chance to cause permanent brain damage and of course, a high enough dosage can kill a person instantly. This combined with her martial art prowess that already makes her a natural born killer even without her magical power, and the basic fire and thunder spells she knows, makes her an extremely dangerous fighter for anyone to face.

Ayane has a huge foot fetish and loved dominating her victims with her feet, forcing others to pamper them and trampling and attacking others with them which greatly arouses her. She considers dying to her feet "A Great Honor" and sometimes likes to suddenly inject poison into others with her feet. However, she does have a secret wish to be dominated herself one day.

Lucia Silverstone- A 21 Year Old American Fourth Year Student closing in on graduating, Lucia is a member of the Silverstone Family a famed family of Magical Assassins known throughout the Magical world. Like most of her family Lucia seems to lack any real emotion, speaking to others in a cold and robotic manner and not really involving herself in many things outside of her studies and magical training.

Outside of the basics which she mastered, Lucia has two unique magical abilities, the ability to clone herself which she was born with and the ability to turn herself invisible which she mastered in secret during her time at the school. Her invisibility ability is quite self-explanatory but her cloning ability is a bit more complicated, allowing her to create perfect clones of herself both in body and mind. She can only have up to five Clones at a time and if a Clone ends up dying she'll either have to go to it's corpse and absorb it back into herself before she can create another or just wait for about two to three days for the Clone to disappear on it's own. Because of this she has made something of a small business of selling off some of her clones to others who wish to use them as test dummies. Of course, they are still clones of Lucia at the end of the day and can be quite dangerous if one can't handle them.

Lucia herself doesn't really have any fetishes at all or even any sexual desires but that doesn't mean that one couldn't break some into her.
123311.title: Ayame or Lucia!

choices: Ayame eventually finds Ms. Stone.
Before that Ayame is attacked by someone else!
1233111.content:
It was another beautiful evening as Ayame walked through the wooden hallways, her barefeet hitting the wood echoing through the mostly empty hallway. After another long day of attending boring classes and training today of all days she really needed to find some weak or gullible girl to beat on and dominate. Though, for a large majority of the day, Ayame had felt like someone was watching her but then again she was always this tense considering you could be attacked at any moment in this school. Putting the idea of someone stalking her at the back of her head, she then tried to decide who she'd dominate to blow off her steam. She then realized she had the perfect target.

Ms. Stone, the annoying as hell Elemental Magic 102 Teacher. A stout middle-aged woman with the a special affinity for Earth Magic (unsurprising considering her name) she had only been working at the College for about two years and Ayame absolutely hated her. Not only was she painfully dull and an extremely bad teacher at least in Ayame's opinion. It also didn't help that the woman loved to make an example out of Ayame to the class as a "Slacker who would never get anywhere in life". Oh yeah and it doesn't help that she's flung a deadly spell at two Ayame's way that could have killed her if she wasn't careful. Ayame had always wanted to get back at Stone as long as she's been her student and today was the day that she'd make her pay. In Ayame's opinion it was a situation with no downsides. She'd dominate and make Ms. Stone whimper at her feet, get a massive notoriety boost even if she didn't end up killing her for taking down a teacher and it also helped that she considered Ms. Stone's chubby feet to be cute as well. Now all she had to do was find Ms. Stone and catch her off-guard. She was a teacher after all so fighting her head-on wouldn't be the most sound idea so she'd have to just follow her around and wait for the perfect opportunity to strike.

But still Ayame really couldn't shake the feeling that she was being watched for some reason. Perhaps she was the one being stalked?
1233111.title: Ayame Amano, the Toxic Karate Girl!

choices: Ayame gets the first strike, successfully poisoning Ms.Stone!
Ms.Stone actually realizes Ayame is there and gets a surprise first strike!
12331111.content:
Ayame looked around for a bit, making absolutely sure that no one was following her letting out a sigh of relief after confirming no one was around her. She then began her search for Ms.Stone keeping a diligent eye out for both Ms.Stone and any that might try and possibly attack her. Luckily, it didn't take long at all for her to find the chubby teacher in what was perhaps the most obvious place, the Teacher's Lounge standing in front of a vending machine. The woman dressed simply, wearing a olive colored cardigan sweater with a white T-Shirt underneath and a simple Black skirt which went down to her ankles. You could only see the back of her large head, showing her straight brown hair which was tied up in a simple round bun. And of course, like everyone in the school she was barefoot and her wide and chubby feet were on full display.

Ayame knew it was now or never. She tiptoed into the somewhat large lounge as Ms.Stone didn't seem to realize that she now wasn't alone. Ayame tiptoed closer and closer to Ms.Stone as she started to insert some money into the vending machine, Ayame being able to smell the thick smell of flowery perfume from the woman. Just a few more steps and she'd be in range to poison that annoying Ms.Stone...
12331111.title: Ayame finds Ms.Stone with no issue.

choices: Ms.Stone quickly submits and begins to lick Ayame's worn out feet.
Ms.Stone refuses and Ayame is forced to punish her.
123311111.content:
Seems like Ms.Stone was way too engrossed in whatever she was buying to even notice Ayame right behind. With just one light tap on the shoulder, Ayame injected just enough poison to knock Ms.Stone out for a time. The teacher wasn't even able to utter out a sound before she fell to the floor like a sack of potatoes. Ayame let out a childish giggle as she looked at the Stout Woman's limp twitching body.

"You'd think a teacher like yourself would be a lot more wary of attacks from students but I guess in the end you were the real slacker!" Ayame knew she couldn't be in the teacher's lounge with Ms.Stone's unconscious body like this. She had to at get the teacher to her room so she could at least have some privacy. Ayame easily lifted Ms.Stone into her arms despite the teacher's weight not even breaking a sweat. Ayame looked at the twitching woman's sleeping face as she drool started to run down her cheek. "Hehehe. Me and you are going to have a lot of fun tonight Ms.Stone, whether you like it or not.

--------------------------------

A while later Stone's eyes began to flutter back open as she started to regain her vision. She felt what seemed to be some toes prodding at her cheeks.

"Nngh...what happened? Where am I?"

"Hehehe, glad to see you finally woke up ms.Stone. For a while there I thought I may have killed you."

"Huh? Wha!?!" Ms.Stone instantly snapped back to reality as she realized she was on the floor as she looked up at Ayame who was sitting on the edge of her bed. "Amano, you devilish little miscreant! Nngh!" Ms.Stone tried to move away but she quickly came to realize that her hands and feet were bound by large blue rings that acted as handcuffs. But that's not what worried the 32 year old woman, what worried her was the fact that it seemed like she couldn't use her magic at all!

"You do know those handcuffs are specifically made to disable one's use of magic right Katherine. I can call you Katherine right?"

"Grrrrr, Absolutely not young lady!"

"Too bad, you don't have a choice in the matter. I'm finally going to make you pay for all the grief you've caused me so far. And let me tell you that's a lot."

"You little, unbind me this instant!" Ayame just laughed at Ms.Stone's pathetic little act.

"Do you not know how this place works Katherine? Only the strong can survive in this school and the strong can do whatever they want with the weak. And it's pretty clear to see who the strong one and weak one is right now." Ms.Stone just growled in response, unable to think of anything else to say. "Now that we've gotten those pleasantries out of the way it's time for you to get to work." Ayame lifted up one of her feet drenched in sweat and dirt and hovered it inches above Ms.Stone's face. "You always do blabbing off don't ya Katherine. How about you use that tongue to give my feet the love and attention they deserve."

Ms.Stone looked at the Japanese Student's dirty feet with fear as sweat started to drip down onto her face. How could someone as esteemed as her be forced into a position like this! She wanted to refuse, no she had to refuse! But she had heard stories of Ayame ending the lives of students who didn't bow to her and she'd most certainly do the same to her if she refused to give into her demands. She was completely at this student's mercy!

So what would it be her pride as a teacher to not submit to this girl or would she lower herself and do what Ayame told her in order to boost her chances of survival.
123311111.title: Ayame knocks Ms.Stone out!

choices: Ms. Stone tries to formulate a plan to escape or turn the tables!
Ms.Stone finally submits to Ayame.
1233111112.content:
Despite her current predicament, Katherine was still a teacher and she still had her dignity. There was no way that she would lower herself to a student like this, especially one as brutish as Ayame was. As Ayame's toes poked at Stone's lips to try to pry them inside but the teacher refused to part her lips for the Japanese fighter. Ayame laughed as she watched Ms.Stone's face contort. "Hahaha! I'm quite the merciful girl so if you start sucking now I won't punish you any further. Try anything else and I'll make sure you'll wish that you were dead." The whimpering Ms.Stone could tell from the tone of Ayame's voice that the girl was deadly serious. Who knew what she would do if she tried to resist her again. But still she just couldn't stand the indignity of it all. She knew there had to be some way out of her predicament if she thought hard enough but right now it was really seeming like the safer option would to just do as Ayame commanded.

No, she mustn't allow this little demon to trample all over her! She had to figure out a way to escape and hopefully get out of these bindings so she could use her magic! But first she had to figure out what she could do in her current predicament. Ayame continues torturing Ms.Stone but doesn’t kill her
123311111211.content:
Ms.Stone was completely at her wits end. She had to get away right now! Right as she was about to bite down on Ayame’s toes the girl quickly slid them out of Stone’s mouth with a disappointed look on her face.

“Don’t think that I didn’t notice what you were about to do Katherine. You were really going to bite the foot that feeds you huh?” Ms.Stone looked at the young girl above her with fear as she frantically shook her head.

“Don’t try and play innocent with me now. You know, originally I thought I’d just play with you for a bit have my feet worshiped and you could live on with your life. But now, I’m in the mood for something a bit more...painful.” Rage filled Ayame’s eyes as she kicked Stone’s body away from her bed, the woman yelping in pain from the powerful kick. Ayame walked towards the Ms.Stone with a wicked smile on her face. All Ms.Stone could do was watch as Ayame bent down to look her straight in the eyes, the girls’s scarlet pupils being akin to looking straight into hell itself. “Awwww, did that hurt Katherine. If that hurt then you’re not going to like what’s about to come next.” Before Ms.Stone could say anything in response she had the wind knocked out of her as Ayame suddenly jumped right onto her stomach. Ms.Stone heard what seemed to be her ribs breaking when Ayame’s feet landed and it seems Ayame did too.

“Ooooh how I love hearing the sound of bones snapping and breaking underneath my feet! Let’s see how much that Stone in your name holds up now!” Tears started to well up in the teacher’s eyes as Ayame brought her foot down yet again, eliciting a cry of pain from the teacher as she heard more of her bones breaking. Ayame continued with her stomping as the sound of bones snapping and breaking filled the room as Stone was helpless to do anything but cry and watch her body be broken down by Ayame’s powerful feet.

“Why are you crying Ms.Stone I thought you were made of tougher stuff! Heck, you should be honored to have a personal trampling session with me like this!” Ayame giggled like a child as she jumped up and down as Ms.Stone felt each and every part of her ribs and sternum break apart. The teacher felt her consciousness slipping as blood started to trickle out of her mouth. Ayame seemed to notice the lack of resistance too as she let out an annoyed sigh.

“Hmm...are you really about to pass out on me Katherine? Oh come on, you can’t be that weak I know mice that could take more of a trampling then you just did! If you pass out before I kill you then what’s the point?” Ms.Stone seemingly tried to respond but due to a mix of only being semi-consciousness and the blood in her mouth it came out as an unintelligible gurgle. “Oh shut up Katherine, I’m weighing my options right now.” Ayame thought of just killing her right now before she passed out with a deadly injection of her poison. She did always love the feeling of someone’s body convulsing wildly under her feet as their body tried to desperately cling to life after she injected them. On the other hand, it seemed like it was too soon to end Stone’s life now. She was barely able to have any fun. At the very least she should probably try to get more mileage out of torturing the woman and then think on what to do after that.
123311111211.title: Bite Ayame's toes while sucking on them

choices: Bring the dead Ms.Stone back to her room and search through it
Bring her to the courtyard for all to see when they wake up.
1233111112111.content:
Ayame finally came to a decision. She wasn’t sure if she’d even manage to keep Ms.Stone awake for much longer even if she stopped trampling her now. All she wanted was for Stone to be awake and aware as she died. Ayame turned back to the broken Stone as a smile crept up on her face. The karate girl went over to her drawer as she got a napkin out coming back to the trembling Ms.Stone as she tenderly wiped the blood away from her face.

“Hehehe, you’re really cute when you’re like this Katherine. It makes me almost forget all your bitching. Don’t respond to me by the way I already cleaned up all that blood and I’d rather not have to clean up more.” Ms.Stone stayed silent trying to plead for mercy with her eyes though that didn’t seem to work at all as Ayame looked down at her before hovering her right foot above her face. Though instead of the face destroying stomp that she had expected, Ayame gently placed her foot onto her face. “Heh, sorry but I tend to like to keep people’s faces intact. And now I say goodbye.”

Ayame slowly started to inject her poison into Stone through her feet as the teacher slowly felt herself losing control of her limbs and her vision started to fade. She closed her eyes as she felt the poison running through her body as her heart started to beat faster and faster, much faster then any heart any heart should. Her eyes started to erratically flutter as she went into a seizure as she started to heavily sweat and foam uncontrollably from the mouth as the heels of her feet pounded against the room’s wooden floor. Ayame looked at the sight in glee, wiggling her toes as she felt the foam underneath her soles.

“Yes! Now this is what I like to see! It must be so pathetic to die like this Katherine right underneath a problem’s student feet.” Ms.Stone had to agree, this was nothing short of humiliating and disgusting. To think that this would really be how she died. This isn’t what she had graduated and eventually become a teacher for. Her last thoughts before dying were those of intense embarrassment about how Ayame would flaunt about this to the other students and faculty members, gaining high praise for taking out a teacher so easily. After a few more seconds Katherine Stone took her last breath and her eyes rolled up into their sockets, the woman dying of sudden cardiac arrest due to the poison. She continued to seize up for a while after this as Ayame continued with rubbing her foot in her dead former teacher’s face, fingering herself after just having a massive orgasm.

“God now that was hot. I always love killing people like that and it being you made the whole thing better Katherine. She took her foot off of Stone’s face to get a better look at the convulsing woman’s last expression. Her eyes were rolled up, nearly only showing their whites and her lips were partly open in a small oval shape with a large amount of foam covering them. Ayame took the Handcuffs off the woman’s hands and feet and placed the powerful tools back into her drawer.

“But still this all ended way too quickly. It’s barely midnight and I hardly did anything with you. But there’s still some stuff I can do while you’re dead.” Ayame went behind Stone’s twitching and pudgy feet as she lifted one of them up to inspect it. “God you don’t know how these pudgy things have been taunting me for so long. Definitely in my unofficial top ten feet of the school for me.” Ayame especially loved how pink Stone’s soles were especially on her heels, toes and the balls of her feet. And not to mention how soft they were too, it was like touching a cloud! Stone’s feet did smell though which was compounded by the fact that she was just recently sweating uncontrollably. Ayame licked her lips as she pressed down on Stone’s toes allowing wrinkles to form on the still twitching sole.

“How ironic. I started this by trying to get you to suck my toes and now it’s going to end with me worshiping your feet.” Ayame started sucking on Stone’s warm and sweaty toes indulging in how soft and tasty they were. She also made sure to go in between the pudgy digits and as far as she could underneath her toenails wanting to make sure she didn’t mess a single spot.

Mmmph...so good... Ayame continued as she licked up and down Stone’s soft sole as she moaned in utter ecstasy. Her tongue explored the sole’s arches, she playfully nibbled on the balls of Stone’s foot as well as lovingly sucking on the plump heel. She continued on with worshiping Stone’s limp feet for quite a while until they were utterly coated in her saliva. Ayame orgasmed yet again, utterly satisfied as she tried to catch her breath.

“Yeah...yeah that...that made up for it...” As Ayame stared at her handiwork on Stone’s feet the question of what to do with the body came up. She could do the obvious and her favorite thing to do, string up the body in the courtyard as proof of her work for everyone to see when they woke up. Or she could instead search Stone’s room before they would clean it out after finding her body. Considering she was a teacher she had to have some good stuff in there. Though she didn’t feel like lugging Stone all the way to her room and then bringing her to the courtyard. Not that heavy lifting was a problem but the courtyard and teacher’s personal rooms were far away from each other and it’d be a lot of work and a lot of wasted time to do both considering Ayame eventually wanted to go to sleep sometime soon. Ayame went back on forth on the idea, trying to figure out what she should do as Stone’s body continued to convulse in front of her.

12331111121111.content:
Ayame was pretty interested in seeing what was in Stone’s room and taking whatever she pleased from it. Ayame searched the woman, eventually finding her room key in her cardigan’s pocket. With a smile on her face, Ayame easily lifted Stone’s convulsing body as she stared at the woman’s dangling feet.

“Come on Katherine. Time for me and you to have some private time in your room.”

It took Ayame nearly half an hour to travel from the student dorms to the teacher’s living quarters. It did take a bit off Ayame as she had to carry Katherine’s broken but still heavy body that long distance but she eventually managed to get to Stone’s room without any trouble. She placed Ms.Stone on the floor for a bit as she used the dead teacher’s key to gain entry to her room. Ayame slowly opened the door trying to not to make too much noise that could potentially cause others to investigate what was going on. She managed to enter the room without a problem, quickly and quietly closing the door after both her and Stone were inside.

“That was probably a lot less stressful then I made it out to be but I’m glad that I made it inside!” Turning the lights on, Ayame inspected the room quickly coming to realize that it was quite simple and dull without any real touches of personal flair from Stone herself. Ayame plopped Stone’s still convulsing body onto her bed as she started to go through the room for any valuables that she could take back with her which mostly just consisted of her taking any cash she found lying around. As she continued going through the drawers she found something that really caught her eye. In one of Stone’s drawers she ended up finding a small black Instant Camera with a Photo Album next to it.

“What’s this? Did Stone fancy herself as a Photographer or something?” Now intrigued, Ayame picked the album and opened it being both surprised and aroused by it’s contents. Each and every single photo in the album was of someone’s feet whether it be a student, teacher or another faculty member. Some of the photos were obviously taken sneakily without the knowledge of the subject while others were pictures of either knocked out or dead victims. Ayame even found a few pictures of her feet in the album. “Oh my. What a sexy little portfolio you have here Katherine. I would have never imagined someone like you would have such a dirty and kinky secret hobby.” Ayame started to grin as she put down the album and picked up the camera. “And now you’re going to become another photo in this album too.” Ayame started to snap photos of Ms.Stone’s corpse mostly of the woman’s twitching feet. The photos quickly developed as they landed at Ayame’s feet as she snapped a few more photos before being satisfied with the pictures she’s taken.

“Mmm now those are some good photos. Don’t worry, I’ll take great care of this camera and album for you Katherine. Maybe I’ll even add more to it.” Ayame picked up the photos she had just taken and neatly placed them in the large album. She also left a note on the woman’s nightstand so that whoever found the body would know she killed Stone. She didn’t want anyone else to take credit for her kill after all. Finally, Ayame went up to Ms.Stone and gave both of her wet twitching large soles a long and lovingly kiss. “Good night you horrendous woman with wonderful feet. I’ll barely miss you and all your horrible horrible nagging.” Turning off the lights, Ayame left the room as she started to head back to her own making sure to leave the door open. Ms.Stone was left by her lonesome in the room, her body still convulsing from the poison coursing through her entire body. Meanwhile,
