1242121.content:
To-do list for tonight: study for tomorrow’s calculus test, take some vitamins before going to bed, and survive a three-on-one assault by a trio of would-be female muggers who are individually armed and dangerous but as a collective a force to be reckoned with.
So yeah, pretty bad odds.
For them at least.
The diamond-shaped slits on your cowl narrowed in concentration as you sized up all three of your feminine combatants, who sneered in you in turn. Your outfit was a sleek black bodysuit that covered you from head to toe, with your chestplate reinforced with Kevlar to endure some light gunfire. A brown utility belt containing all of your gadgets fitted around your waist, with each leather pouch containing a solution for nearly every problem. And even though your boots, cowl and gauntlets were custom-made to evoke the aesthetic design of a certain caped crusader from Gotham City, the emblem of a crimson red J emblazoned on your chestplate was enough to convey to friends and foes alike that you were your own hero.
Now however, it was time to prove why exactly you were one.
In response to the statuesque brunette mocking your previous taunt, you quickly reassumed a heroic stance and injected a much needed dosage of confidence and authority into your previously rattled tone.
Sizing up her leering yet voluptuous form, you couldn’t help but notice that besides the black garb that all three of them wore the brunette sported a pair of stylish spiked open-toed heels.
You had to question the practicality of her conspicuous footwear especially when her two flunkies both wore boots, but the trivial thought quickly dissipated as you addressed her first.
“Call me what you want, but if you don’t cease and desist immediately you won’t have a lot to laugh at while spending some time in the county jail. After all, talk is cheap. Just like you three bimbos,” you declared confidently, immediately earning the ire of the three.
“Punta, what you just call me?” the Latina criminal snarled angrily, brandishing her baton for emphasis.
“Awwww, ain’t that just adorable?” the redhead mocked in an infantilizing tone. “Virgin Mary over here thinks all because he dresses like a superhero that he can fight like one too.”
The still sneering brunette merely cracked her neck while twirling around her switchblade. “Too bad. He’s about to die like a little bitch.”
And with that, she charged towards you with her knife raised leaving you precious little reaction time to formulate some kind of counterattack. As her long legs easily closed in the gap between you and the women, you quickly factored in her height advantage before deducing
“Hah!” Her cry was punctuated by the knife slashing through the air and towards your spandex-lined neck. It was only by sheer instinct that you were able to evade the blade’s jagged kiss, before also skipping back as she slashed at you yet again.
“Come here you little…” Her swings became more and more unfocused as you ducked her barrage of slashes and stabs, inevitably providing the ideal window for you to execute your countermove.
As her blade curved through the air for the upteempth time and missed your cowl, you quickly ducked and weaved underneath her outstretched armpit to reemerge at her left.
The brunette’s determined scowl was immediately replaced by a confused expression as you took off in her periphery, prompting her to stop mid-slash just like you had hoped.
Taking a page out of some old kung fu movies that you idolized growing up, you ran up the brick wall with the toe of each boot digging into the grooves and crevices of the surface to gain some momentum.
A split second later, you kicked off of the wall with your torso now level with her face before twisting your body in mid-air into a downward punching position.
SMACK! Your improvised aerial Superman punch definitely hit its mark, striking the brunette square in the nose and sending her crumbling to the ground in an unconscious and barely stirring heap.
As the switchblade rolled out of her reach, you casually turned towards her partners in crime.
“Anyone else?” you spoke calmly, beckoning them both forward with just your confidence.
Predictably, they both got over their initial surprised stupor and charged at you in tandem.
Your eyes darted between both of their impending forms, before honing in on the Hispanic thug who was closer.
Dashing towards her as she hefted the police baton, you instinctively ducked as she swung a home run into the empty air that your head occupied a moment earlier.
You then delivered a strong right cross to the petite redhead’s face as she started to lunge at you with the taser. Feeling her cheekbone give away against your gloved fist, you looked on as she tumbled unceremoniously into a couple of overturned trash cans before craning your neck backwards towards the baton-wielding woman.
Skipping back towards her by moving your back leg in front of your bent front leg, you launched your right leg up into the air and connected with a swift side kick to her sternum.
As she immediately clutched her bruised midsection with knees threatening to buckle, you relaxed your stance briefly as she angrily cursed out in Spanish while fighting the urge to dry heave.
Smirking inwardly at her doubled over state, you turned on your heel towards the other woman only to have your bell rung, literally.
CLANG!
Though you thought yourself ready for anything, nothing could’ve prepared you for two flimsy yet firm trash lids colliding against both of your eardrums in unison.
The cacophonous explosion of sound rattled you instantly, the piercing noise pounding in your ears even seconds after the initial crackling impact.
Wincing heavily while still suffering the effects of the redhead’s desperation move, you blindly stumbled backwards as the petite young woman threw away the twin pair of circular objects before cracking her patented taser to life.
As if on cue, the heavyset woman from behind suddenly shook off her grogginess and wrapped her baton around your unprotected throat.
“Aaargghh…” As soon as you felt the hard metal coil around your throat, you immediately thrashed and writhed against her vice grip but it was increasingly difficult to break free with the Latina’s sizable forearm also constricted around your throat.
Matters were only made worse when the redhead staggered towards you with the taser in one hand.
“Hold ‘em steady. I’m gonna make this real slow,” she sneered, her words almost slurring together due to her bloody mouth.
“You hear that, bitch?” the Latina hissed into your ear in a mocking tone. “We’re gonna make you squeal like a little-”
Not even letting her finish her sentence, you reared your head backwards and caught her in the lip with a well-placed headbutt.
As her grip over you loosened up, you grabbed onto her wrist and shook off any remaining cobwebs as the redhead jabbed at you with the taser in hand.
Bending your knees while dragging the larger woman’s bulky physique over you as an impromptu shield, you gritted your teeth as the forked ends of the taser impacted bare skin.
“Aaaahhhh!”
The Latina’s face immediately lit up in excruciating pain as the electrical discharges coursed through her unsuspecting body courtesy of the taser impacting just under her armpit.
Breaking out into bouts of convulsing and shaking violently as the discharges continued to build up in waves of searing pain, she let out one last guttural cry before growing limp while still being slung over your shoulder.
The moment you felt the Latina’s body weight begin to shift towards the ground, you sprang back up and easily knocked her taser hand awry while she remained frozen by what she had inadvertently just done.
Quickly grabbing her by the neck with both hands, you unapologetically lifted up your front leg and smashed her face against your knee. Almost instantly she flopped back down to the ground as crimson red spewed from her nose.
With the redhead staring blankly into the moonlit sky with blood trickling down her face, you turned your attentions to the groggy but still standing Latina who had been leaning against your shoulder for support.
Before she could regain her bearings, you stretched out your right forearm before snapping your elbow directly backwards into her face.
Standing straight for only a moment, her knees quickly buckled prompting her inevitable plummet to the pavement as well.
As the Latina collapsed to the ground, you took a much-needed breath before looking around and simply surveying the three female bodies left in your wake sprawled out in the alleyway.
It was definitely a sight to take in what you just accomplished, successfully taking out a ruthless gang of muggers who by sheer numbers had the upper hand, at least initially.
Then again, you also knew that had just one of them managed to surprise you, you would’ve undoubtedly been overwhelmed, perhaps beaten beyond recognition and ultimately left at their mercy.
After taking a moment longer to fully regain your bearings, you then unclipped one of your pouches.
Five minutes later, sirens screamed from the entrance of the alleyway as a pair of police cars pulled up next to the sidewalk.
The police officers who exited their vehicles on behalf of an anonymous tip quickly had their suspicions confirmed as they turned on their flashlights and came upon the trio of groaning muggers bound together by a metallic circle of cable while sitting cross-legged in a groggy huddle.
Perched atop an overlooking rooftop, you couldn’t help but beam proudly as the police assessed your handiwork before taking off in the opposite direction with a running start and disappearing into the night to search for new menaces to vanquish.
The girl gang were only the first to be defeated by yours truly, but they won’t be the only criminals to occupy a jail cell tonight.
After all, justice never sleeps and neither do you.
Who’s next?
1242121.title: You win and get the three women arrested.

Mama Long Legs!
12421212.content:
Standing up from your vantage point atop the overlooking building, you quickly turned away as the policemen began to formally arrest the Girl Gang with a greater purpose in your step.
Obviously, it could just be the adrenaline rush from taking down three highly dangerous criminals and only boosting your superhero credibility but now you were feeling particularly energized.
So much so that you were now beginning to contemplate your next plan of attack on the city's criminal underworld.
After all, this Girl Gang was only a symptom of the larger disease of infecting the city's underbelly and turning good people cruel. It's the same disease that's corrupted the police department for far too long, and its one that'll only continue to spread by the the block unless something is done.
But fortunately, you were the cure and tonight the process of taking back your city begins.
Step 1 of extinguishing any malignant disease is identifying the root cause, and in this case you've got two in mind: Lily the Hypnotist and the perversely maternal and maniacal mob boss, Mama Long Legs.
Lily is a criminal mastermind whose greatest weapon is her voice and her army consists of anyone who hears it. She may be around your age group, but she's wise beyond her years with a penchant for the extravagant. She treasures material satisfaction above the more standard criminal goals like territorial expansion, but that doesn't make her any less of a threat. She will go through anyone and anything to get what she wants, and with an enthralled entourage of henchwomen at her beck and call she is truly a force to be reckoned with. Luckily, one of your costumed colleagues, Night Cat, cashed in a favor from one of her informants and managed to acquire information regarding her current whereabouts. Recently, she's contacted you with the location of her hideout. Naturally, the element of surprise can only work so much against someone who has the home field advantage, but it would be worth it to take her down in an isolated place out of the earshot of civilians that she can use as pawns to further her agendas. Tonight, you could silence her voice before it enthralls any more poor souls and bring her to justice for good.
Mama Long Legs, however, is a wild card and an enigmatic one at that. She's a rising mob boss with delusions of city-wide grandeur, and has the manpower, or rather womanpower to back it up. Going off of police intelligence that you've "acquired," very little is known about her and even less so regarding her heinous origins. What you do know, however, is that her age does not betray her ambition. She's been on your radar for a long time, and for good reason. Her empire has gradually expanded over the course of a few months thanks to opportunistic assassinations of rival faction crime lords, bribing key police officials in very high places, and especially due to her unprecedented ruthlessness. Her "calling card," is to personally wrap her legs around the neck of someone not in her good graces, and lock them in a deadly game of headscissors that only she can win. That is, until tonight of course. Mama is on the precipice of potentially unleashing a crime wave that this city has never seen before, and it's your duty to stop her.
Stopping at the edge of the building, you examined your utility belt one last time before finally adjusting your mask. You have two targets in mind that need to be brought to justice, and the only question now is deciding who deserves it first.
With that, you jumped off the edge and expanded your custom-made wings to stimulate flight as your built-in levitation did the rest.
Soaring down into the criminal underbelly, you were on a mission and intended to see it through to the very end.
If these criminals weren't going to come to justice, then you would just have to come to them!
12421212.title: More Options!

choices: They drag you back to their home and video tape you worshiping feet.
They videotape you being kicked to death.
1242122.content:
Enraged at their insults you rush forward. You feint towards the brunette with the switchblade and she flinches backward. You pivot and charge the petite woman with the taser. You dodge her Taser and kick her in the stomach and she goes falling backward. The heavy set Hispanic woman charged you at the right moment and clubs you in the shoulder as you try to turn to meet her.

Her blow is quite painful, harder then you thought she could hit! You flinch backward and duck her next swing. Before you can go on the offensive the tall girl with the knife flanks you and tries to gut you. You have to sidestep away from them both. You leap up and use your levitation powers to get some space. Unfortunately you hadn't expected the red head with the Taser to have recovered so swiftly. You felt the Taser prongs hit you and electricity coursed through your body.

You drop the ground trying to control your convulsing muscles. The girls give you no rest though as they immediately begin to kick you. You take a vicious kick to the face that draws blood. The girl with the knife stabs your shoulder causing you to cry out in pain. The girl with the baton stops kicking you and thrusts her baton under your chin and chokes you while the girl with the knife hovers over your face.

"Got you now loser! Thought you could take all three of on huh?"

Your moan of pain is stifled by the choking push of her baton.

The redhead says, "Kill the bitch and lets get out of here."

The brunette smirks, "Nah I got a better idea. Lets have some fun with this loser!"

The Hispanic woman laughs, "Hell yeah, I've been walking around all day, lets make him clean our feet."

"Better yet," the tall brunette says, "Lets videotape it all and post it on YouTube!"

The red head thinks about it and says, "Hmm I guess we could kill him later. Still its kinda risky don't you think? Why don't we just get out my cell phone and video tape him being kicked to death by us right here?"

All the choices are bad for you. How could you lose to three punks like these? They got lucky you think but you don't see a way out of this at all. Bleeding, beaten and battered you wait to find out what they are going to do with you.
1242122.title: You lose!  Uh oh, they humilate you with their ...

choices: You get to the apartment and the "fun" begins.
Something unexpectated happens.
12421221.content:
Luckily they decide not to kill you... at least not yet.

One of the girl's takes out police duty cuffs and locks your hands behind your back. They drag you over to a vehicle, knife pointed at your throat. If you scream they will cut it and so you stay as quiet as a mouse while constantly looking for a way to escape. Sadly, they don't give you any opportunity to do so. They force you into the car and drive off to the brunette's apartment.

"Please don't do this, I'll clean your feet but don't videotape it. If my identiy got out my family could be in..." the Hispanic lady slapped you hard.

"You think we care? You little puta? Fuck your family I hope someone kills them."

Your face twists into a mask of rage. "You'll pay for this, all of you!"

The girls all laugh at your pathetic attempt to intimidate them.

"I know how to shut you up," the woman said. She had on a pair of black boots and she now took one off. Her socks were damp with sweat and she pulled one off and turned it inside out. To your horror she then grabbed your jaw and forced it open and stuffed the dirty sweaty sock into your mouth, gagging you most horribly.

The taste and texture are revolting, you immediately try to spit it out but the criminal covers your mouth with her hands. "Spit it out and I'll cut your balls off gringo."

You believed her. And so you sat there with her filthy sock in your mouth as the car was driven to the brunette's apartment. You began to feel growing terror turn your belly to ice. These women were pure evil. This sock was atrocious you could only imagine what her actual foot would taste like. And then, after they had their fun what were they going to do to you? This didn't look good at all.
12421221.title: They drag you back to their home and video tape...

choices: Yes!  Someone comes along... but will they help you?
Nope the kicking execution continues.
12421222.content:
To your horror they decide to go with the red heads plan! They were going to kick you to death here and now!

The heavyset Hispanic woman pulls out a pair of cuffs and locks your hands behind your back making you helpless. You see she has a pair of black boots on.

"Now you can't get away loser," she taunts you and then spits in your face. Her saliva dribbles down over your mask.

The tall brunette says, "Here try that again," and then rips your mask off! You cry out in horror realizing your secret identity is exposed. The short red head was filming this with her phone so now your secret identity would be out. Of course they planned to kill you soon so it may not matter... on the other hand your family could be in danger! You had an 18 year old sister to worry about.

The heavyset woman in boots spits on your face again and you are deeply shamed. She pulls you up roughly to your knees to set up a kick from the brunette. The tall brunette girl was wearing open toed high heels that showed off her attractive feet. They were painted a deep red. You only notice or care about this for a second before she kicks you full force in the crotch.

You let loose a high pitched screech of pain as she connects with your delicate balls full force.

The redhead laughs, "Crying like a little girl, you fucking faggot!"

You had fallen back down and the big girl in boots stomped on your head and twisted her boot back and forth grinding you into the street. Your skin was getting ripped and lacerated and tears of anguish began to stream down your face.

The brunette slammed her spike heels into your torso at the same time further accentuating your pain.

The short redhead got in close with her camera phone, "Oh yeah, hello You Tube see the great hero Justice crying like a little girl, do you want your mommy? Huh do you, you little faggot?"

You are utterly humiliated, you couldn't believe this is how you were going to die. The Mexican woman in boots leaned in all her weight on your cheek and head and you gave out another agonizing cry of pain.

The red-head handed the phone to the brunette and said, "I want a turn too!"

She was wearing a dirty pair of white sneakers. She stepped back and ran forward a bit and then slammed her sneaker with a kick right onto your trapped face. The kick connected right on your nose breaking it. Your body was a mess of pain, your skin had been scraped off of your cheek, you were sure you had a concussion you were still bleeding from your stab wound AND your balls were throbbing terribly.

The girls laughed and finally the big Hispanic girl got off of your head. But the relief was short lived as started pounding your spine with full throttle kicks from her boots. You tried to squirm away but it was futile. The red-head rained down her own kicks aiming for your face, you tried to duck your head but the horrific kicks to your back kept snapping your face back up for her to kick. When she couldn't connect to your face she hit your ribs and torso.

You were at the lowest point of your life. You had been beaten, hurt worse then ever before. Your secret identity had been compromised and soon they would kill you. At this point you actually hoped they would finish you off sooner the pain was just so excruciating.

Could there be anything that could save you?
12421222.title: They videotape you being kicked to death.

choices: Another Criminal!
A hero has come to save you!

124212221.title: Yes!  Someone comes along... but will they help...

choices: Your identity is all over the news.
Your secret identity is still safe.
1242122212.content:
Nearly blind from agony you didn't see the first part of the attack.

All you knew was that he redhead had stopped kicking you for a moment. When you caught your bearings you saw the redhead down on the ground. The tall brunette with the open toed heels was being pummeled by none other than... Night Cat! Night cat was another hero who helped keep the city safe. She was short and dressed a little bit like the cat woman from the comics but despise her size she was a deadly martial artist.

The large Hispanic woman charged at Night Cat but she ducked under the blow and retailed with a spinning crescent kick to the criminal's face.

You struggled to get up to help but you were too battered to do so. Not that Night Cat needed any help. She demolished the two criminals facing her while the redhead fled as fast as her legs could carry her. You gave out a groan of frustration. "Night Cat... you gotta go after her she saw my face." Night Cat looked at you and did a double take, did she recognize you too? She just shook her head though and said, "Its too dangerous Justice your helpless right now and pretty banged up. Besides its not like I could silence her if she wanted to talk, we'll just have to hope that she can't find your real identity by just your face."

That was an awfully big risk. Wincing form the pain you realize you weren't in much of a position to argue. In fact you were very grateful that you were alive. Your nose was broken, your face banged up, you were sure you had a concussion. At that was just your head and face, you needed a hospital bad. Night Cat finished tying up the bad guys (well... actually girls) and then put your mask back on. She called a private ambulance service to drive you out to a safe house she owned. As you were driving you passed out from the pain and trauma you experienced.

When you woke up....
1242122212.title: A hero has come to save you!

choices: She knew you - but who was she in your "normal" life?
She didn't know you but... she found you attractive.
12421222122.content:
When you woke up you were still in pain but evidently someone had given you some pain killers since it was now just a dull ache instead of agony.

There was a large glass of water by the bed you were sleeping in and you greedily drank it down. Your thirst quenched you turned on the TV and desperately flipped through the news channels seeing if your secret identity had been revealed. Luckily for you and your families sake it had not. Breathing a sigh of relief you decided to look for Night Cat. Your fellow hero had saved your life and she deserved your thanks.

You were in a mansion - could this be Night Cat's home?

As you leave the bedroom you see Night Cat waiting for you.

"I tried to tend to some of your injuries but you were beaten quite badly."

You shudder, your brush with death had been terrifying. "Yes but I think I'll heal."

You noticed Night Cat was looking at you strangely... why?
12421222122.title: Your secret identity is still safe.

choices: You only live once... go out with her!
Politely decline
124212221222.content:
You notice her smile shyly. When she noticed you noticing her smile she blushed faintly and turned away.

You clear your throat and say, "Thank you for saving me Night Cat, if there is anything I can do to help you just name it."

Night Cat breathed in, you could tell she was nervous. Finally she said, "Well if you really want to thank me," she paused for a long moment and the continued in a rush, "take me out on a date!"

The deadly and confident Night Cat was as jittery and nervous as a school girl! You smiled, it was nice to be wanted and well, she had seen pretty much all of you while she had been tending your wounds. After such a dangerous fight it was good to have a self esteem booster like this. But should you go on a date with her? She was pretty enough of course but would that kind of relationship distract the both of you from fighting crime?
124212221222.title: She didn't know you but... she found you at...

choices: The date goes great - no criminals ruin it.
Crime never stops... the date is interrupted.
1242122212221.content:
Smiling you said, "It's the least I can do."

Night Cat grinned at you, "All right tomorrow night? I think the city will be safe without us for one night."

You nod, "All right, well I'll pick you up around 7:00 - sound good?"

The attractive young woman agrees to the time and the date is set. You leave the mansion, still sore but pleased at the positive turn of events. Fighting crime can be dangerous and you found that out today. But it also has its rewards. Hopefully your date night goes well and nothing crazy happens that requires you and Night Cat to fight crime. You both deserved a day off...
1242122212221.title: You only live once... go out with her!

choices: They just kill him.  (Final Chapter)
They kill him and promise to find his sister and do the same.  NOOOOO!!
124212222.content:
With a cry of despair you realize no one is coming for you.

The kicks continue to rain down on you, your ribs are being battered and you feel bone bruises forming on your spine from the Hispanic girls heavy boots.

You feebly try to kick out with your legs but all it does is annoy them. The brunette steps on your shin with her heel and digs in painfully. While its pinned there the Hispanic girl lines her boot up with the side of your knee. She raises it up and smashes down on your knee with all of her strength. It snaps the bone and you give out your loudest cry of pain.

Full out sobbing, you don't even try to hold back your tears any longer.

The red head gets in close with the camera phone laughing and calling you a baby for crying so much. At some point the brunette had handed her back the phone. You were having trouble seeing from the repeated blows to the face so you weren't sure exactly what was going on. All you knew was pain.

Completely helpless they roll you over onto your back. You're lying on the cuffs themselves which normally would be quite painful but its the least of your pains now with the damage they have done to you. With one leg broken and the other leg pinned down by the brunette the heavy set girl with the boots lines up the money shot on your aching testicles.

The redhead stands on your chest as kick after kick strikes your balls. You've never ever felt so much pain. You actually puke from how bad the agony is. Some of it gets on the red head's sneakers and she kicks stomps your face and forces your own vomit back into your mouth.

"Lick your crap off my sneakers!"

Howling in agony you can't really comply but she doesn't seem to care as she forces the sneaker into your mouth. If she didn't have such small feet a shoe would never fit but because she is petite it barely fits. You choke on your bile as she forces her shoe in your mouth, the ridges of her sneaker soles causing your gums to bleed even more.

"Lets see the damage you did," the brunette with the heels tells the heavy set woman.

They cut off your pants with the knife. You can't see over the redhead still standing on you but the girls laugh at the damage.

"Yeah I worked this gringo's balls over good eh? They all purple and one looks smashed and tiny, shits leaking out of it."

The brunette laughed and said, "I'll pop the other one."

You gurgle in agony as the booted woman places your surviving testicle between her boots. You feel a fresh blaze of agony as the tall brunette places her sharp heel of her open toed high heels on your last ball sac. She begins to put her weight on it and you convulse in fresh excruciating pain. The pressure builds, and builds and then all of her weight is on it. *POP* Her heels punctures your nut and your mind flashes red with pain. The three laugh as you arch your back in pain despite the face a woman is on your chest. Raw agony is all that you know.

The girls then each spit in your face one last time.

"Faggot."

"Loser."

"Bitch."

You know your time has come, you just pray that these monsters never find out that you have a sister and visit the same type of horror onto her...

Does the story end here for Justice? Or DO they go after his sister after killing him.
124212222.title: Nope the kicking execution continues.

1242122221.content:
Your blood, their saliva and your vomit drip down your face as the girls step back and get ready to end you.

You tried to fight the good fight. You tried to save the city from evil. But you didn't expect this type of savagery. Bested, tortured and abused so viciously you exhale in pain knowing it is one of the last few breaths you will take.

The brunette starts the beating again with a vicious stomp to your forehead with her heel. Your head bounces off the pavement. The short red-head kicks the side of your face and the heavy set Hispanic jumps onto your chest. The cuffs dig in even harder into your wrists supporting the combined weight of your body and hers. You feel the snap of your wrist bones but with all the other pain in your in this barely registers.

The feet continue to pound you and soon blessedly you lose consciousness. Your eye is punctured by the brunette's heel. Your throat is caved in by a wicked stomp from the boots and the sneakers kick your ear over and over until your skull actually dents.

When they examine your body its a tough call to find the exactly blow that killed you. Either way... Justice is dead.

12422.content:
Justice's eyes narrow. He has spotted a super villain! One of the cruel and powerful female villains who have made the city so dangerous. Justice knows that he is one of the few people who can stop them, the police are almost helpless against their powers. But who has Justice seen?

Stella Star - Stella is a powerful criminal. Her power's are enhanced strength, speed and nearly invincible body. She was a statuesque woman standing half an inch shy of 6 foot. Her platinum blonde hair glowed with radiant energy, the same energy that deflected bullets, turned aside knives and allowed her to punch through steel doors. She was considered the most deadly villain in the country.

Jade - Jade is a petite super villain of African America heritage. She is only 5 foot 1 but no one could afford to underestimate her. Green energy surrounded her and she could strike out with it. A hurled ball of green fire could stop a car in its tracks! Jade could only use it like a whip or even bind someone with it swiftly. Beyond that she was a skilled martial artist.

Lily the hypnotist - Lily was a woman in her mid 20's who learned she could hypnotize just about anyone. The power wasn't instant so she had to get someone helpless first. She liked to hypnotize other women and use them as her henchmen.

Readers Choice! (Come up with something you would like to see!)

Justice was using his levitation powers and his cape to glide across the city. Near one of the financial firms he saw what could only be Jade lashing out with green tendrils of energy. As Justice got closer he saw she was actually whipping a helpless middle aged man. Justice recognized him, he was in charge of one of the biggest stock trading firms in the city.

Justice swooped down and hit Jade with a powerful tackle.

Jade shrieked and rolled shoving Justice off of her.

The rich man fled as Justice turned to face Jade.

"You idiot, I was about to break that man. Robbing banks is so cliche... information and access is the key to real wealth. With the codes to his company I could of made myself a billionaire!"

Justice smirked, "Too bad. Its time you were brought to Justice."

Jade threw out her hand and fired a bolt of green energy. Justice dodged to the side quickly and threw a smoke grenade at Jade. Blinded by the smoke Jade couldn't tell where Justice was. She fired out blasts of energy at random. She was conserving her energy so these blasts of power would not be lethal but if Justice was hit, it could go real bad for him.

*Author's note*

(Flip to 1st person because 3rd person is annoying...)

Your reflexes combined with her not being able to see allowed you to avoid the green energy. You come in close and deliver a powerful blow to her midsection. The wind is driven out of her and you follow it up with with a snap kick to her face. The blow lifts Jade up into the air and drops her down hard on the ground.

You move in to finish her off and she desperately lashes out with her green energy. It hits you but since she didn't have time to really gather her power it only singed you slightly. You grab her and get her into a choke hold trying to knock her out. The police had a special cell that made her powers ineffectual, as long as you could get her there you would win the day.

12422121221.content:
Jade was by herself. As she went limp you knew the battle was over.

You quickly contacted the police who picked her up and ensured she was sedated. And then you were off making sure the city was safe.

Several days went by...

The police chief called and said, "Bad news Justice, Jade has escaped prison."

"What? I thought you had a special cell that prevented her from using her powers?"

You heard the chief sigh, "Yes well, the cell worked fine but she was broken out by another super villain. And well... there's more."

You could hear the hesitancy in the chiefs voice. "What is it?"

"They left a note, they said that they were going to teach Justice a lesson. I know your a hero but when more than one super villain works together. Be careful OK?"

Damn. It was difficult to take out Jade in the first place - if she had help it would be more than twice as hard. Of course it also depended on who she had help from. There were a number of villains that operated in or around the city.

"Hey chief, who was the other villain?"

1242221.content:
Lily was a hypnotist who could control someone's mind better then any stage act. Her powers came from a unique strand of DNA that had mutated within her. Lily had a track record of using this power, first just in school to be voted the most popular and to have any guy she wanted but soon after that she wanted to make quick money. Lily desired wealth above all things, she dreamed of owning the biggest super yacht ever, to that end she started her crime spree.

Physically Lily stood a little higher then average height. She was five foot 8 with blond hair she liked to keep in a ponytail. She was fit and athletic, slender with average sized breasts. She liked to dress all in black and carried a small 9mm gun for protection if she needed to use it. Typically though she had her minions do all the dangerous work.

She always surrounded herself with at least 5 women around her age. She tried to find one's who looked a bit like her, blond and slightly tall to confuse the police and anyone else who might try to stop her.

Justice swooped above the city and saw Lily and her enslaved henchmen committing a crime. What crime where they doing?

Jared saw four girl's on the roof top, one on the top of the ladder they used to get to the roof of the bank and he noticed one more in the driver seat of the van.

Probably the get away vehicle

Justice had a few options. He could try to pick them off, first the van then the girl at the ladder. Or he could go in and try to confront Lily and her entire group directly. It took time for Lily to actually hypnotize someone, a few minutes at least. With his fighting skills and combat suit he could probably take all of them.

124222111.content:
Jared felt confident in his abilities but it never hurt to be careful.

First he would deal with the girl in the van. Landing quietly he swiftly punctured the front tire of the vehicle and waited just behind the driver side door. As the young blond woman felt the tire collapse she opened the door to check on it. That was when Justice struck. He gave the girl a quick jab to the ribs then put her in a sleeper hold. Soon she was down.

Next he flared his "wings" and used his levitation ability to lift himself into the air.

Justice hovered right behind the girl by the ladder and quickly put her into the same hold he put the first girl in. Within second she slumped into unconsciousness. Jared look at where the other four women were working. He could see sparks flying, it looked like they were trying to drill a circle on the roof above the vault. Using as much stealth as possible he lifted himself high into the air and then began his swoop attack.

He was descending at an angle at a very high rate of speed, before any of the girls could do anything he had grabbed one and lifted her off of the roof with him. She struggled and kicked but Justice kept a tight hold on her and landed on another roof. She managed to punch him in the gut but it did little damage. Justice knocked her out with a quick jab to the temple.

And then there were three

Now the women knew he was coming, he saw them draw weapons and look around trying to see which way he was coming. Smiling grimly he flew up into the air again he began his descent. Right before he hit he saw the real Lily shout, "He's there!"

The other two women started firing but their shots went wide, Justice slammed into one of the hypno slaves and carried her to the street. Shots rang out behind him and he ducked into an ally. The women bashed him in the head with her gun and Justice fell. Before she could start firing again Justice lashed out with his foot striking the gun from her hand.

"He's down here!"

Justice was a bit woozy from the lucky blow, it had struck him right right on the head. He tried to shake off the blurry vision but that just made it worse. His opponent picked up the broken chain from a fence and started whirling it in front of her. With Lily and the other henchman coming in quick Jared knew he had to clear his head fast or he was in serious trouble! Could he do it? Could he snap out of it and finish them off?

Justice can't seem to focus. He struggles to stand and leans against the brick wall of the ally. Dizzy or not he knew he had to act quickly before the other two women were on him. "Wait, don't finish him, keep your knife right at his throat."

Justice's vision finally cleared and he realized he was seriously screwed. One of the girl's had a knife at his throat. The other girl with the chain had gotten up and loomed over him idly swishing it in the air. And of course Lily had her boot on his chest.

"Well well, what do we have here?"

"The mighty Justice under my boot heel."

Jared clenched his fists and the knife dug in a little deeper and drew a bit of blood from his neck.

Lily laughed, "I want it all, I want to be the richest woman in the world. And I don't need the likes of you getting in my way. Now unless you want to have your throat slit, you're going to look into my eyes and fall under my spell."

Justice stared at her in horror, she couldn't do this! She couldn't make him be one of her hypnotized slaves, she just couldn't! As he looked into her eyes though he already felt her power starting to turn his brain into mush. He couldn't let her win but if he moved he was dead... what was he going to do?

Dawn arrived and it was the day of the emissary's execution. He had come to plead with the Great Sultan to lower his poor cities tribute. The ruler of An'Anbar had been in a particularly foul mood that day for some reason and it had led to this. His city could not pay and so he was to die. The emissary was filled with sorrow. He would leave behind a fair wife, not as fair as the wives of the Sultan but still a beautiful woman. He would also leave behind three children, his thoughts rested on them as the guards came to get him.

The emissary was a man of middle years and he was slight of frame. He stood only to the Sultan's shoulders and there was no fat on him. He had always been skinny since he did not over indulge in food. He idly wondered how he would be executed and prayed to heaven that his death would be quick.

The Sultan awaited the arrival of the condemned man. His ribs and chest ached. Mya had wanted to 'practice' on him for the execution. The young oriental woman was not big but she was persistent. She had walked all over the Sultan's torso. She had stomped his chest, belly and ribs with her feet hundreds of times. The Sultan had to wear robes that covered his entire chest as to not display the bruises her petite but strong feet had caused him. He did not envy the doomed emissary.

The execution had been planned by Ameera. She, Mya and 6 others from his harem would be the ones to crush the prisoner beneath their feet. The Sultan was excited at the prospect of watching this. He cursed his inability to harden with excitement and he cursed himself for not executing his enemies like this sooner. Trepidation also filled his heart, Mya had told him that she would do all she could to convince Ameera that he should one day face the same fate.

The prisoner arrived and knelt before the Sultan. The Sultan stood, 'You have insulted my rule with your cities failure to pay tribute. Your death will send a message to all of my enemies. Cross me and you face a tortuous humiliating death.' The Sultan let his eyes linger on his cousin when he said those words. His cousin just smirked and the Sultan had to control his fury. How he wanted to cut his treacherous cousin open, it took all of his self control not to order it immediately. Ameera laughed silently at her cuckold husband's impotent rage.

'Your death sentence will be carried out by my lovely wives. It is fitting that a dog like you will be executed under the feet of a woman!'

Murmurs filled the court. This was unheard of. Beheading was a common execution. If the Sultan was truly angry he might have a man dragged behind a horse through the sand until his skin sloughed off his body. But this? To be killed by the feet of women? Unheard of.

The Sultan smiled as he saw the shocked looks on the faces of his court. He waved his wives forward and they took the bound man and threw him to the floor. They then took his arms and retied them to his sides and tied his ankles and knees together as well. The emissary's wide eyed look of fear delighted Ameera. She whispered softly to the prisoner, 'Your suffering will herald a new age.'

It began with Ameera. Every eye in the large chamber was on her as she stepped onto the thin emissaries legs. Her grace was evident as she never so much as stumbled an inch as she walked up those legs to the man's stomach. Her bejeweled sandals glimmered as she began to march up and down the doomed man's chest.

The emissary was in some pain from this treatment however he could not see how this would be life threatening. And then Mya joined her fellow wife. She too walked up his legs, as she got to his stomach, Ameera moved forward onto the man's chest. The man groaned under the weight of the two beauties.

Still maintaining perfect balance Ameera kicked off her sandals one at a time and then placed her foot on the man's face. The man twisted his head to one side so her foot pressed against his cheek. She beckoned over two of the waiting wives and had them sit down on either side of the emissary's head. They pushed their feet against the sides of his face trapping it there perfectly between four feet. Now the poor emissary could not move his neck one way or another, leaving him at the mercy of the feet of Ameera.

Ameera could freely stand on his face. Her sun kissed feet stepped on his nose and cheeks. The emissary had never been so humbled or desecrated! To have a woman walk on you' it was a perversion of the standard order of things. Truly the Sultan must despise him and his city. Shamed and debased he prayed his humiliation would end soon.

Mya began the treatment she had practiced on the Sultan. She would lift her dainty pretty foot and slam it down with surprising strength onto the man's chest, ribs and sternum. He gave off partially muffled cries at the cruel blows and the Sultan winced as he recalled his own. The Sultan had muscle and a strong build, the poor emissary had neither. As Mya continued this torture Ameera seemed to dance with a serpentine grace. She never lost her balance as all the court watched in awe of her beauty.

After several minutes of this Mya marched back down the body, leaving Ameera alone atop the hapless male. She moved to his chest and lifted her foot high. With a thunderous stomp she crashed the sole of her foot into his nose. The man gave a muffled squeal of pain. She stomped again. And again. On that third stomp she broke his nose. But this did not mean she ended her abuse. Five more times she slammed her sun kissed feet into his broken nose.

Blood soaked into her foot. She wiped some of the stains off on his face, he was weeping now. Ameera stepped off of the body and the rest of the wives who were not holding the emissary's face walked over his body. Starting at his legs they formed a line and walked up his legs, then stomped his belly then stomped his chest and finally stomped their feet into his mashed face.

The Sultan's jaw dropped open. Such cruelty, such power, such humiliation he thought. Incredibly he felt his manhood stiffen despite the fact he had so recently been given the horrible draught that kept it soft. The marching continued for some time. Mya's own foot was the one to crack the first rib. The sound was repeated as the stomping and marching continued.

One of the guards shamed himself by throwing up, he had seen executions but this' this was torture of the worst kind. It was soon clear the poor man had not long to live. His breathing was raspy, he didn't even seem to have a nose anymore. His torso was disfigured and he seemed barely conscious. With a sharp clap from Ameera the rest of the wives left his body.

For the finale, Ameera herself stood on her victim. She pushed his jaw up so she could nestle her foot on his throat. Then she pressed down looking straight into the victim's eyes. The man choked and gagged and knew his death was upon him. Right before he expired Ameera looked up into the Sultan's eyes and smiled. The Sultan shivered with fear. That look' it was a promise. A promise that if she wanted to she would do this to him and she would enjoy it.

And then the emissary died. It was a mercy at that point. The Sultan shook the terror away from him and addressed the court again. 'This is the price of treachery; this is the price of defying my rule. Let none forget the lesson learned here today.' The court bowed and the Sultan took his wife by the hand and led her away to his chambers.

The Sultan took his lovely wife to his chambers where they would not be disturbed. When they arrived he lifted her hand to his lips and kissed it, “My love, I have never seen you so beautiful.” Ameera smiled and then slammed her knee into his crotch. The Sultan’s eyes bulged and he fell to his knees.

“Cur if I wanted your opinion I would have asked for it,” she spat.

The Sultan prostrated himself before her, “A thousand apologies Sultana.” He kissed the tops of the fee that had just executed another man. After his ritual task was done Ameera walked over to the pile of cushions and leaned back on the pile. Her feet rested about a foot from the ground. She snapped her fingers and said, “Lick the blood and filth from my foot.”

The Sultan was sickened by the idea of licking blood, of course disobedience was never even considered. He crawled toward his lounging wife and kissed each foot once. Then he began to run his tongue over the blood stains as well as the dirt that had accumulated on her gorgeous bare feet. Ameera sighed contently. The first part of her plan had been a success. Soon she and the other wives would take part in more executions. Soon other tasks would be delegated to them. One day she would do away with the pathetic dog at her feet and rule openly, until that day she would make use of him and torment him for her amusement.

Mya stalked into their private chambers. She was giddy with excitement. “We killed him; we really kill him with our feet Ameera! It was wonderful, he gasped and moaned! Oh I want to do it again and again!” Ameera was annoyed that Mya had just burst in on them however she chose not to say anything. Mya was immature and that made her easy to control. The fact that she despised the Sultan made it all the easier.

“You will have that chance Mya. All the executions from now on will be handled by us. Soon the entire realm will view women in a different light.” Mya looked down on the Sultan, “Can’t we just kill this dog now? I want to kill him, we rule through his cousin instead. The Sultan felt a stab of fear enter his gut. His wife was sleeping with his cousin, his cousin wanted to rule… this could very well happen. Ameera laughed, “I know how much you desire to rid the world of this weakling but his cousin is a real man. He would not allow us to rule as we do now. Besides, don’t you enjoy seeing him suffer?”

Mya clenched her fist, “I want him to suffer more. What he has done to my people… my family. I want him to scream in pain, I want to squeeze the life out of his miserable body. It consumes me Ameera, I dream of it every night.” Ameera nodded with compassion, “I know it hurts Mya but think about the power you will yield how proud your family would have been.” Ameera glanced down at the mighty man she had broken and thought how else Mya could hurt him.

A cruel idea formed in her mind’s eye. It was a risk, the Sultan was broken but he still might have a spark of defiance left in him. If he had any defiance in him this would draw it out. Ameera made her decision and with a wicked smile she told Mya, “I know one way you could make him suffer more.”

The Sultan almost let out an involuntary whimper. What he already had to suffer was great. He was sexually frustrated beyond belief. He was tortured nightly. He had blinding headaches from the accursed elixir. He had been turned into a cuckold and been forced to consume another man’s seed. What was left to do to him?

“The Sultan slew your family. Why don’t you slay his?” A current of rage filled The Sultan, his family? He only had two family members left. His hated cousin who was sleeping with his wife, he was one of them. And since his continued presence and treachery added to the Sultan’s misery he would be safe. The only other family member he had alive was his younger sister who had just turned 18.

His little sister Urbi was as perfect a sister as could be. When growing up she had been dutiful to their parents. She had bathed his wounds from battle later in life. She was graceful, kind and wonderful. She had done no one wrong and was as innocent as the first snows.

Mya laughed, “You mean that little slip of a girl Urbi? Hmmm it might be fun to kill her like we killed that little emissary, she’s even thinner!” The Sultan’s mind whirled. His baby sister destroyed at the feet of his cruel harem? The thought was horrible, he cherished his sister, and he had promised his dying mother to protect her from all harm when she passed three years ago.

Ameera watched the Sultan closely; this would be the final test. If the Sultan allowed his sister to be brutally murdered it would be proof that there was no will in him to resist. As she watched she saw the Sultan’s features harden. But could he really resist her?

I am not fit to serve you, let my last act be to kill these harpies for their treachery.” The Sultan was tempted to give the order but Ameera looked at him coolly and he knew better then to defy her.
“No, that will not be necessary, either part,” The Sultan finally said.

The Sultan raised his voice, “I will let my head wife deal with the harem. But I do have an order. Find my treacherous cousin and bring him here in fetters. He will answer for his betrayal!” The guards bowed low and most departed. Ameera snapped at two of them, “Bind Mya, I will personally execute her at dawn.” Mya gave out a shrill cry and tried to scramble away, “You told me you would…”

“You brainless sun maddened whore. You put my place in jeopardy… that is unforgivable.”

Ameera turned to the rest of the harem. “There will be punishment for you as well but it will not be death. Do not attempt to flee the palace.” Ameera then dismissed the rest of the guards so it was only the Sultan and his harem once more. She slapped him hard, “What kind of weakling are you? Terror of the sands? Hah! Pathetic. If you were not the Sultan I would kill you for being such a pathetic wretch.”
12511111111111111.title: The battle with the women begins...

The story continues (Readers Choice!)
125111111111111111.content:
For once the Sultan was not used that night. Instead he was administered to by healers to ensure no permanent damage had been afflicted. The Sultan reveled in the night free of debasement, torment and pain. He also eagerly looked forward to Mya’s death. The traitorous bitch had been the worst of all his wives. The Sultan closed his eyes and for once had a peaceful night.

The next morning his Sultana decided to execute Mya in front of the court. The Sultan would hold court and all would see the price of betrayal. Both Ameera and her slave were disappointed to learn that his cousin had escaped the city. A bounty was placed on his head. Double if he was brought back alive.

Court began with its usual fanfare. Ameera had given the words to him. Her plans would be accelerated by the events of the night previously. The Sultan stood and spoke with a powerful voice, a voice that had been heard across the battlefield when he was uniting his empire. “Last night my treacherous cousin sought to usurp my kingdom. For this he shall pay. His accomplice was one of my own wives! I am the mightiest of men but even the mightiest can be caught unawares by treachery. I would not stand before you today if not for my wife Ameera!” He paused as the court processed this information. It was unheard of to credit victories to women!

“I know that this news appears strange to your ears but Ameera is not like other women. She is above them, she is my queen, my wife and to all of you she is your Sultana!” Ameera smiled as her husband, her pathetic slave, praised her in open court. “When she speaks, she speaks with my voice. When she gives a command, treat that command as if it came from mine own lips. Disobey her and I will cut you down where you stand.”

And then the Sultan’s voice boomed out. The terror of the sands spoke and his court obeyed. “KNEEL BEFORE YOUR SULTANA!” And his court knelt. The idea of kneeling before a woman was disturbing but none would defy the desert king. His wrath was legendary and mercy was unknown to him. Ameera looked out across the court pleasure. While she did this she made careful note of the men who kneeled who were most angry at the command. These she would cull from the nobility of the court – these would never obey her willingly. Once she eliminated those potential threats she could move on to the next phase of her destiny. But first… Mya was to be dealt with.

The Sultan lowered his voice, “And now your Sultana will deal with the treacherous whore.” Mya was brought into the court. She was stripped naked, and it was obvious that she had been beaten. She was gagged and bound with rope. They threw her down to her knees in front of the Sultan and Ameera. The Sultan sat down and allowed Ameera to address the court.

“My husband has granted me the honor of executing this traitor. Let this be a lesson to all who would oppose us.” Mya stared at her with undisguised hate. Ameera walked forward stately and serene and then calmly smashed her sandaled foot into Mya’s face. Mya gave a muffled cry and fell to the floor. The guards removed themselves from the immediate vicinity and gave room for Ameera to work.

Ameera circled her helplessly bound prisoner. Mya tried to keep her eyes on her but she did not have enough room in her bonds to manage. Ameera lashed out again and again. Each time she struck a different part of her body. Mya was determined not to weep and give the Sultan satisfaction but her determination paled before Ameera’s. The kicks and stomps grew faster and more powerful. Soon Mya’s nose was broken, her ankle smashed from a cruel stomp and bruises colored more of her body.

Ameera snapped her fingers and two female attendants removed her sandals. Now Ameera stood with her bare feet and continued the execution. The court watched in horror as she dismantled the traitor. Her sun kissed feet lashed out like a serpent. The sharp sound of flesh striking flesh echoed the deathly silent court. The Sultan cursed his inability to become erect due to that hated concoction Ameera forced him to drink.

Mya’s tears flowed freely now. Her muffled cries of agony reinforced the price of disobedience to the entire assembled court. Ameera pinned Mya down with one foot and then stomped on her collar bone until it broke. Mya’s eyes no longer held hate; they held the soul of one who begged for death, begged for release from hellish torment. Ameera smiled and spat down on Mya. Still standing on top of Mya’s body naked body she addressed her audience, “This is the price of treachery!” Mya twisted her foot on Mya’s breast and then stepped off the body.

Ameera circled Mya, not yet done with her abuse. Methodically she tore her apart. She pinned her leg on its side and then slammed her foot into the side of Mya’s knee. Tearing the ligaments of the joint causing excruciating pain, Mya’s ragged high pitched screams even escaped the gag wound tightly around her mouth. The other knee was next. After that knee Mya collapsed unconscious. “Bring the smelling salts,” she commanded. Mya was not yet done suffering.

One of the attendants hurried with them and they held them under Mya’s nose until she awoke with a start. Wretched despair was in her eyes as they met Ameera’s cold gaze. Ameera slammed her foot into Mya’s broken nose and then returned to work over the rest of her body. The ribs were next. Merciless kicks from feet that were as soft as silk but as unyielding as stone bruised Mya’s ribs horribly. Ameera spent much time on those ribs. The court shifted uneasily. How long would this execution take? Ameera was only satisfied when the bone turned brittle and broke. And then it was time to work the other side.

Ameera circled the now dying Mya. She spoke quietly under her breath to Mya. “I gave it all to you Mya; I lifted you up to heights you could never dream of. And you threw it away for revenge? You petty worthless ingrate. You nearly cost me my kingdom!” Ameera slammed her foot into those ribs and Mya’s chest again and again, letting the heat of emotion into it for the first time. Mya’s entire body was on fire, all she wished to do was die. Ameera knew Mya would pass soon regardless but she had one last bit of torment to mete out.

Ameera had no intention of wasting time attacking the land Mya was from. But Mya had no way of knowing, and so when Ameera once more whispered down to Mya, Mya quivered with absolute despair. “Know that your death is just the beginning. I will have my slave lead his armies to the land of your fathers. I won’t kill everyone – no that would be too good for you and your ilk. I will enslave them. I will make their men serve as the Sultan serves. I will have your people’s women raped every day. I will erase your culture from history and enslave your people and subject them to horrors like this daily. Die with the knowledge you have murdered your people!”

Mya’s spirit dissolved under this horrible pronouncement. And as this horror and wretched despair grew within her Ameera knew the time was right to kill her. Ameera raised her foot and placed it on Mya’s neck. The soft skin of her soles bore her weight and began to choke Mya. Mya could no longer breathe. Her eyes begged Ameera not to do this to her people. Ameera was amused that Mya actually believed she would go through with all that effort. Ameera did not give that thought away, she wanted Mya to die with the belief her people would be extinguished.

Ameera’s foot now bore down with full force. Mya looked Ameera in the eyes and bent her thoughts to begging her for forgiveness. Ameera smiled as Mya’s last seconds ticked by. Again in a whisper that only Mya could hear, “Your people will know why they suffer Mya. Now die.” Mya quailed at those words. The scorched her soul even more painfully then her burning lungs. Her last moments of suffering were equal parts physical and mental. And then she was gone.

The Sultan’s voice boomed out again. “ALL HAIL SULTANA AMEERA!” His court, stunned speechless by the cruel execution fought to find their voice. But find it they did. They screamed their salute to the vicious Sultana because they feared any hesitation would cause them to meet that same fate. Ameera basked in their forced adoration. It would not be long now. Soon she would rule openly and her pathetic slave would grovel before her in front of his people.

Soon
