Hannah waited by the bus stop and sighed as she saw a car drive past. The bus was late again. The handicapped bus was the bus that would drop her and her wheel chair off at work. Hannah was paralyzed from the waist down. When she was young and not disabled she dreamed about driving. She was so thrilled when she had finally saved enough money to buy an old beater and drive it to school. Hannah had only had the car for a couple of months when… the incident occurred. Her thoughts flinched at the dark day and she willed herself not to remember. Even so tears welled in her eyes and she shook her head and told herself she wouldn’t cry.

Hannah was a petite woman even before the incident. Her features were delicate; her angelic face looked as if it was made of fine porcelain. She was a light colored brunette and looked quite pretty. Many men would find her attractive save for the fact she was in a wheel chair. This was another depressing thought for Hannah. Due to her disability she could never reach an orgasm, all feeling below the waist was completely gone.

Hannah did have pluck. It had been three years after her injuries and she was now 21. She worked hard to be self sufficient and now had a job as a receptionist. She even had a nickname at work “wheels” that was said with affection. When she did smile it lit up her face and one couldn’t help but have their mood lift when one of those rare smiles occurred. And it was a rare smile, while she tried to have a positive outlook she was constantly reminded of things she could never do. Each car that passed on by was a painful reminder that she would never be able to drive.

The bus finally arrived and she wheeled herself to the automatic lift and waited patiently as it put her on the bus. She was looking forward to work; being around people was good for her. When she was by herself she became depressed and would think about all the things she wouldn’t be able to do. She tried to tell herself to look on the bright side. She had a job, she had her own place, but it was hard. For the millionth time she cursed those evil bitches that did this to her.

What happened three years ago? Three years ago she was in her final year of school. She was 18 years old, thin and elfin. She stood at 5 foot two inches and even though she way shy she received a lot of attention from the boys. For the most part she demurely turned them away, she was just not ready for an intimate relationship.

One day the popular quarterback Bret asked her out to prom, Hannah was completely shocked! With some confusion she asked, “But aren’t you dating Kristin?” Kristin and Bret had been a couple for over a year. Kristen was a blonde bombshell. She was 5 foot 9 had a terrific set of breasts and was very athletic. She was captain of the girls’ volleyball team and held many of the school’s female records in track and field.

Bret said, “That’s over now. That bitch is crazy, I’m done with her.” Hannah was nervous, she didn’t want to upset anybody but this was Bret! She looked down and said, “Are you sure?” Bret caressed her chin and tilted it up. “Yeah of course, you really are beautiful and I wouldn’t want to go with anyone but you.” Her heart melted and she smiled her beautiful smile and said, “Yes I would love to go to prom with you.”

That afternoon when school let out one of her acquaintances in her French class asked her to meet her behind the school by the gym. The other girl’s name was Jenny and she was a plain looking girl who didn’t talk too often with Hannah. She wouldn’t explain why she wanted to meet here there but said that it was important. Hannah being a trusting soul agreed. After all she had her own car now so she didn’t need to take the bus. Hannah despised taking the bus; it was the highlight of her year when she could purchase her beat up old car.

Hannah felt uneasy as if a sixth sense was warning her about something. She ignored it and headed behind the school. Almost everyone else was gone as there was no practice that day. Jenny was sitting by the corner of the outside of the gym, Hannah saw that she looked nervous and wondered again why she wanted to talk with her. As she drew closer Jenny waved her forward and loudly said, “Hello Hannah!”

As Hannah arrived next to Jenny three girls sprang out from around the corner. Kristen and two other girls on the volleyball team came around straight at Hannah. Hannah just started and was completely surprised when Kristen slammed her against the wall of the gym. “Got you now you stupid slut.”

Hannah looked fearfully up at the larger girl. “What’s g-going on Kristen?” Kristen delivered a vicious blow to the smaller girl’s stomach. Hannah doubled over but Kristen viciously pulled her back up by the hair. “Don’t you dare play dumb with me! You little whore you are trying to get with MY man.”
1252.title: "Wheels"

choices: The story continues
12521.content:
Hannah struggled trying to wriggle free but Kristen’s grip on her hair was ironclad. Hannah gasped in pain and said, “Let me go.” Kristen pulled on her hair and whipped her head down and then back up as she leaned close to her face. “You aren’t even denying it you little slut, what the hell did you do give him a blow job right here at school you dirty skank?”

Hannah responded, “I didn’t do anything! He asked me out he said he had dumped you.”

“YOU LIAR!”

Kristen screamed at her and punched her full on in the face. Kristen let go of her hair as Hannah crumpled to the ground. Hannah’s eye socket had been hit straight on and she saw stars as her world spun. With no chance to recover Kristen kicked her with her powerful legs. The first strike hit her breast and lifted her in the air slightly her next cracked into her ribs with thunderous force.

After several blows all Hannah could do was curl into a fetal position and cry out in pain. Kirsten once again pulled her up by her hair and angrily asked her, “Don’t you lie to me slut, what the fuck did you do to get my man?” Hannah whimpered in pain and begged her tormenter, “Please stop please.”

Kristen yanked her up to her feet, again by the hair, and threw her back into the gym wall. One of the other girls chimed in, “Answer her question slut.” Kirsten said, “Its whores like you willing to give blow jobs or fuck guys at a moments notice that ruin guys for the rest of us.”

Hannah coughed; her chest ached from the blows. She said, “Kirsten I-I didn’t sleep with him I swear.”

“LAIR!”

Kirsten attacked like a savage lioness. She clawed at Hannah’s eyes, Hannah shrieked and tried to shield herself with her hands and was promptly slammed to the ground by one of the other girls. Kristen jumped into the air and crashed with both of her sneakered feet onto Hannah’s breasts. She slammed her foot into Hannah’s face and ground her tread into her face. Hannah screamed.

“Shut” *Stomp* “the” *Stomp* “fuck” *Stomp* “up!” *Stomp*

Kirsten yelled as she stomped her foot into Hannah’s face. Hannah cry’s died down; she was desperate to avoid further abuse. She felt utterly helpless and feared for her life. She just wanted the beating to end she was willing to say anything to make it stop.

Kirsten once again hauled the petite woman by the hair. “Are you ready to stop lying slut?” Hannah nodded meekly. “So tell me you whore what did you do to get my man to want to go out with you?” Hannah lied and said, “I.. Kristen I’m s-so sorry. I uh, I gave him a blow job between passing period.”

The girls hooted and laughed and called her slut, skank, whore, bitch, cunt, and trash. Kirsten was not laughing though she seemed to be getting even angrier. “I KNEW it. You dirty bitch. You dirty nasty bitch. She spat in Hannah’s face. “You are trash look at you do you think these would ever impress a man?” She grabbed at Hannah’s tits and viciously twisted.

Hannah took the abuse and said, “I-I’m sorry please stop. I’m so sorry please Kristen, please.” One of Kristen’s friends said, “Yeah beg you cheap whore, beg on your knees.” Hannah still eager to avoid a further beating knelt on the ground and continued to beg. “Please Kristen, I’m so sorry for what I have done. P-Please forgive me.”

Kristen still stared at her with a burning intensity that twisted Hannah’s gusts with terror. The other friend said, “You are such a worm groveling in the dirt begging your superior, you aren’t fit to clear her shoes.” The other girl laughed and said, “Hah she might not be worthy but I want to see her lick the dirt from Kristen’s shoe!”

Kirsten still silent and still staring down at Hannah blinked once and then a slow cruel smile formed on her face. She lifted one leg up and extended her foot.

“Lick.”

Hannah swallowed thickly and stuck out her tongue and began to lap at the grimy bottom of Kristen’s sneaker. All the dirt and grime from a full day’s worth of school and practice were on those shoes. While Kristen remained silent the other two cruel women continued to taunt and laugh. They ‘helped’ by pulling her head back and spitting in her mouth to give her more moisture.

After several minutes Kristen switched feet. Hannah could taste the dirty grit in her mouth as she continued her disgusting task. After making sure every bit of grime was off the sneaker she meekly said, “Again I’m just so s-sorry for what I did. Please Kristen you are so much better then me this won’t happen again please Kristen please forgive me.”

Kirsten stepped back still staring down at the smaller girl on her knees begging. Hannah’s tear streaked dirty face didn’t look very pretty now. Most people would have been satisfied. Most people would have left it at that. But that wasn’t enough for Kristen.

Kristen’s response to Hannah’s request of forgiveness?

“No.”

Kristen turned and lashed out with a brutal round kick to Hannah’s temple.
12521.title: Cripple Time

choices: Dr. Rice wants to try something new...
Kristen returns
125211.content:
That blow knocked Hannah unconscious. Perhaps that was a mercy. Kristen didn’t stop her attack and Hannah was dead to the world. Perhaps that was a good thing. On the other hand if Hannah was awake maybe her painful cries for mercy may have been heeded. Maybe, maybe not.

Did Kristen deliberately break Hannah’s spine? At the trial she would say it wasn’t done on purpose that it was just a catfight gone horribly wrong. Her friends did not dispute her events of course. But Hannah would always wonder how many times Kristen deliberately smashed her heel into her lower spine as she lay helpless and unconscious.

The truth was more depraved then the jury could believe. Kristen knew exactly what she was doing. Her stomps were placed with the specific purpose of cracking her vertebrate and leaving her paralyzed. At her trail she had her boyfriend (who was now under her thumb again) testify that he in fact had told Kristen that he had slept with Hannah and he felt terrible that he had caused the fight.

Kristen had taken the stand and shed tears saying how sorry she was and how she felt so terrible. She was found guilty but her sentence was only five years, she was out in two on good behavior. Hannah tried not to think about the injustice of it. Kristen was out in two years while she would be imprisoned in the wheelchair for life.

The bus dropped her off at the office. Again she patiently waited while the lift slowly lowered her to curb. She wheeled herself into the office and was greeted by a cheery set of “hey Wheels” and “Good morning.” She smiled one of her rare smiles; it was good to belong somewhere.

Her day passed and she enjoyed it, not that the work was interesting but the dialogue with people, the friendly smiles she received or a compliment from one of her office friends was probably more beneficial then any number of visits to her therapist. Today she was scheduled to visit that therapist after work.

Therapy did help her issues but sometimes she thought talking about them made it even worse. After she recovered from her other injuries, minus the broken back that crippled her for life, she was hounded by nightmares. Nightmares about being alone, nightmares about being beaten up, nightmares about school and nightmares about… feet, were all common place.

The painful routine with the bus occurred again and she was dropped off in front of her therapist’s office. She wheeled herself up the handicap ramp and rolled in. Her therapist was name Dr. Rice, she was a kindly looking woman in her 40’s. They began as usual with how Hannah had made it through the week.

“Well Dr. Rice I only had four nightmares last week! I think we are making progress,” Hannah said optimistically. Dr. Rice shook her head, “Hannah I know it was traumatic but that is not much progress, if you would just talk about what is occurring in your nightmares we can air out those issues and get to the root of them, only then can we heal them.” Hannah shook her head, “I know what the root of the problem is, and it was those girls and what they did. I can’t relive it, I can’t tell you about it, I-I, I just can’t,” she finished with a sob.

Dr. Rice sighed and said, “All right Hannah lets go over breathing and positive thinking exercises.” The rest of the session was pointless to Dr. Rice, without getting to the root all of this would just relax Hannah and no real healing would occur. But still it did help and hopefully with time Hannah would open up.

At the end of the session Dr. Rice thought of a new idea. “Hannah if you can not talk about it, why don’t you write? Keep a journal of your nightmares, your feelings and fears. No one has to see it but just putting it on paper can be very therapeutic.” Hannah’s lip quivered but then she steeled herself and said, “Maybe you’re right Dr. Rice, I think I will do that.”

Hannah left and once more endured the monotony of waiting for the bus. She let out a wistful sigh as her dream car, a shiny Mustang drove past. She was dropped off back at her home; she wheeled herself up the wheelchair ramp and let herself in. That evening she got out pen and paper and a notebook. The pen trembling she began to write about her nightmare the night before.

Dear Journal,

I was so scared. I was back in school, when I could still walk. And I was cornered. Kristen and the entire volleyball team had me trapped inside the gym. As always Kristen loomed larger than life. In my dreams she is always at least 6 feet tall if not larger.

I try to run but it’s no use I’m surrounded. Kristen is there everywhere I turn. They throw me to the ground and kick me. I try to block but they come from everywhere and I’m helpless the pain is intolerable. Kristen is always the cruelest; she grinds my fingers with her shoes to the gym floor until they are bleeding raw.

I beg for mercy but they just laugh. Kristen then says, “I’m going to cripple you. I am going to stomp on your spine until its mush!” I cried out to her begging her to spare me, I beg and cry and tell her I’ll do anything.

“Well you dirty little whore, if you clean each our shoes AND our feet I won’t cripple you.”

I began with Kristen’s shoes; I cleaned my own blood off of them with my tongue. It didn’t end there. Kristen took off her shoes and the smell nearly made me pass out. How could her feet smell so bad? But I didn’t want to be crippled I didn’t want too live my life in a wheel chair. When I am done with the disgusting putrid task of licking her foul feet there is the next girl to service. And the next. And the next.

Time seems to crawl and there is an endless parade of feet and shoes. I feel like I have been there forever when finally all of their feet are clean. It is finally done and my mouth is numb from the dirt, there is no moisture left and my throat is raw from swallowing the mud from their shoes.

Kristen seems to grow larger as she looks down at me and says, “Well that was fun but its time to break your back, its time to snap your spine.” I scream out “NOOOOOO” but one of the other girls stuffs the most horrendously vile socks into my mouth and my protests are silenced. And then it happens. Kristen jumps in the air and I squeeze my eyes shut against the inevitable pain.

Then I wake up, realizing it was all a dream. Except the worst part, the very worst part. I am still a cripple and that will never change, I will never know the joy of an orgasm or the feel of a man inside me. I will never walk again. That part is worse then the entire dream.

In tears she put down the pen and closed the notebook. That night she lifted herself into bed and prayed that she wouldn’t have another nightmare that night. Fearfully she closed her eyes.
125211.title: The story continues

choices: dr. rice takes the girls on a retreat
something else?
1252111.content:
Hannah went through another week of similar nightmares all ending at the mercy of Kristen's feet. Writing them down on paper did help but it didn't stop the nightmares. Dr. Rice talked on the phone with Hannah and was able to get her to open up about her dreams. Dr. Rice knew Hannah was traumatized by Kristen and what she did. The humiliation and pain overwhelmed her to the point it stuck in her head and she couldn't shake it. When Hannah arrived at Dr. Rice's office everything seemed normal. She wheeled herself next to the sofa for patients and Dr. Rice sat in her plush chair. Dr. Rice said "Hannah, I've got a special treatment for you based on your nightmares. I need to try some tests with you. Would you be open to this?" Hannah replied "Sure whatever you think will help. I can't keep living like this."

Dr. Rice said "Good, first we need to get you on the floor like in your dreams." Hannah was a bit skeptical but allowed it and was soon on her back in Dr. Rice's office. She saw Dr. Rice towering over her and being in her mid forties she took very good care of herself. She stepped over Hannah's head so her feet were on the floor at each side of her face. Hannah looked up at the giant looking doctor who was looking down at her like Kristen did in her dreams. Dr. Rice asked "Do you have any fear or anxiety right now? Are you scared?" Hannah said "No, I trust you doctor." The doctor wrote down something on her clipboard and began shifting her feet.

Hannah watched Dr. Rice slipped her barefoot out of her high heel shoe and held it about 6 inches from her face. Feelings began to stir in Hannah's crippled body as she stared into the sole of her doctors foot. Dr. Rice asked "How do you feel now? Do you fear I may hurt you? You realize that its just a foot don't you? It will not harm you." Hannah was starting to shake having flashbacks of being stomped but she knew her doctor wasn't going to hurt her. Dr. Rice watched Hannah studying her reaction. Then without any warning she lowered her foot down onto Hannah's face.

"I want you to experience someone stepping on your face without hurting you. I want you to see its not a bad thing. Does my foot bother you? Can you bear it? And for how long?" Dr. Rice asked. There was a pause as Hannah laid there smelling the older woman's barefoot gently planted in her face. Hannah replied "I-I-I-I don't feel s-s-scared. Just nervous I guess. I mean, in my dream the person stepping on my face is mean. You're a nice person." Dr. Rice knew this wasn't going to work. She asked her "What if I was to ask you to lick my foot? Would you want to do it or would you have to be forced?" Hannah was getting more nervous. Was the doctor turning on her? Hannah answered back "I would have to be forced. I guess I'm just not as scared here than in my dreams."

Dr. Rice said "Exactly. But what if I could scare you but promise you no harm. Would you accept my treatment?" Hannah still having her face buried under the soft sole of the good doctor spoke confidently into her foot "Sure. If you could scare me and not harm me I'd accept any treatment." Dr. Rice smiled at her patient on the floor and said "Good, good. I have a special guest for you to meet....KRISTEN!!!!" Hannah's eyes opened wide in shock as Dr. Rice held Hannah under her foot as Kristen walked around the couch and appeared above Hannah's head looking down at her.

Hannah shook like crazy bringing a giggle out of Kristen and Dr Rice tried to calm her down saying "Relax Hannah. I've talked with Kristen for weeks now and she's over this whole thing and wants to help you get over it too. I'm paying her to be here and she doesn't want to hurt you. Just calm down." Hannah was breathing heavy now inhaling the doctor's foot odor making Kristen laugh out loud. Kristen began taking off her sneakers and socks and did what she had rehearsed with the doctor.

Kristen walked over to Hannah looking down with a smile from ear to ear. Dr. Rice stepped off Hannah's face and just like in her dreams Kristen shoved her sweaty disgusting foot right on Hannah's pitiful face. Deep down Kristen took great pleasure in doing this. She went to prison because of this crippled bitch and even though she wanted to move on with her life she got great satisfaction stepping on her face. Just as the doctor told her she said "I'm sorry Hannah you're having bad dreams about me but I'm not going to hurt you. I don't even want to step on you but Dr Rice says you need this to help you. Maybe you'll end up having sweet fantasies about me if this works." Kristen stood there holding her foot firmly in Hannah's face and was a lot more rough rubbing it in than Dr. Rice was.

Hannah finally got over the shock of her arch enemy stepping on her face and said "this is crazy. How is this helping?" She went to grab for Kristens ankle but Kristen bent down and grabbed each of hannah's wrists and said "oh no no no. You stay there and learn how wonderful this is." Kristen laughed as the hour went by Hannah surviving on Kristens foot odor she was relieved to hear her time was up. They put Hannah back in her wheel chair and Dr rice asked "Was that so bad? See Kristen doesn't want to hurt you. We want you to move on with your life. This treatment seems promising." Hannah said she didn't want to do the treatment again but Dr. Rice said "Nonsense! You can do one more session with Kristen. Just one more." "Fine! Just one more." She answered and was about to roll herself out when Kristen said "You could thank me for taking my time to come help you. Just saying."

Hannah was upset and scared and Dr. Rice agreed "That would be nice Hannah." Hannah sighed and pathetically said "Thank you Krist..." Kristen lifted her barefoot and put it right in Hannah's face. "Kiss my foot and thank me...C'mon you can do it. Show Dr Rice my foot don't scare you and you want me to be nice in your dreams." Hannah was fuming inside but just to get this over with she puckered up her lips and kissed the stinky ball of her foot wedging her nose briefly between Kristen's toes. Then thanked her for helping. Kristen removed her foot and Hannah bolted out the door.

Kristen couldn't wait for the next session but what happens? Dr. Rice takes them on a retreat to a cabin in the woods? Does Hannah's nightmares get worse or Kristen return to her evil self?
1252111.title: Dr. Rice wants to try something new...

choices: Kristen takes charge
everything seems normal the next morning
12521111.content:
Hannah was very skeptical but packed her things and waited for Dr. Rice to pick her up. she decided to go on this retreat into the mountains a few miles out of town to just get away from everything and get over this nightmare chapter of her life. As the big van pulled up in front of her house she wasn't happy to see Kristen already in the front passenger seat. The women got out of the van, Kristen grabbed Hannah's bag and Dr. Rice gripped the wheelchair and pushed her to the can and in with the use of special ramps they had.

Once the women were all in the van they took the two hour drive into the dense mountains and arrived at a small cabin. There was a fireplace outside and the cabin was just a cozy room with a sofa and two plush chairs and a small walk in kitchen. There was stairs which led to a loft bedroom above that had a small bed and dresser. There was a railing that went around the area on two sides and you could look down at the sofa area from one side and the other side just over looked the stairs at the wall end of the cabin.

There was no wheelchair access and two steps to get in the only door. Dr. Rice and Kristen had to carry Hannah in and the wheelchair couldn't fit and had to be folded and re opened to get in. Once inside Kristen took the van to get supplies and food leaving Dr. Rice with Hannah for a good opportunity to talk. As the van pulled away Dr. Rice recommended a quick session which Hannah agreed. Dr. Rice took out handcuffs and walked behind Hannah. Then she pushed Hannah forward and locked her hands behind her back. Hannah started yelling "What the hell are you doing?!" and Dr. Rice answered as she walked in front of her "Calm down sweetie we just need to get you in the hopeless state of mind you are in when you have your nightmares. Now, don't you feel helpless right now? How would you ever get out of this if I were an enemy?"

Hannah looked into the emotionless eyes of her doctor waiting for an answer and said "I guess the only way out would be to do what you say because you're the only one who could get me out." The doctor said "Good, and if that's true that would make me very powerful to you. Your fear of being beaten by feet is overwhelming and you need to realize they won't always hurt you. Since right now I'm such a powerful person to you Icould make you do anything I want and as your doctor I want you to get over here and beg me to let you lick my feet."

Hannah was shocked "Are you crazy! I can't do that! First I'm in a wheel chair and my hands are cuffed behind me. Uncuff me now now! I'm done with this session!" Dr. Rice looked at her and said "You'll be done with the session when I say. You're experiencing the same helplessness but you won't be beaten so just do what I said and you'll see how easy it can be when you just try to enjoy it." Hannah now thought the doctor was crazy and just doing her own practices on her. She tried to argue but the doctor started reading a book and said she wouldn't stop reading until Hannah was on the floor begging to lick her feet.

Hannah struggled and moved as the doctor silently read her book. Finally she was able to rock herself off the wheelchair falling face first on the floor. She cried and tried to get Dr. Rice to show mercy but she kept on reading her book. Hannah took painstakingly long moving her upper body to drag her dead legs across the floor. She was completely exhausted and was going to get out of here right after this session was over. As she squirmed and had her face inches from Dr. Rice's feet she said "Okay, please Dr. Rice can I lick your feet? Please."

Dr. Rice put down her book and smiled saying "Well since you're begging I guess I should let you. Its remarkable how you can't walk or move your arms now but you squirmed all the way across the floor just to lick my feet just so I'd take off those handcuffs. I don't know if I would have done the same. But its your decision and now you get to lick my feet." Dr. Rice kicked off her leather flats and rolled Hannah onto her back. Quickly she sat back in her chair and planted both steaming sweaty feet on Hannah's face. Her heels rested near the top of her forehead and her toes hung off the edge of her chin.

Hannah was in stinky darkness when she heard a page turn as the doctor was reading again but heard her say "I don't feel any licking. Maybe you want to spend the day on the floor?" Hannah licked the stale salty feet burying her face smelling feet while her doctor sat in her chair reading and considered this therapy. The session was over an hour when the door swung open and Kristen walked in with bags of groceries. She saw the scene and was laughing hysterically. She was wearing short shorts and tennis sneakers and walked over to Hannah and stepped on her stomach and said "Does she need me trample her doctor? I'll be glad to. You like smelling old lady feet Hannah? Gross. Hahaha!"

Hannah felt Kristens foot on her belly and wanted to scream but she stayed focussed and kept licking the feet in her face. Kristen went back to the van to get more bags and Hannah heard Dr. Rice say under her breath "My feet don't smell as bad as yours bitch." Hannah wondered why she would say that about Kristen. Has she smelled Kristens feet or just defending her own? Kristen popped her head in and said "Hey Doc, come help me with these bags. The cripple isn't going anywhere."

Hannah felt a huge pain in her heart when she heard that and Dr. Rice actually stepped off Hannah's face put on her shoes and helped with the bags. The two women then stood over Hannah and talked. Kristen said "Don't uncuff her. Leave her there. Let her get over it." Dr. Rice said "Well she did lick my feet so I should let go." Then Kristen said "She didn't lick my feet and mine are the ones she dreams about. She should have to lick mine to be uncuffed." The doctor didn't disagree and with little resistance being that Hannah was truly afraid of Kristen, Hannah watched Kristen get barefoot and licked her stinky grimy feet for another hour.

The girls freed Hannah and put her back in her wheelchair and cooked by that time lunch and soon Hannah was detecting a weirdness to the whole relationship between Kristen and Dr. Rice. The doctor seemed to be in control if you looked at them but anything Kristen decided is what got done. Kristen was the one who decided it was bedtime at 8 o'clock. They laid Hannah on the couch and said that Kristen was going to sleep upstairs on the floor and Dr. Rice would sleep in the bed.

Two hours after bedtime Hannah heard them whispering from the loft. They were doing something and it went on for almost an hour when she heard Kristen whisper loud enough "Fine you have to pee. Fine!" And she heard them coming down the stairs. She pretended to be asleep as they went past her and her heart began pounding when she took a glance from her couch. She saw Kristen in plaid Pajama pants and shirt and fuzzy slippers. Then in her hand was a dog leash and she was pulling a naked Dr. Rice on her knees crawling behind with only the collar on her neck. They went out the front door for about a minute what Hannah could only assume was to let Dr. Rice pee.

Hannah froze in terror. This was her worst dream come true. The door opened again and Kristen came through and turned to Dr. Rice on her knees in the doorway and said "Now be a good doggie and don't wake Hannah up." Dr. Rice said "Of course. Sorry Master." Kristen lifted up her foot and wiped the bottom of her slipper off on her face and said "You'll be sorry if she wakes up." Then wiped the other foot off on her face and pulled her back upstairs. They whispered a little more as Hannah couldn't get to sleep at all.

Does Hannah try to escape? The women reveal their wicked plans? Kristen is the lone alpha female and will be master of the two women.
12521111.title: dr. rice takes the girls on a retreat

125211112.content:
Hannah spent the night terrified of her newly discovered situation. Her psychologist was her worst enemies slave and hey were all alone in the middle of the mountains. There was truly no escape and no way of getting home without their help. How could such a professional doctor be such a submissive freak that she would give in to her desires to one of her patients worst enemy? Hannah couldn't imagine how much trouble she was in.

Dr. Rice came down from the loft in red silk pajamas and saw Hannah awake laying on the couch. "Good morning Hannah. Would you like some breakfast?" Dr. Rice asked. Not wanting to give away what she had discovered last night she acted normal and answered "Yeah sure." Dr. Rice began boiling water in a pot and walked to Hannah and told her that she had a great idea for her rehabilitation. Dr. Rice didn't wait for a response and pulled Hannah right off the couch making her drop face down on the hard wood floor. Hannah was about to scream when she remembered what she saw last night and felt the doctors barefoot step on the back of her neck pinning her face to the floor.

Holding Hannah under her foot Dr. Rice explained "I've decided that the only way you're going to get over your nightmares is to live them without the bad experience of them. You will spend the day on the floor at mine and Kristen's feet. You will see that it isn't the nightmare you believe but possible a good experience. I saw how you squirmed to lick my feet with your hands cuffed behind your back so you should be fine with your arms free. 1252112.content:
Hannah continued writing in her journals during the next few weeks. She detailed the terrible dreams that she had. Many of them were about being kicked, stomped and trampled on. Many also had her having to clean dirty stinky feet and shoes. But those were not the only nightmares she had.

She had developed a fear of helplessness as well. Being in very enclosed spaces scared her deeply. An elevator was OK as long as it was not too full. Her nightmares had her in a tiny box unable to escape and just left there forever, no matter how loud she screamed or how hard she hit the box she was trapped. Other variations of the dream had the box fill with water or just being buried alive.

Hannah dutifully continued writing in her journal and as Dr. Rice predicted this did actually help her. Hannah’s nightmares occurred less frequently, though still at least twice a week. Hannah then received a phone call that would change her life again. Her attorney who had been going after the school in a civil case called. She had brought a law suit forward against the school, the school had been trying to fight it but her lawyer called with great news, they were settling.

Hannah was glad she asked, “How much are they offering?” The lawyer at the other end was quite pleased when he said, “Millions, apparently a major news network wants to do a big story on school violence and wants to make your case the center piece, when the school found out they felt they would have terrible publicity if they were fighting in court against a paralyzed student they failed to protect.”

Hannah went over the details and had some papers to sign. In the end she agreed to an annuitized settlement, she would receive $500,000.00 a year for the rest of her life. Hannah wasn’t sure what she wanted to do with the money but one thing she did do was keep her job. She enjoyed the human contact just too much.

When the media story was played she received a ton of requests to do interviews but refused all of them. While she had made progress with her journal she just couldn’t say what happened out loud. The story made the national media and was part of a broader cycle regarding school violence; Hannah did her best to ignore all of it, thought it irritated her when they announced to the world she was getting half a million dollars each year from the school. She feared that her co-workers would treat her differently, her fears proved unfounded however.

One indulgence she did allow herself was professional piano lessons. She had a natural talent and purchased a grand piano for her home. She diligently practiced at it for hours after work, thrilled that she could create such beautiful music even if she was disabled. This led to a brand new nightmare. It was terrible for her, made all the worse because she was truly developing a talent as a pianist.

Dear Journal,

Last night I had a real bad one. It was just really bad. I dreamt that I was going to have the chance to perform live in front of thousands of people. It was going to be my big night and all eyes were on me. Oddly enough in this dream I was in a wheel chair, normally I’m whole and I become crippled but this time I was as I am now.

I wheeled myself to the piano, it was perfectly polished grand piano and the spotlight was on me. And then she was there. Kristen. Why was she here I wondered? She was wearing stiletto heels and with no warning she kicked me in the chest knocking me to the ground. She dragged me out of the wheel chair in front of everyone.

Sneering down at me she furiously yelled at me, “You are supposed to a cripple and worthless, I see I didn’t do a good enough job the first time!” Those stilettos then stomp down on my fingers. I feel them snap as she stomps on my hands. With her heel she pinned down my hand and then place her other spiked stiletto on top of the joint. With that point grinding down onto my finger I felt so much pain I thought I would mad.

She laughed as I screamed for each and every single joint for each of my fingers. My throat was raw when she was done. She glanced with disgust at the blood on her heels. “Try to be a little useful and lick the blood off of my shoes.” Broken and crippled once more I obeyed, I felt sick and nauseated from pain and disgust but I couldn’t stop myself. I licked and sucked my own blood from her heels. She then walked off the stage and the crowd started to boo at me. I awoke trembling, clutching my hands so thankful that they weren’t taken away from me as well.

Another couple of weeks passed. Hannah had come home and had finished practicing on her piano. She pulled herself into bed as normal and froze as she thought she heard something. She paused for a tense minute then believing it was nothing she put her back down onto her pillow. More silence, she put the sound out of her mind and drifted to sleep.

Once again Hannah should have trusted her instincts. The multi-million dollar settlement paid in increments over her life drew media attention. A lot of people learned about the story, including Kristen. Kristen had spent two years in prison. And while prison was not a cup of tea she was athletic, confident and had a killer instinct. Without any men around she learned the joys of having women service her orally.

When she heard that little Hannah was going to be set for life she was furious. In Kristen’s mind she was the victim. She was a star volleyball player who could have made it to Olympics if it wasn’t for Hannah pissing her off so much. So she flew back to her home town with Erica a woman she had met in prison. Erica was two inches shorter then Kristen putting her at 5 foot 7. She was not fat but she was voluptuous with a big ass and large breasts. Due to these factors as well as being Hispanic she was often giving “J-Lo” as nickname.

Both of the women in their early 20’s had scoped the home for days. They had broken in once previously to check if there were any alarms. Erica had shaken her head when they found there were none and remarked, “What an idiot, did you stomp on her head when you were in school with her too?”

They had hid in the house as Hannah played the piano and had gone to bed. When they were sure she was good and asleep they moved into action. They doused a rag with chloroform and Kristen took the rag and climbed up the bed. She put down the rag quickly covering Hannah’s mouth and nose with it. Hannah jolted awake only to look up in terror at Kristen’s grinning face. The chloroform hit just as the full horror of her situation dawned on her. Her muffled soul despairing shriek quickly faded into unconsciousness.

I had a pretty decent life. I had a wife that loved me, I owned a business, and I had a nice little property in the country. I should probably introduce myself, my name is Alan, I am about 5 foot 8, brown hair, a little on the pudgy side, a year shy from 30. My wife is 5 foot 4, has short blond hair, is around the same weight as myself. Together we own a small café. About three years ago I quit my job as an accountant, she quit hers as a waitress. We decided to tap our savings, get a loan and do the American dream thing, open up a business, run it ourselves and have fun doing it.

It didn’t go well. To make a long story short, we racked up credit card bills, lost money every year, and worked 12 hours a day just to stay afloat. My wife Becky was determined to do anything to get the business to work. It made it worse that Becky’s cousins constantly teased her with how slow business was. My wife is 26, she has two cousins and they are sisters. One is 25, she is about 5 foot 6, has long brown hair, brilliant blue eyes and to make an objective comparison, was hotter then my wife. Of course when they were younger she constantly took my wife’s boyfriends and belittled her. The little cousin always got the guy. I suppose I should have been thankful since a lost boyfriend made room for me! Her name is Tanya. Her other cousin was… well no other way to put it, a snob. Her name is Linda, and she is 5 foot 11, very thin, has long blonde hair and the stereotypical snobbish roman nose. The two sisters occasionally visited the café, often they would make snide remarks at our expense. We put up with it for the sake of family.

And to be perfectly honest, I found both of the sisters attractive. Tanya would wear tank tops, cut off jeans and flip flops. Linda would typically wear a short dress and wear open toed heels. Usually, only two or three inches high. As attractive as they were I still despised them, they were royal bitches. I remember one time they were there. They had ordered coffee and a pastry. Linda was being her usual bitch self. When I came with their orders she said, “No wonder your not doing well, that is some slow service. I gritted my teeth and said, “My apologies, I will try to be quicker next time.” Tanya spoke up and said, “Hey aren’t you suppose to smile, your driving the few customers you have away with your attitude.” I smiled I said sorry again. Both of them laughed. Linda then deliberately “accidentally” knocked her sweet roll down. She then pushed it toward me with he foot, and said “Clean that up and get me another one.” Tanya also said, “you have some on your shoe Linda.” She responded, “Oh so I do, be a dear for me and clean that up Alan, and do remember, service with a smile.” I knelt down and picked up the roll, took a napkin and cleaned her shoe. She looked down her arrogant nose at me as if me kneeling before was entirely proper.

Needless to say family gatherings were not my cup of tea. We somehow found time to leave the shop and attend a birthday gathering. And one of Tanya’s friends had given her a scratch off lottery ticket. The grand prize was 20 million dollars! What a lame gift I thought… until she won. She shrieked and dance around. I couldn’t believe how unfair the world was! Me and Becky were at the end of our rope and that bitch gets it! It wasn’t fair! We drove home and Becky broke down and cried. Becky said, “We need money we have to ask her, we will be out of business in three months, our home is going to be taken by the bank.” I knew the truth, I didn’t like dwelling on it so I had ignored it. We were completely tapped out and our payments were coming in late. We needed money, and our credit stunk to high heaven.

I said, “Honey do you think she would let us borrow money from her? You know how she and Linda treat us.” Becky cried again, “I don’t know, I just don’t know. But we have to try or we lose everything.” We talked and we agreed we needed to do something. I put the call in to Tanya on the next day. Over the phone we talked and I stumbled and mumbled, I asked her “Uh Tanya, me and uh, Becky wanted to congratulate you on your winnings, and we would uh, how can I say this, could we come over and talk with you?” She pointedly asked me about what. I told her about how me and Becky could really use a loan and would like to talk with her in person. She laughed. She LAUGHED. I was turning beet red as I talked on the phone. This was so humiliating asking for money from a person you didn’t like and who you know thought you were trash and you just confirmed it! She agreed that we could come over and “beg”, she actually used the word beg!

I told Becky that Tanya would let us come over and plead our case. Becky looked me in the eye and said, “I know she is mean, she always was, but please keep your temper we need this money, whatever she does don’t react. Please.” I swallowed my pride and said yes, of course, we needed the money. We drove in silence, thinking about what we were going to say, and dreading her reaction. We arrived at a nice house, and saw another car parked there. It was Linda’s, I groaned, she was here too. Becky and me held hands as we knocked on the door. “Come in” we heard Tanya shout.

We opened the door and came in. Tanya was wearing some short shorts and a loose t-shirt. She was bare foot. Linda was dressed up as usual, she had a black dress on and 4 inch open toe heels. We closed the door and Becky said, “Thank you for letting us come over.” Tanya looked at her like she was some kind of bug and said, “So tell me what is going on and me and Linda will decide if we should help.” They hadn’t offered us a chair so we just stood there, Becky started to explain the situation when Linda cut her off. “You are begging for help aren’t you? Isn’t it proper to beg on your knees?”

Phi Eta Epsilon Tau was a fairly new sorority at Lakeloch College, not even two years old. Founded by then freshmen Rene Dubois, the sorority was something of an enigma at the college. Unlike the campus fraternities and other sororities, Phi Eta Epsilon Tau never hosted any parties, or at least, none where non-members were allowed anyway. More humorlessly, the acronym formed by the Greek letters sounded like "feet," though none of the Phi Eta's seemed to mind this. Indeed, instead of insulting, the members embraced it, calling themselves F.E.ET. sisters as a sign of camaraderie. Some even took going barefoot as a sign of sisterhood.

But the strangest thing about Phi Eta was its founder, Rene Dubios. Born in France, but raised in America, Rene was tall, rich, blonde, busty, and drop dead gorgeous. At first glance, she was easily mistaken as a stereotypical heiress; a deeper inspection revealed that she was anything but. While she was rich and beautiful, Rene had something a heiress stereotype lacked, brains! With an IQ over 140, she'd gotten in with a full STEM scholarship.
